
1a1(rgyud 'grel): rim pa gnyis pa'i de kho na nyid sgom pa zhes bya ba'i zhal gyi lung bzhugs/ /
1b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ dwi kra maha t+twa b+ha ba sa nA ma mu khI sad+d+hya n+ya/ bod skad du/ rim pa gnyis pa'i de kho na nyid sgom
1b2(rgyud 'grel): pa zhes bya ba'i zhal gyi lung/ thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dpal ldan bde rdzogs zab gsal gnyis med
1b3(rgyud 'grel): 'od zer ldan/ /de yi rang bzhin zhi ba bcu drug phyed cha 'bar/ /don dam snying po de ston bla ma gsum po rab/ /de la
1b4(rgyud 'grel): bya byed gsum mnyam pa yis rtag tu 'dud/ /'jig rten gsum gyi sgron ma kun gyis rab bsngags pa/ /chos rnams
2a1(rgyud 'grel): kun gyi snying po dngos po'i de bzhin nyid/ /srid pa'i dug chu zlog byed gsum khong dam steng 'bar/ /'jam dbyangs
2a2(rgyud 'grel): bla ma'i lung gis rtogs phyir bshad par bya/ /dbus kyi yul chen kha bir grong khyer rdo 'jog tu/ /bzang po seng ge zhes byar grags
2a3(rgyud 'grel): pa rab thob pa/ /bla ma de ni mnyes byas lung thob gzhung mang thos/ /de la rnam dpyad rig 'byung sh+rI na lAndar/ /yon tan bshes
2a4(rgyud 'grel): gnyen zhes bya rigs can de yi dor/ /blun bros rab tu byed pa phyogs 'ga' rtsom byed pa'i/ /brod pas der gnas rnams la
2b1(rgyud 'grel): gzhung des phan gdags par/ /bsams nas der gnas rtsom dang ston sogs rab tu bya/ /de nas yon tan kun 'byung u rgyan yul du bgrod/ /
2b2(rgyud 'grel): 'jo sgeg rdo rje zhes byar mtshan gsol rab tu grags/ /de la mang thos rnam par dpyad cing de nyid du/ /gu ne ru grogs bla ma de yang mnyes byas te/ /
2b3(rgyud 'grel): lung thob gnas de'i byang phyogs chab sgo bdag /dza thig dza la zhes bya'i bu mo bcu drug pa/ /lak+Sh+mI chen mo mnyes byas zla ba brgyad kyi bar/ /de yi lung
2b4(rgyud 'grel): ni rab thob gnon gnas grub pa thob/ /de nas dzA lAnd+ha rar grong khyer ko no dzer/ /phyin nas 'ba' mo pa ta zhes byar grags pa rab thob gang/ /
2b5(rgyud 'grel): mnyes byas gzhung thos lung ni mang du thos gyur nas/ /lho phyogs nam mkha' i shing ldan kong ka na ru bgrod/ /grub pa'i dbang phyug ba li pa tar rab
3a1(rgyud 'grel): grags pa/ /rdzu 'phrul ldan pa'i slob ma'i tshogs dang rab tu bcas/ /de kun yo byad gos zas nor rgyun gyis sbyor ba/ /bla ma dam pa de
3a2(rgyud 'grel): drung lo dgu rab tu btud/ /'dus pa'i rgyud chen 'grel bcas bco brgyad rab tu mnyan/ /bdag gis ma rtogs bla ma chen pos de bzhin gsungs/ /
3a3(rgyud 'grel): 'dir ma rtogs par gzhan ni don med par bsams nas/ /glegs bam mgul btags byang phyogs yul du rab bgrod de/ /rdo rje gdan rgyab ku ba tswa
3a4(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba'i tshal/ /stag dang dred sogs mang zhing shin tu 'jigs pa'i sar/ /zla ba drug gnas pa yi chos rnams de nyid rtogs/ /sprul pa'i dge slong
3a5(rgyud 'grel): bla ma gnyis dang bcas dang phrad/ /mgo dang lag gnyis yol dang tshes brgyad rgyal la bab/ /ston zlar ba'i tho rangs skya rengs shar dus su/ /'jam
3b1(rgyud 'grel): dpal dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor 'khor lo sprul pa la/ /bdag gis don 'di blang phyir gsol ba rab tu gdab/ /khyod ni sems can kun gyi yab ste yum yang yin/ /khyod kyis bdag la sogs te 'jigs pa
3b2(rgyud 'grel): che las skyobs/ /'gro ba'i dbang po rje btsun khyod kyis sdug bsngal sel/ /khams gsum stong byed che ba che khyod skye bo skyongs/ /thog ma med khyod nga ro thigs pa'i steng cha med/ /rje btsun yig med bdud rtsi rab
3b3(rgyud 'grel): dga' bde gtong byed/ /'gro la phan phyir bde bas sangs rgyas rnams kun la/ /rab dgyes bde ba'i mgon chen khyod kyis gtong bar mdzod/ /skyon gyis ma gos bla na med pa'i byang chub lam/ /sna tshogs sdug
3b4(rgyud 'grel): bsngal zhi mdzad skom pa ngoms mdzad cing/ /'khor ba rba klong thar mdzad bde la 'god mdzad pa/ /dngos kun rgyal bas mi dpogs lam 'di bstan par mdzod/ /zhi ba'i zhi ba rdul dang rab bral 'jungs pa sbangs
3b5(rgyud 'grel): bsgom pa las 'das mkha' 'dra dri mas ma gos pa/ /sgyu ma kun 'das 'dod pa kun la rgyab kyis phyogs/ /de 'dra'i rje btsun khyod la bdag ni skyabs su mchi/ /dregs med 'jigs med byang chub chen po
3b6(rgyud 'grel): thob kyi bar/ /'khor bar 'tsho bar 'jig rten dmyal tsub ma ltung bar/ /khyod gsungs dam tshig sdom pa thun mong ma yin rnams/ /bdag la sogs pas rtag tu rab tu bskyang bar bgyi/ /gar
4a1(rgyud 'grel): chen rnam par rol bas gar mdzad cing/ /sna tshogs phyag ni bcu dang bsgrims pa yis/ /pad+ma lo ma 'jam pa brgyad phye nas/ /gnyis med bde rgyu rdo rje bzhag par mdzod/ /gsang ba'i de nyid mi
4a2(rgyud 'grel): nyams gsal bar 'gyur/ /rdo rje 'dab skyes zla ba'i yang dag 'du/ /thabs shes las byung chos kun de nyid mchog /rje btsun bdag la phan phyir sbas pa shod/ /de nas 'jam dbyangs byang chub sems
4a3(rgyud 'grel): dpa' chen po yis/ /bdag la 'dzum pa'i bzhin bltas legs zhes lan gsum gsungs/ /rol pa'i gar dang chos kun de bzhin nyid/ /sgra brnyan lta bur rdo rje glu yis bdag la bstan/ /a bi yaM raM baM
4a4(rgyud 'grel): laM hUM/ a la la la ho/ rje btsun thugs rje che rnams kyis/ /'di rtogs pa yis bde gshegs kyi/ /phun sum tshogs pa 'thob 'gyur ba'i/ /'das dang da ltar ma byon pa'i/ /rdo rje 'dzin pas snod
4a5(rgyud 'grel): 'ga' la/ /gsungs shing gsung dang gsung 'gyur pa/ /yang dag don rab rab rtogs phyir/ /da yis khyod la bstan par bya/ /yid gcig bsdus la mnyan par gyis/ /chos rnams gzugs la sogs
4a6(rgyud 'grel): pa rnams/ /kun mkhyen bar gyi rang bzhin ni/ /nam mkha' i dkyil ltar rnam dag pa'i/ /zab gsal gnyis med ye shes te/ /de ni dngos med bsgom dngos med/ /dngos po thams cad dang bral ba'i/ /
4b1(rgyud 'grel): khams dang skye mched kyis ma zin/ /rang bzhin gyis ni 'od gsal ba/ /gdong nas dag pa nam mkha' bzhin/ /med pas chos rnams mtshan nyid spangs/ /chos dang chos nyid yang med de/ /dngos po med pas mkha' dang mtshungs/ /tshig dang yi ge kun las grol/ /de ni dus dang phyogs rnams dang
4b2(rgyud 'grel): chos kun gyi ni ngo bor song/ /lus ma yin te dag dang ni/ /yid kyang ma yin 'dod khams dang/ /gzugs dang gzugs med khams ma yin/ /'byung chen bzhi yang ma yin te/ /de bas de ni gang na yang/ /mi gnas bas na mnyam pa nyid/ /de 'dra rdo rje 'chang chen po/ /chos rnams
4b3(rgyud 'grel): kun gyi chos nyid mchog /thabs kyis bsgrub par bya ba'i dngos/ /brtags pa kun las rab dben pa/ /phun sum tshogs rgyu dpag dka' ba/ /phyag rgya tshan por rab snang ba'i/ /zer gyis rang nyid smin byed pa/ /de gnyis med pa'i rang bzhin mchog /rdo rje 'dzin pa chen pos kyang/ /brjod
4b4(rgyud 'grel): du med pa'i sku chen po/ /de nyid rgyal sras zhing bcas dang/ /srid gsum rgyu dang mi rgyur bcas/ /thams cad kun gyi bdag nyid de/ /dngos kun gtso bo rang sems kyis/ /ngo bo nyid de de rtogs na/ /sangs rgyas byang chub de nyid do/ /'jig rten gsum yang de nyid do/ /'byung chen rnams
4b5(rgyud 'grel): kyang de nyid do/ /ci yi phyir na chos thams cad/ /sems la gnas te de nyid kyang/ /nam mkha' la gnas nam mkha' ni/ /gang du mi gnas 'od gsal ba/ /gzod nas rnam dag stong ba'o/ /sangs rgyas mya ngan 'das pa'i khams/ /skye med rdo rje mngon byang chub/ /bder gshegs
4b6(rgyud 'grel): kun gyi snying po mchog /gnyis med rtog bral don chen te/ /rim pa gnyis par rab tu bshad/ /de 'dra'i don des dngos po kun/ /rnam par khyab te rnam gnas kyang/ /thog med dus nas de las kyang/ /rnam rtog chen po tshul byung ste/ /de la yang ni 'byung ba che/ /rlung gi
4b7(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor nyid byung ste/ /de las kyang ni me yi khams/ /chen po byung gnas khyab mdzad de/ /de las chu khams chen po yang/ /byung ste khyab mdzad de las kyang/ /sa byung bzhi bsdus ngo bo las/ /ri sogs sems can thams cad kyang/ /sna tshogs phra ba sbom po dang/ /skyes 
5a1(rgyud 'grel): pa bud med ma ning dang/ /gzhon nu dang ni rgan po dang/ /lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang/ /gdon dang skar ma gshin rje dang/ /chu bdag brgya byin dmyal ba dang/ /yi dags dus 'gro dang kun/ /spangs dang shes tsam rab brten pa'i/ /'gro ba kun tu rgyas par gnas/ /de bas de yi gong
5a2(rgyud 'grel): ma yi/ /gnyis med rtog bral rab bsgribs te/ /ma rtogs pas na 'gro ba kun/ /'khor bar rab tu 'khor bar 'gyur/ /de ni 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal che/ /dug chu lta bu 'khrul pa yis/ /rnam sgrubs thag pa'i sprul lta bur/ /snang zhing med pa nyid du 'dod/ /de bas gnyis med don
5a3(rgyud 'grel): chen po/ /rang rig dkyil 'khor chen po mchog /rgyun dang rnam grangs kyis gnas pas/ /de yi ngo bo rtogs par bya/ /gang zhig de rtogs rab 'dun pa/ /sems kyi smon lam yang dag can/ /sngon du bsod nams mthu bskyed dang/ /skyes bu yang dag bzhi la brten/ /sngo dang
5a4(rgyud 'grel): gus dang bsnyen bkur dang/ /'dun par ldan zhing sgom pa dang/ /brtan po som nyi rnam spangs pa/ /rjes mthun gtong phod des shes 'gyur/ /de yis rje btsun yang dag pa/ /mchog gi gdam ngag rgyud la ldan/ /theg chen lam gyi spyod pa dang/ /bsgom pa la ni skur
5a5(rgyud 'grel): len dang/ /de nyid bcu la sogs pa yi/ /gsang dang rab gsang shin tu gsang/ /shes shing de yi don gab par/ /ston byed bla ma mnyes par bya/ /yul dang mkhar dang khyim dang rta/ /glang po che sogs mal bstan dang/ /chung ma sdug dang yid 'ong bu/ /bu mo sring mo
5a6(rgyud 'grel): tsha mo sogs/ /gzhan yang gser dang dngul gyi rdzas/ /zang lcags sogs las byas pa yi/ /mdzes pa'i rdzas dang mu tig gi/ /phreng dang pad+ma rA ga dang/ /bu shar in+d+ra nI la dang/ /mar gad g.yu sogs mchod pa'i tshogs/ /zhing 'di mkhas pas rab bkang ste/ /de 'dra'i rje btsun
5a7(rgyud 'grel): dbang po mchod/ /gsal zhing rab dga' mkha' mnyam pa/ /gzhan du rigs par mi 'gyur bas/ /bud med sgyu ma'i phyag rgya ni/ /sgyu ma kun las khyad par 'phags/ /sgyu ma de yang 'jig rten 'dir/ /spyan la sogs par rnam dag pa/ /rigs ni rnam pa bzhir 'gyur te/
5b1(rgyud 'grel): ming dang mtshan nyid bshad par bya/ /ka ma li dang shang ki ni/ /tsi tra ni dang ha sti ni/ /dang po klu mo rigs yin te/ /gnyis pa stag dang seng gi rigs/ /gsum pa ri dag kriSh+Na tshogs/ /bzhi pa glang po che rigs so/ /de la ka ma li yi ni dbyibs dang mtshan nyid bstan par bya/ /bu mo pad+ma'i
5b2(rgyud 'grel): dri bro zhing/ /ngo zlum sna rtse til 'dra ste/ /se mo dmar zhing rgyab sgur dang/ /rkang mthil kun gyis sa la reg/ ba spu 'khyil ldan se mo can/ /dkar 'chang til gyi 'bras bu 'dra/ /gsus pa'i gnyer ma gsum ldan zhing/ /brang mdzes glang chen ltar 'gros dang//
5b3(rgyud 'grel): rAk+ta'i ro ni sgyur ba'o/ /sha mdog dmar te lha mo 'di/ /mA ma kI yis rnam par dag/ shang ki ni yi mtshan nyid dang/ /dbyibs ni khyod la bstan par bya/ /bu mo ba tshwi? dri bro zhing/ /skya ni ring zhing sna yang ring/ /dkar 'chang nar gang 'dra ba/ /'o ma zho la rab tu sred/
5b4(rgyud 'grel): rAk+ta'i ro ni mngar ba'o/ /mdog ni dkar ser gnas pa yi/ /gos dmar mo yis rnam par dag/ de bzhin tsi tra ni yi ni/ /dbyibs dang mtshan nyid bshad par bya/ /bu mo sha rlo ni dri bro zhing/ /lus chung brla ni shin tu 'dzes/ /dkar 'chang shing thog pa la 'dra//
5b5(rgyud 'grel): ngo tsha med cing khro 'dod pa/ /rtag tu 'thab mo dag la dga' / /rje dang bya rog dang 'dra zhing/ /chu 'phyang gan rkyal du nyal ba/ /phu ron skad 'dra she mdog ni/ /sngo bsangs rAk+ta'i ro tsha ba'o/ /de ni lha mo sgrol mas dag/ hasti ni mtshan nyid dang/ /dbyibs ni nga
5b6(rgyud 'grel): yis bstan par bya/ /bu mo chang gi dri bro zhing/ /byin sbom sna ni bcung zad yo/ /dri nga zhing ni lus sbom dang/ /spyod pa rtsir zhing mdog rdul skya/ /dkar 'chang g.yas g.yon du dgye ba/ /sha mdog smug cing rAk+ta ro/ /bsngal zhing de 'dra'i bu mo ni//
5b7(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas spyan mas dag pa'o/ /da ni de dag thams cad kyi/ /rung dang mi rung spyod pa bstan/ /rol tshe rgyab kyis phyogs pa dang/ /khong du dga' zhing tshig mang dang/ /bsgo ba bzhin du bka' yang gtseg /'o byas kha ni 'phyi byed de/ /bla ma'i yon tan shes
6a1(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur yang/ /gzhan du de la cung zad bsnyad/ /bla ma ma mthong ltar byed cing/ /'ongs kyang de la phyag mi 'tshal/ /rje btsun de dang mi mthun pa'i/ /mi gzhan dang ni rtse dga' byed/ /de sogs rab tu mi rung ste/ /mkhas pas rab tu spang bar bya/ /
6a2(rgyud 'grel): rung pa 'di ni mkhas pas btsal/ /mig gi rtsa mdangs mig rtsa rgod/ /slar zhing skad cig bsam pa dang/ /skad cig rgod pa'i 'phro gzhag nas/ /bsam zhing yang na smra 'am mdzum/ /rje btsun bla ma mthong gyur na/ /dga' zhing mdzes ltar 'dzun par byed//
6a3(rgyud 'grel): de yi bka' stsal nyan zhing mos/ /steg pa'i tshul gyis zhe sar ldan/ /gzhan du de la snyan par brjod/ /de mthong 'grog la 'khyud cing bsnyen/ /phag du khri zhing sor tshig nyed/ /skra ni bkrol nas slar 'ching byed/ /gos 'chos shing ni bar bar
6a4(rgyud 'grel): 'dzum/ /bla ma mthong ltar byed cing/ /gos 'chos pa dang lus nyed dang/ /rkang pas sa la 'dud cing 'bri/ /bus pa'i kha la 'o byed cing/ /nu ma ston cing ske rags 'grol/ /rje btsun de yi ma mthong na/ /glu dbyangs len cing mthong bar byed/ /de ni gang na
6a5(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa der/ /don med bsnyed kyis 'gro ba dang/ /drag tu gad mos rab stegs te/ /lu zhing glal ba ltar byed cing/ /mi mo 'di yang bstan par byed/ /de ni gsang gnas dbyibs kyis ni/ /mtshan nyid rung dang ma rung ba/ /nga yis yang dag bstan par bya//
6a6(rgyud 'grel): yid gcig bsdus la mnyan par gyis/ /gyo mo lta bu kha sbub dang/ /khung ring shin tu mi sdug dang/ /rtag tu skam por gnas pa dang/ /rtag tu zil pa 'dzag pa dang/ /spal pa'i rgyab ltar rtsub pa yi/ /gnas ni spang bya mi rung ngo/ /rus sbal rgyab ltar 'phang
6a7(rgyud 'grel): mtho zhing/ /steng mnyam shin tu 'jam po dang/ /ba lang gi ni ltag par ltar/ /stong mnyam thog gi dbyibs kyang ring/ /pad+ma'i snying po bzhin du zlum/ /cung zhig 'jig min cung zad 'byung/ /sbu nyung sgyu ma'i phyag rgya ni/ /mkhas pas thabs kyis shin
6b1(rgyud 'grel): tu btsal/ /mtshan nyid de dang ni ldan yang/ /rigs dang gzugs dang lang tshor ldan/ /rgyan mdzes yid 'ong bu mo ni/ /longs spyod gsum ldan gzung bar bya/ /chos zab la mos sems dang ni/ /las 'brel gyis 'gyur ma byas dang/ /sngon gsungs grogs kyis shes bslus pa'i//
6b2(rgyud 'grel): mi mo yang ni mkhas pas bsgrubs/ /de ltar de sogs bud med kyi/ /sgyu ma'i phyag rgya chen pos ni/ /'jig rten gsum du rnyed dka' pa'i/ /lhag pa'i lha zhes bya ba bsgrub/ /de yang thun mong dang bcas pa/ /tshogs kyi mtshe ba yang byas te/ /gong gsungs bu mo btsal nas
6b3(rgyud 'grel): kyang/ /bla ma la ni dbul bar bya/ /de nas bla ma de mnyes nas/ /de dang snyoms par zhugs pa yis/ /bde gshegs zhu gyur bcu drug char/ /gyur pa slob ma'i kha ru ltung/ /ltung bas snying ga'i pad+mar zhugs/ /de yis zhing ni dag byas te/ /chos kun sgyu ma la sogs
6b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i/ /bcu gnyis don du rtogs par 'gyur/ /de las de la rab 'byung ba/ /chos sku rab dga' mkha' mnyam pa/ /lhag? pa'i lha zhes bya ba ni/ /rtog bya'i ched du bu mo byin/ /lha mo 'di ni khyod dang mthun/ /sems chen khyod kyis 'dod pa gyis/ /yid 'ong bu mo 'di
6b5(rgyud 'grel): nyid ni/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis spyod du snang/ /dkyil 'khor 'khor lo cho ga yis/ /bu mo sgrol byed dga' byin ma/ /byang chub chen po bsgrub pa'i phyir/ /khyod kyi bde chen myong par gyis/ /gzhan gyis sangs rgyas mi nus pa/ /bu mo 'di ni yang dag mchog /de bas
6b6(rgyud 'grel): mdza' med 'khor ba'i bar khyod kyis 'di dang bral mi bya/ /de nas sems chen de yis ni/ /yid 'ong bu mo blangs byas te/ /de yis dam tshig sdom pa'i mchog /tshig 'dis rab tu smra bar bya/ /smros shig bu khyod rdo rje can/ /sha khrag khu ba la sogs pa/ /dri chen dri
6b7(rgyud 'grel): chu sogs za 'am/ /b+ha ga 'o byed mi rtog gam/ /gzungs ma nga la khyod brjod dam/ /de yis gzhad gad dang ldan bar/ /kye lha mo ci phyir bdag mi brjod/ /dri chen dri chu sogs pa'o/ /lha mo khyod la bkur sti dgos/ /b+ha ga 'o byed nga mi rtog /de nas bu mos ga zha
7a1(rgyud 'grel): phung/ /pad+ma gsal bstan tshig 'dis bsted/ /e ma ho bdag gi pad+ma 'di/ /bde ba thams cad dang ldan pa/ /cho ga'i rim pa gang gis spyad/ /de yi mdun na rtag tu gnas/ /don byed pad+ma dam pa 'di/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis bskur ba'i gnas//
7a2(rgyud 'grel): rab 'byung bde ba chen po ni/ /'di na rtag par bzhugs pa yin/ /b+hoM dza mok+Sha ho/ /de nas rang gi sa bon las/ /'od zer stug pos nang gsal nas/ /lha yi 'khor lo chags byas nas/ /rdo rje nang nas phyir byung ste/ /pad+ma'i nang du zhugs byas nas/ /rig
7a3(rgyud 'grel): ma'i lha yi 'khor lo rnams/ /chags pa chen po bskyed na kyang/ /zhal nas zhal zhugs 'khor lo rnams/ /chags chen bskyed nas rdo rjer phyung/ /sngon bzhin zhugs sogs rab byas pas/ /yang nas yang du lha dkyil 'khor/ /yid kyis shin tu chags
7a4(rgyud 'grel): par bya/ /de nas 'dod pa'i sgyu ma'i tshig/ brjod pas bu mo chags par bya/ /gnyis su med pa bde ba chen po mchog /lha mo khyod ni sgyu ma'i phyag rgya ste/ /zhal bzang khyod ni nga dang lhan cig tu/ /rnam par rtsen pas mkhas par myong bar bya/ /
7a5(rgyud 'grel): des kyang sgyu ma lta bu yi/ /'dod pa'i tshig gis gsol btab nas/ /bdag nyid chags pa chen po yang/ /bskyed nas rtsa yi 'khor lo btsal/ /bde mchog rgya chen bdag la dgongs su gsol/ /bsam mi khyab pa'i bde chen dag dang ldan/ /mi
7a6(rgyud 'grel): g.yo tshig dang bral ba'i dbyangs snyan pas/ /bdag la khyod kyis rol cig bzhes su gsol/ /ngo mtshar che ba'i rol pas snang mdzad cing/ /byang chub snying por 'gro ba'i lam mchog 'di/ /rgyud rnams yang dag gang la mi brten las/ /bde chen
7a7(rgyud 'grel): yid 'ong nga yis grol bar gyis/ /ho ho ho/ rol cig rol cig bdag la rol/ /'dod pa gyis shig dga' gsal ba/ /khyod kyis gzhan du mi rtogs pa/ /rtogs pas the tshom ma byed cig /a la la la ho/ /de nas rab tu chags ldan pas/ /de
7b1(rgyud 'grel): dang lhan cig lus kyi ni/ /spyod pas dben pa'i gnas su spyad/ /rol pas dga' ba brtag par bya/ /dang por 'dus ma byas nas su/ /de nas gru mo mtshan nyid dang/ /yang ni bskyang bar bya ba dang/ /de bzhin yang btag mtshan nyid dang/ /shin tu bskyang bas
7b2(rgyud 'grel): lnga ru 'gyur/ /dbud pa rab tu bskyang byas nas/ /grub mo mdud pas mgul nas 'khyud/ /cing bas ngam 'khyud g.yas g.yon skra/ /mgo ni mi g.yo gzung nas blta/ /de nas brla gnyis par bltas te/ /bung pa lta bu srid sgra'i glu /blangs nas mchu
7b3(rgyud 'grel): yis rtse bar bya/ /'gying bag stabs kyis 'khyud nas ni/ /g.yon gyi spyi'o skra bzung ste/ /g.yas kyis lkog ma brten nas kyang/ /ma mchu sbrang rtsi bzhib par bya/ /bzhib cing srid sgra brjod nas kyang/ /nu ma lag rtse mgrin pa dang/ /ma mchu 'gram pa
7b4(rgyud 'grel): rna ba'i rtsa/ /mig dang spyi bo gsang bar yang/ /kha yis 'o bya brtse bar yang/ /rna ba gnyis dang mchan khung dang/ /mgrin pa gnyis dang sum mdo rnams/ /sen mo re mos gdab par bya/ /nu ma gnyis dang mchan khung gnyis/ /gtso gnyis
7b5(rgyud 'grel): dang ni 'gram pa gnyis/ /lag mthil gnyis dang rkang mthil gnyis/ /mnyes pas 'dzA? ba chen po 'grub/ /g.yon gyis pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor ni/ /mnye zhing lce yis bskyod par bya/ /steng 'og tu 'ang bltar byas nas/ /sems kyis de la chags par bya/ /de nas dga' ba'i
7b6(rgyud 'grel): bu mo des/ /pad+ma stan nas 'di skad smra/ /rab byung bde chen rgyal po ni/ /pad+ma 'di na rab tu gnas/ /rtsa dang rlung gis rtogs 'gyur bas/ /khyod kyis rtsa yi 'khor lo chog/ /de nas de yi sor mo yis/ /nang nas rtsa yi 'khor lo che/ /pad+ma la gnas snying po lngas/ /brgyan
7b7(rgyud 'grel): byas ze 'bru ge sar dang/ /'dab ma brgyad pa gsal byas nas/ /A li kA li man+t+ra dang/ /kun ma ka dang shar sha ka /nA li gsum po btsal bar bya/ /rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug rtsa/ /gzung 'dzin bral ba b+ha ga'i dbus/ /bla ma'i man ngag stobs kyis
8a1(rgyud 'grel): ni/ sor mos go bar bya dgos so/ /de nas bcu dang ldan pa yi/ /lha mo de la 'khyud par bya/ /rdo rje pad+mar reg pa ni/ /bsnyen bya'i de nyid yin par bshad/ /rdo rje pad+mar zhugs pa ni/ /nye bar sgrub pa'i de nyid do/ /de nas bskul zhing bskyod tsam
8a2(rgyud 'grel): gyis/ /snying ni 'dar zhing dran pa nyams/ /spyi bor 'grol gos kyang 'dor bar byed/ /rdul gyis lus khyab mdog dmar te/ /mig dmar phra bas bdag la blta/ /yang du bskul bas sgrub pa'o/ /de bas sems khral med pa ru/ /sdom brtson gzhu dbyibs
8a3(rgyud 'grel): g.yo ba yis/ /sum mdo yi ye shes me sbar nas/ /khams gzhus nas ni bcu drug char/ /gyur pa me tog kun de 'dra/ /rlung gi sbyor bas phul bar bya/ /rang bzhin gyis ni rab zhi ba/ /chos kun gzhi ba de kho na/ /bde ba de nyid nor bur 'dug/ skad cig
8a4(rgyud 'grel): dran med g.yo bar byed/ /sgrub pa chen po de nyid do/ /nam mkha' i khams dang rdo rje sbyor ba las ni yang dag spyan can bde chen 'byung bar 'gyur/ /gang gang yang dag dga' byang chags bral dga' gnyis bar du bden gnyis mthong byas brtan par gyis/ /pad+ma
8a5(rgyud 'grel): mkha' la rdo rje nor bu pad snying gnyis la sbyor dang rdo rje skyil krung sems/ /nor bu bar du mthong byas gang de bde ba 'byung ba nges par de nyid ye shes te/ /'di ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa yin par bla ma mchog rnams kun gyis yang dag bshad/ /'dod chags chags
8a6(rgyud 'grel): bral bar ma ma dmigs ye shes lha ni skad cig de ru gsal/ /chu tshod brgyad dam nyin cig zla ba gcig tu 'am/ /lo gcig bskal pa 'am bskal pa stong du ye shes de myong bya/ /pad+ma la gnas bdud rtsi khu ba glo gros can gyis kha yis blangs
8a7(rgyud 'grel): nas btung bya'o/ /de 'dra'i dngos po thams cad kyi/ /mdza' yi de nyid zab gsal ba/ /thog med dus nas so so yi/ /skye bo nga dang ngar 'dzin las/ /ma brtags bar ni bdag tu bzung/ /dus las byung dang 'dod rgyal dang/ /gnam gyis bskos
8b1(rgyud 'grel): dang gyin dang/ /'dzin pa pos ni sprul pa dang/ /khams kun las ni nges 'byung dang/ /dbang phyug dang ni byon pa'o/ /dus dang gtso bo byed pa dang/ /byed pa po ni ma yin dang/ /rnal 'byor dang ni tshad ma dang/ /dag pa dang ni ma dag pa/ /nang gnas brjod med pa'i bdag /skyes bu dang ni
8b2(rgyud 'grel): khyab bdag dang/ /srog dang gang zag rnam shes dang/ /kun gzhi dang ni shes pa'o/ /mthong ba dang gzung 'dzin dang/ /shes pa dang ni shes bya dang/ /shes las skyes dang shin bu dang/ /srog dang gso ba la sogs pa/ /mu stegs rnams kyis rnam par rtogs//
8b3(rgyud 'grel): nam mkha' dang ni 'gog pa gnyis/ /shin tu 'dus ma byas pa ste/ /shin tu brtan byas 'dus byas kun?/ /skad cig ma ste bdag bo med/ /phra rab rdul las grub pa ni/ /blo yi rnam pa med pa ru/ /kha che bye brag smra bas rtogs/ /rang gi rig pa skyed byed pa/ /blta bya spyod
8b4(rgyud 'grel): yul rnam par ni/ /'dus ma byas pa gsum po dag /mo gsham bu bzhin med pa dang/ /'du byed thams cad bems bsdigs dang/ /dus gsum rgyu ba ma yin dang/ /dman med thogs med gzugs su ni/ /mdo sde pa yis rab tu rtogs/ /yan lag can yang
8b5(rgyud 'grel): don dam min/ /rdul phran dag kyang de bzhin no/ /so sor snang ba mi dmigs pa/ /rmi lam lta bur mi snang ste/ /gzung 'dzin spangs pa'i ye shes te/ /don dam shel ltar dag pa ru/ /rnal 'byor spyod pas rab tu rtogs/ /so sor snang ba'i gzhung thams cad/ /don
8b6(rgyud 'grel): dam yin te gcig pa dang/ /du ma'i rang bzhin bral ba'i phyir/ /nam mkha' i chu skyes bzhin du ni/ /gnyis med gnyis su med min zhi/ /shin tu dri med nam mkha' ltar/ /blo ldan dbu A? yis rtogs/ /de la sogs te mdza' yas pa/ /don de kho na la gnas nas/ /tha
8b7(rgyud 'grel): dang so sor rtog pa'o/ /de bas de dag thams cad kyang/ /yang dag min bas bla dang bcas/ /'og ma 'og ma'i rnal 'byor blo/ /gong ma gong ma khyad par 'phags/ /'og ma'i blo ni gong ma yi/ /shes rab kyi ni sun 'byin no/ /de bas gong ma'i rim pa yis/ /lhan
9a1(rgyud 'grel): cig pa yi slob dpon gyis/ /byin gyis brlabs pa yang dag bya/ /gsal zhing rab dga' nam mkha' 'dra/ /rang 'byung lhag pa'i lha chen po/ /lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes kyis/ /bla ma'i kha las rtogs par bya/ /de ltar dam tshig sdom ldan pa'i/ /snod du rtse
9a2(rgyud 'grel): gcig chu 'dra las/ /ye shes gzugs brnyan lta bu ru/ /rnal 'byor ba yis rab tu brtag /de thob phyin chad rnal 'byor pas/ /'khor ba nyid na gnas pa'i tshe/ /de yi nyes pas mi gos so/ /ji ltar sngags dang sman ldan pas/ /sprul dag gsod par
9a3(rgyud 'grel): byed pa bzhin/ /de 'dra'i rnal 'byor dbang phyug che/ /ye shes sman gyis rgyas btab pas/ /nyon mongs kyis ni ci byar yod/ /gang zhig lag na gdugs thogs la/ /de la char pas ci byar yod/ /de bzhin gnyis med ye shes kyi/ /gdugs thog
9a4(rgyud 'grel): la ni rtogs pa yi/ /char pa rab tu 'bab 'gyur yang/ /de la de yis ji ltar gnod/ /de 'dra rab mchog ye shes ni/ /so so skye bos ga la shes/ /nyan thos rnams kyis mi shes so/ /rang sangs rgyas kyis kyang mi shes/ /rnal 'byor sbyod dang dbu
9a5(rgyud 'grel): ma pa/ /byang chub sems dpas mi shes so/ /bla bcas sangs rgyas kun gyis kyang 'di ni cung zad mi shes so/ /'di yi don shes ma 'ongs pa'i/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa mnyes byas nas/ /rang gi bsod nams chen bstobs kyis/ yi ge med par rnam par
9a6(rgyud 'grel): 'pho/ /de la dkyil 'khor sbyin sreg dang/ /gtor ma bzlas pa bgrang phreng dang/ /skyil mo krung dang stang stabs sogs/ /spros bral rnam par bslu ba ste/ /bya ba ma yin dgag pa min/ /lhag pa'i lha yis sbrul phyir ro/ /bya ba rnams la rnal 'byor ba//
9a7(rgyud 'grel): lam chen dag tu yongs 'dzin pa/ /ri dags smig rgyu snyeg pa ltar/ /rtag tu snang yang ma zin no/ /bya ba'i nang chen gyis zin la/ /ye shes g.yo med sman chen gyis/ /gso byed skyes bu dam pa'o/ /de bas lus ngag yid gsum gyi/ /sdom pa mchog
9b1(rgyud 'grel): la gnas byas nas/ /nga'o snyam pa'i gzi bskyed la/ /rim pa gnyis pa de nyid bsgrub/ /dgon pa'am yang na grong gi mthar/ /gang dung ci rung de lta bur/ /bya bar 'os pa'i las kun yang/ /byas nas bde ba'i stan la 'dug /de nas sems can thams cad kun/ /tshangs
9b2(rgyud 'grel): spyod chen po bzhis dmigs te/ /de la sogs pa rang rgyud kyi/ /las kyi sgrib pa dag byas nas/ /sems tsam la ni blta byas te/ /phyi rol rang bzhin steng bar bya/ /sems tsam de yang stong byas nas/ /rang rig tsam du gnas par bya/ /rang rig de yang zla ba
9b3(rgyud 'grel): sogs/ /gdan du brtags nas yi ge'o/ /smyu gus bsnun byas mtshan mar gyur/ /de las rang nyid lhar bskyed la/ /lha yi nga rgyal dang ldan par/ /phyag rgya bzhis ni rgyas btab ste/ /dkyil 'khor 'khor lo sprul bar bya/ /de mnyes de la goms bslabs pas//
9b4(rgyud 'grel): phyi rol lus ni log byed de/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis spyod yul mchog /mdza' yi de nyid bsgom par bya/ /rang snying dam tshig phyag rgya yis/ /thugs dkar mtshan ma la gnas pa/ /de bzhin gshegs kun ye shes mchog /rim pa dang po pa rnams la/
9b5(rgyud 'grel): yi ge gzugs su rab snang ba/ /gzhom du med pa rang lha yi/ /sa bon 'od zer lnga 'bar pas/ /de yis kha dog rnam lnga yis/ /'od zer steng gi sgo yi ni/ /g.yas nas rnam par spro bar bya/ /de yi rtsa la dkyil 'khor gyi/ /'khor lo ldan pa'i
9b6(rgyud 'grel): bde gshegs rnams/ /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten bkang byas nas/ /dbugs kyi kun rtog las byung ba'i/ /sems can thams cad sangs rgyas sku/ /bskyed nas zla bar zhu bya ste/ /thim nas rnam par dag byas nas/ /de rnams ye shes ngo bo ru/ /
9b7(rgyud 'grel): g.yon pa'i ha sar zhugs par bya/ /de yi mtshan ma dbus gnas pa/ /sa bon la ni gzhug byas par/ /de nyid sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /yon tan kun bskyed rin po che/ /dngos po kun la khyab pa'i bdag /mi shigs pa yi
10a1(rgyud 'grel): thig le che/ /'od zer lnga dang rab ldan pa'i tsan ka yi 'bru tsam du/ /rang gi sems su chos thams cad/ /bsdus nas rnam par gsam par bya/ /de yi 'od zer rim pa yis/ /rang gi gnas ni khyab par bya/ /de las phyir byung dam tshig rgya/ /nang gsal
10a2(rgyud 'grel): de yis phyi yi lus/ /gsal byas dkyil 'khor gsal byas nas/ /de yi gnas kyang gsal bar bya/ /de las phyir byung ba dag nyid nang/ /byang chub sems gzugs bcu drug po/ /mthe bo'i rtsa bar yi ge a/ /rje ngar gnyis la de bzhin A/ /brla
10a3(rgyud 'grel): gnyis la ni i yi gzugs/ /gsang ba la ni a'i yi gzugs/ /lte ba'i rtsa ru u gzugs pas/ /de bzhin gsus par a'u yi gzugs/ /nu ma gnyis su ri gzugs gnas/ /de bzhin lag par rI gzugs te/ /mgrin pa la ni li yi gzugs/ /de bzhin ma
10a4(rgyud 'grel): mchur yi ge lI/ /'gram pa gnyis su e gzugs so/ /de yi mig gnyis yang ni i/ /rna ba'i rtsa bar o yi gzugs/ /spyi bor oM gzugs yang dag gnas/ /aM A(rgyud 'grel): yi gzugs tshigs kun la/ /bcu drug dus su rdzogs 'gyur pa/ /gong ma'i 'od kyis rnam
10a5(rgyud 'grel): bkug ste/ /thig le ru ni gzhug par bya/ /de ru sems ni cung zad tsam/ /gzung bas lha yi 'khor lo che/ /rten dang bcas pa mos pas bsgom/ /de dbus bdag po thugs ka rus/ gong ma'i rim pas mi shigs pa'i/ /thig le chen po bsgom byas nas//
10a6(rgyud 'grel): lungs kar tshad tsam de las spro/ /rang gi gnas dang phyag rgya yi/ /nang gsal dkyil 'khor gsal byas nas/ /de yi gnas dang bdag po yi/ /nang gsal phyi lus gsal byas nas/ /dkyil 'khor rten bcas gsal bar bya/ /de nas bcu drug gnas
10a7(rgyud 'grel): pa yi/ /'od zer gzhag pa phyung byas te/ /phyi yi lus ni gsal bar bya/ /de yis dkyil 'khor 'khor lo dang/ /rten dang bcas pa gsal byas nas/ /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten bzhugs pa yi/ /bde gshegs kun gyi spyan sngar gshegs/ /bdud rtsi zhu nas zhal zhugs
10b1(rgyud 'grel): te/ /thig ler dud rtsi blangs byas nas/ /rdo rje lam du byung nas su/ /'o ma'i rgyun ltar sngon byas nas/ /thabs kyi ye shes g.yas zhugs te/ /de bzhin gzhan ni g.yon du zhugs/ /de nas ye shes thig le la/ /snang ba'i thigs pas thim par 'gyur/ /de ni 'dzag pa'i
10b2(rgyud 'grel): ngang tshul can/ /'od zer lnga 'bar dkar 'tsher ba/ /cung zad dmar ba'i nang du sems/ /mi g.yo zhing ni gzung bar bya/ /de la gong ma'i rim pa ltar/ /spro ba dang ni bsdu ba dang/ /gzung ba yang dag byas 'gyur bas/ /'gog pa'i rdo rje sems nyid du/ /nam zhig de
10b3(rgyud 'grel): la reg 'gyur bas/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi mchog 'dzin pa/ /yid byin dpal dang 'dra ba yi/ /rtags rnams yang dag skye bar 'gyur/ /phung po khams dang skye mched kyi/ /lha rnams ye shes me yis su/ /thog mar snying gar sdud byed pa/ /cho ga 'di ni dang por
10b4(rgyud 'grel): bshad/ /de la bsgrub pas byin brlabs pas/ /sna yi rtse mor 'gro bas na/ /mi shig thig le'i rjes thogs la/ /gsang ba'i thig le bsgom par bshad/ /gong ma'i ye shes thig le las/ /'od zer lcags kyu 'dra ba rnams/ /phyogs bcur spros pas
10b5(rgyud 'grel): bde gshegs rnams/ /dkyil 'khor 'khor lo dang bcas kun/ /bkug nas ye shes ngo bo ru/ /rang gi snying gar rab tu btsud/ /de rnams zhu nas thig le la/ /zhugs pas rdul dang mun pa dang/ /snying stobs tshul du thig le yang/ /snying gi pad+ma la babs
10b6(rgyud 'grel): nas/ /rang gi rdo rje nor bu yi/ /dkyil du rnam par gnas pa las/ /'byung ba lnga yi gzugs can mchog /ye shes lnga yi ngo bo nyid/ /'od zer lnga 'bar rang lha yi/ /mtshan ma phra mo rnams bsams nas/ /de yi bum pa rten gyi tshad/ /yungs kar
10b7(rgyud 'grel): tsam dbus 'khor lo che/ /thig ler bcas pa mos par bsgom/ /gal te de la rang gi sems/ /bying bar song dam skyo ba na/ /rdo rje las ni phyir byung ste/ /sna rtser rnam par gnas byas nas/ /dga' bral dga' bas brtag par bya/ /'di yi thig
11a1(rgyud 'grel): le rnal 'byor las/ /gong gi rim pas 'od zer lnga/ /steng gi sgo las 'byung ba dang/ /slar yang bdud rtsi 'gug pa dang/ /de bzhin bzhi la gzhug pa dang/ /dbugs dgag stong pa'i yan lag go /de nas gsang ba'i thig le che//
11a2(rgyud 'grel): rab tu phra ba gong ma bzhin/ /rang sems dal bu dal bus gzung/ /dngos po med pa'i gnas su 'gyur/ /de yang gzung ba goms pa yis/ /phyin logs ni rnam par log /smig rgyu lta bu snang ba ni/ /rtags ni dang por shes par bya/ /de bzhin du ni chu
11a3(rgyud 'grel): log pas/ /du ba lta bur 'byung ba nam/ /gnyis pa yin par shes par bya/ /me ni rnam par log gyur pas/ /mkha' snang 'dra ba gsum pa'o/ /rlung ni de bzhin log pas ni/ /mar me lta bur rab snang ba/ /rtags ni bzhi par shes par bya/ /de bzhin
11a4(rgyud 'grel): phyin log rnam par shes/ /log pas zab gsal gnyis med kyi/ /don dran sprin med nam mkha' ltar/ /gsal ba rtags ni lnga pa'o/ /mtshan ma lnga po de yis ni/ /mi gnas mya ngan 'das thob pas/ /rnal 'byor pas ni 'di la 'bad//
11a5(rgyud 'grel): gzung ba yi ni yan lag go /de ltar de la mtshan ma lnga/ /mthong byas don de khyab bya'i phyir/ /rdo rje yi ni lam nas su/ /nam mkha' i khams su spro bar bya/ /spros pa de las mngon mthong ba'i/ /so sor snang ba bskyed par bya/ /sangs rgyas rjes su
11a6(rgyud 'grel): dran pa dang/ /chos ni yang dag rjes dran dang/ /rdo rje rjes su dran pa dang/ /rigs ni yang dag rjes dran dang/ /khro bo rjes su dran pa ni/ /snang mdzad dang ni tshe dpag med/ /mi bskyod rin chen 'byung ldan sogs/ /gshin rje gshed sogs khro bo'o//
11a7(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor sku sogs ji snyed po/ /spro bsdu las ni gsal bar bya/ /de bzhin dam tshig rjes dran ni/ /rjes su chags dang cho ga bzhi/ /dang po spro bsdu las gsal bya/ /dkyil 'khor rjes su dran pa ni/ /cho ga gnyis pa la sogs pa'i//
11b1(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor spyo? bsdu la gsal bya/ /sku ni rjes su dran pa dang/ /gsung dang thugs ni rjes dran dang/ /sems can rjes su dran pa ni/ /sku dang gsung thugs bsgoms pa yi/ /rdo rje gsum ni spro bsdu las/ /rnam par smon cing dran pa'o/ /de bzhin sngags ni thams cad
11b2(rgyud 'grel): kyi/ spyi gzugs rjes su dran pa ni/ /ye shes lnga yis ye shes sems/ /bskyed pa dang ni reng gi lha/ /longs spyod bzhi ldan spro bsdu las/ /rjes su gsal dang rnyed pa'o/ /dam tshigs rjes su dran pa ni/ /bdud rtsi myang ba la sogs pa/ /spro bsdu las ni
11b3(rgyud 'grel): gsal byed pa'o/ /shes rab pha rol phyin pa dang/ /ma skyes rjes su dran pa ni/ /spros pa'i dkyil 'khor de dag kyang/ /ci yang yod pa ma yin te/ /de ni gnyis med ngo bo ru/ /spro bsdu lam ni dran pa'o/ /zhe sdang rigs la sogs pa yi/ /mchod pa rjes dran
11b4(rgyud 'grel): sbyor ba ni/ /rang gi rigs la sogs pa yi/ /mchod pa rjes dran sbyor ba ni/ /rang gi rigs kyi bu mo mchog /bar ma'i longs spyod bzhi dag pa/ /rjes su chags pas mnyes bya ba/ /spro bsdu las ni gsal byed pa'o/ /rjes su dran pa'i yan lag go/ de ltar yan
11b5(rgyud 'grel): lag gsum gyis ni/ /gsang ba'i thig le bsgom byas nas/ /nor bu las ni byung nas kyang/ /khams gsum khyab par byed pas ni/ /sprul ba'i thig le bsgom pa bshad/ /rang gi spyi bo dbus su ni/ /sku yi rdo rje thugs ka ru/ /mtshan ma la gnas rlung dkyil 'khor
11b6(rgyud 'grel): dud ka 'du bar zla ba la/ sa oM dkar 'od ba'i mtshan nyid bsam/ /de bzhin mgrin pa'i dbus su yang/ /gsung gi rdo rje thugs ka yi/ /mtshan ma'i dbus su chu dkyil 'khor/ /dkar po dbus su zla ba la/ /A dmar gnas pa'i rang bzhin bsgom/ /thugs kar thugs kyi rdo rje yi/
11b7(rgyud 'grel): thugs kar mtshan ma la gnas pa'i/ /me yi dkyil 'khor dmar po la/ /zla gnas dbus su hUM nag po/ /'gro ba'i rang bzhin bsams nas kyang/ /num gnyis kyi bar du yang/ /dam tshig phyag rgya'i thugs ka ru/ /mtshan ma la gnas dbang chen ni//
12a1(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor ser po zla ba la/ /rang gi lha yi sa bon che/ /'byung dang 'jug dang gnas pa la/ /rnam par grol ba'i sa bon bsams/ /de ltar phyag rgya bzhi chen dang/ /bdag nyid 'brel bar byas nas su/ /rim pa 'di yis mi shigs pa'i/ /rdo rje bzlas
12a2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i ngo bo bya/ /g.yas pa nas ni 'byung ba'i khams/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor chen po ste/ /kha dog dud ka rgyu ba las/ 'byung ba hUM gi ngo bo yis/ /snang srid chos kun khyab byas nas/ /chos kun dag byas bdud rtsi 'gyur/ /oM gyi ngo bos 'ongs byas nas//
12a3(rgyud 'grel): rang gi rgyud kyi bag chags ni/ /bkrus nas dag byas de la zhugs/ /a yi ngo bo/ gnas byas nas/ /de la lha yi de bzhin nyid/ /gzung bas dal bus dal bus byas/ /dngos po med pa'i gnas su 'gyur/ /g.yon pa nas ni 'byung ba'i khams/ /chu yi
12a4(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor chen po ste/ /kha dog dkar po rab gnas pa/ /de las byung ba'i hUM dang ni/ /oM gyi rang bzhin 'du ba dang/ /A yi rang bzhin gnas pa dang/ /de ting gzung ba snga ma bzhin/ /gnyi ga las ni drag tu 'byung/ /me yi dkyil 'khor nyid yin te/
12a5(rgyud 'grel): kha dog dmar po ngo bo las/ /hUM gis spros dang oM gyis bsdus/ /A yis gnas pa de nyid gzung/ /snga ma bzhin du shes par bya/ /de bzhin gnyis las dal bu 'byung/ /dbang chen gyi ni dkyil 'khor rgyu/ /kha dog gser ltar rab snang ba/ /de la hUM gis
12a6(rgyud 'grel): 'byung ba dang/ /oM gyis bsdud dang A(rgyud 'grel): yis gnas/ /de la de nyid rab bzung bas/ /'jug dang gnas dang ldang ba las/ /grol ba'i ye shes rnyed 'gyur ba/ /som nyi yid gnyis ma byed cig /phyag rgya bzhi 'brel bzlas pa ni/ /nyis brgya nyi shu rtsa lnga
12a7(rgyud 'grel): ste/ /de ni dgu brgya rnam pa bsgres/ /zhag gcig tu ni nyi shu bzhis/ /khri phrag gnyis dang gcig stong dang/ /brgya phrag drug tu dus thams cad/ /rnal 'byor dbang phyug chen po yis/ /nyin mtshan bzlas brjod grangs byed do/ /'di yis rnams
12b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i chos thams cad/ /sgyu ma dang ni smig rgyu dang/ /brag ca mgal me'i 'khor lo dang/ /'khrul pa dri za'i grong khyer dang/ /chu bur dang ni mig 'phrul dang/ /gzugs brnyan chu zla la sogs par/ /thams cad shes shor sa bcu pa'i/ /dbang phyug rnams dang
12b2(rgyud 'grel): bskal mnyam ste/ /rang bzhin bzlas pa 'di la ni/ /rnal 'byor pas ni rab tu 'bad/ /'di ni thog ma med dus nas/ /rang bzhin yang ngag rtag zlo? yang/ /bla ma yang dag ma brten par/ /don 'di rtogs par mi 'gyur ro/ /de ni yang dag shes nas ni/ /bsgom
12b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i bar chad phyi rol gyi/ /bzlas pa yongs su spang bar bya/ /bzlas pa'i ngo bo chen po mchog /rdo rje 'chang pa brjod med sku/ /bsam brjod yul las rab 'das pas/ /ngag gis ji ltar bzlas pa byed/ /de bas glang chen rnyed gyur pa/ /rjes kyis de la ci zhig
12b4(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /don de la gnas rnal 'byor che/ /phyi rol yang ni rten mi 'gal/ /glang po che yi stobs kyis ni/ /bud shing 'byung ba lta bu'o/ /de bas rdo rje bzlas pa mchog /'bad pas bde gshegs thams cad kyis/ /byin rlabs nyid ni 'dor bas na/ /phyag
12b5(rgyud 'grel): rgya chen po 'grub pa yi/ /mtshan ma yang dang yang 'byung 'gyur/ /de byung cho ga la gnas pas/ /skad cig gis ni kun mkhyen che/ /rgyud las rab tu 'pho bar ni/ /the tshom med par des pas na/ /cho ga 'di la rab tu 'bad/ /de ltar dga' gsum bye brag
12b6(rgyud 'grel): gi /thig le rnam gsum bsgom pa yi/ /cho ga yang dag bstan pa'o/ /da ni gnyis med ye shes nyid/ /kun rdzob gzugs la brten nas kyang/ /mi g.yo la sogs g.yo dang bcas/ /tshangs sogs lha dang lha min sogs/ /thams cad rab tu mi snang
12b7(rgyud 'grel): yang/ /thig le 'gog par mi 'gyur te/ /rgyu dang mi rgyur bcas pa kun/ /slar yang de las 'byung bar byed/ /de las skye bo rnams kyis ni/ /yang dag ma rtogs pa yi phyir/ /tshangs pa'i sgo nga las skyes par/ /'khrul pas chos rnams kyis 
13a1(rgyud 'grel): mi bsgul/ /gang gis kyang ni mi shigs pa/ /ji srid 'di ni lus la zhes pas/ /las dang las min rab byed pa/ /brtan po 'jigs pa rab spangs pa'i/ /mi shigs thig le bsgom par bshad/ /tshangs pa'i spyod pa bzhi po dang/ /phyi rol
13a2(rgyud 'grel): stong byas la sogs pa/ /rang gi lha ru bskyed nas kyang/ /phyag rgya bzhis ni rgyas btab pa/ /snga ma bzhin du shes byas nas/ /rim pa 'di yis thig le la/ /rang gi sems ni yang dag bzung/ /rang gi ye shes sems dpa' yi/ /mtshan ma'i
13a3(rgyud 'grel): dbus gnas sa bon las/ /'od zer lnga 'phros de yi rtse/ /dkyil 'khor 'khor lo dpag med sbrul/ /de yis khams kun khyab byas nas/ /dbugs kyi rta zhon kun rtog rnams/ /rnam par bsal te de dag kyang/ /dkyil 'khor
13a4(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lor rab byas te/ /gnyis pa'i dkyil 'khor bsdu byas nas/ /ye shes ngo bo sna bug g.yon/ /zhugs byas mtshan ma'i dbus gnas bya/ /sa bon la ni thim pas kyang/ /de ni phyogs dus gnas pa yi/ /sangs rgyas yon tan ci gsungs
13a5(rgyud 'grel): pa/ /yang dag bskyed byed mi shigs pa'i/ /thig le 'od zer lnga 'bar ba/ /rnam par gsal byas de las kyang/ /'od zer 'byung bas rang gnas kyang/ /ye shes sems dpa' i nang gsal te/ /de yi phyi dang dkyil 'khor dang/ /
13a6(rgyud 'grel): gnas ni gsal bya de las byung/ /mthe bo'i rtsa dang rje ngar dang/ /brla gnyis dang ni gsang ba'i gnas/ /lte ba dang ni gsus pa dang/ /nu ma gnyis dang lag rtse dang/ /mgrin pa dang ni mchu gnyis dang/ /'gram pa gnyis
13a7(rgyud 'grel): dang mig gnyis dang/ /rna ba'i rtsa dang spyi bo dang/ /tshigs kun thig le a sogs kyi/ /gzugs su gnas pa sgrub byas nas/ /mi shigs thig ler thim par bya/ /der ni rang gi sems cung zad/ /bzung bas rten dang brten can gyi/ /'khor
13b1(rgyud 'grel): lor mas byas de dbus su/ /mi shigs thig le ye zhes la/ /snang ba'i ngo bo bsgom par bya/ /de yi 'od kyis rang gnas sogs/ /gsal byas ye shes thig le yi/ /nang gsal bzhag pa'i 'od zer gyis/ /phyogs bcu 'jig rten khams bzhugs pa'i/ /spyan
13b2(rgyud 'grel): sngar bdud rtsi zhu byas nas/ /zhal du zhugs nas snying ga yi/ /mi shigs thig ler rab song ste/ /k+ShuM? gzugs bdud rtsir rab blangs nas/ /rdo rje lam nas byung nas su/ /'o ma'i rgyun ltar phyogs bcu nas/ /'ongs pa yis ni sems can dang/ /sangs rgyas rnams dang
13b3(rgyud 'grel): mi rgyur bcas/ /yang dag bsdus nas gur sogs zhugs/ /de bzhin chos dbyings phyag rgya dang/ /rten gyi 'khor lor zhugs byas nas/ /de dag yang ni rab bsdus te/ /dkyil 'khor du ni rab bsdus nas/ /de yang bdag la bsdu byas te/ /bdag nyid kyang ni mi
13b4(rgyud 'grel): snang bar/ /ye shes sems dpa' i gnas la dmigs/ /de yang 'khor lo 'khor lo yang/ /ye shes sems dpar gzhug par bya/ /ye shes sems dpa' mi snar nas/ /mtshan pa ma 'ba' zhig la dmigs bya/ /mtshan ma de yang bsdu byas nas/ /mi shigs thig  
13b5(rgyud 'grel): ler sems bzung ste/ /de las yang ni nang gi tshogs/ /kun bsdus rang snang thig le che/ 'ba' zhig la sems yang dag gzung/ /ci ltar nus bzhin bsgom pas der/ /sems ni yang dang yang du zhugs/ /yang ni de las phyir byung ste/ /de yi gnas dang rang gi
13b6(rgyud 'grel): lus/ /dmigs nas dkyil 'khor 'khor lo dang/ /rten dang khams gsum snang bar bya/ /de nas yang ni gong ma ltar/ /rim pas bcug nas thim byas la/ /sems ni thig ler bzhag par bya/ /rang gi dbang po der bzung nas/ /sa yi dkyil 'khor chu la zhugs/ /chu de
13b7(rgyud 'grel): me la de bzhin zhugs/ /me yang rlung la rab tu zhugs/ /rlung yang sems la zhugs par gyur/ /sems ni gnyis med ye shes su/ /cung zad zhugs pas brtags gnas pa/ /smig rgyu 'dra dang du ba dang/ /mar me mkha' snang rab 'dra ba/ /sprin med nam mkha' 
14a1(rgyud 'grel): ltar snang ba'i/ /mtshan ma lnga po 'byung bar 'gyur/ /rdo rje sems dpa' zhugs phyir ro/ /thig le la ni sems bzung ste/ /glal zhing rgod dang 'dar la sogs/ /rnal 'byor de la gang che 'byung/ /thig le yang dag spro byas nas/ /gong ma'i rim pas
14a2(rgyud 'grel): kun khyab bya/ /'di ni yang dag goms byas pas/ /mi gnas mya ngan 'das pa che/ /thabs kun gyi ni bsgrub bya mchog /rdo rje 'chang ba chen po thog /'di ni lhan cig skyes bi yi/ /ye shes 'ba' zhig dbang byas nas/ /rim pa gnyis pa bsgom pa'i  
14a3(rgyud 'grel): thabs/ /mi shigs thig le bsgom pa'o/ /de ltar chos kun de bzhin nyid/ /dpag med dam pa'i phun sum tshogs/ /de dmigs yang dag skyes 'gyur ba/ /bsgom pa'i mchog rnam bshad nas/ /rnam grangs dag kyang yongs su bstan//
14a4(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin nyid dang yang dag mdza' / /bsam gyis mi khyab pa yi dbyings/ /chos nyid dang ni chos skyon med ngag stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med/ /smon pa med pa nyid dang yang/ /nyon mongs khur chen 'bor byed pa/ /skye ba med dang 'od gsal
14a5(rgyud 'grel): ba/ /mngon par byang ni chub pa dang/ /gzhan gyi sems shes byed pa dang/ /lha yi rna ba ster ba dang/ /de bzhin lha yi mig ster dang/ /rdzu 'phrul dpag med sprul chen dang/ /dngos po mthar ni phyin pa dang/ /don dam pa yi bden pa dang//
14a6(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs pa yi ni rim pa dang/ /yongs su dag pa'i sku gtsang dang/ /kun gyi bsten bya nyid dag dang/ /mkhar ltar rnam par dag pa dang/ /glo bur dri mas mi gos dang/ /gdod nas 'od gsal ba nyid dang/ gang gis kyang ni mi shigs dang//
14a7(rgyud 'grel): dngos po med pa nyid dang ni/ /rgyu sogs bcu gnyis 'byung byed dang/ /dpal chen ye shes yongs dag dang/ /thig le chen po yongs dag dang/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang chen dang/ /nam mkha' nam mkha' i spyod yul dang/ /bsgom pa med pa nyid dang ni//
14b1(rgyud 'grel): rje btsun man ngag chen po dang/ /rna nas rna bar 'pho byed dang/ /nyan thos kyis ni shes min dang/ /rang sangs rgyas sogs mi shes dang/ /yi ge med pa nyid dang ni/ /tshig dang bral dang brjod med sogs/ /de la mdor brgyud rnams las/ /de 'dra rnam pa mdza' yas
14b2(rgyud 'grel): pa/ /gsungs shing yang dag gsung 'gyur ba/ /der ni de bzhin nyid 'di las/ /gzhan ni ci yang ma gsungs so/ /de bas dad pa sngon 'gro ba'i/ /sems kyi chos kun de bzhin nyid/ /gsal zab gnyis med don chen po/ /rim pa gnyis pa'i de kho na/ /
14b3(rgyud 'grel): bla ma'i gsung ni yang dag gzung/ /de gzung gong ma'i rim pa yis/ /rtag tu goms byed skyes bu gang/ /de la brtan pa'i rtags skyes nas/ /sa nas sar ni 'phar ba ltar/ /blo yi rnam pa gong du 'phel/ /rig 'dzin la sogs sprul pa yis//
14b4(rgyud 'grel): gzhan ni don de la sbyor byed/ /de yis bstan 'gyur rnal 'byor pa/ /sgrub pa'i bdag nyid tsam du 'gyur/ /bdag nyid can dge bsgrub pa'i mchog/ ji skad gsungs pa brtsam par bya/ /lha mo klu mo gnod sbyin mo/ /mi mo mi 'am ci mo 'am/ /mkha' 'gro ma
14b5(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa rnams/ /rang gi nus pas brtsam par bya/ /smyon pa'i brtul zhugs la sogs pas/ /zla drug sogs par rab tu 'bar/ /de yis rje btsun yig med pa/ /dpal ldan sangs rgyas kun ngo bo/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad gnas/ /chos kun de bzhin nyid zab pa/ /sangs
14b6(rgyud 'grel): rgyas rnams kyi bsgrub bya mchog /gong ma'i rim pa rnal 'byor pa/ /'bad pa che thad rab byas pas/ /de ltar de ru mtshan nyid kyi/ /tshul du cung zad rab gnas pa'i/ /dga' dang dga' ba bar ma dang/ /dga' dang bral ba'i dus su yang/ /ji bzhin gnas pa'i dga' ba
14b7(rgyud 'grel): gsum/ /ji skad gsungs pa thob par 'gyur/ /de nas mdza' med 'khor ba'i bar/ /rtag pa dang ni mi gdung dang/ /bsil ba dang ni gcig pa dang/ /bde ba dang ni dri med dang/ /dga' ba dang ni yid dga' ba/ /'di ni bde chen ro myang brgyad/ /bdag po rdo rje chad pa mchog
15a1(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor pa/ /bya ba byas pa byed pa byas/ /dbang phyug chen po khur chen por/ /cher ma dkrugs pa thams cad mkhyen/ /skyes bu dpa' bo cang shes pa/ /glang po chen po dul ba'o/ /'khor ba'i
15a2(rgyud 'grel): mdza' yi pha rol son/ /don dam dang ni kun rdzob kyi/ /bden pa gnyis med rnal 'byor che/ /tha ba spangs pa 'am lam kun rdzogs/ /yon tan 'byung gnas kun tu bzang/ /thams cad 'dus pa'i de kho na/ /sku sogs
15a3(rgyud 'grel): khams kun 'gengs pa'o/ /gong na med pa yang dag gnas/ /de ltar de sogs rab grags pa/ /ming ni rnam pa mdza' yas pa/ /gnyis med ye shes mtshon pa ste/ /mdo dang rgyud rnams thams cad du/ /blo ldan
15a4(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyis rtogs par bya/ /sa bcu dang ni rab ldan pa'i/ /gong ma'i lha mo rdo rje 'dzin/ /dge ba bcu gsum la gnas pa/ /skad cig gis ni yang dag tu/ /sgrib bral de yis rtogs par byed/ /phreng ba ha ra nu phur sogs//
15a5(rgyud 'grel): mdog dang ku tsa la sogs pa/ /pad+ma brtags pa'i dga' shes pa/ /dang por rab tu shes par bya/ /sha rdzas gri tra gri na sogs/ /glu dbyangs bstod dang sing sgra yi/ /snyan pa'i dbyangs kyis dga' 'gyur bas/ /gnyis
15a6(rgyud 'grel): pa ru ni shes par bya/ /tsanda na la sogs sna tshogs dris/ /lus byugs lhan cig rtsan byed che/ /dga' ba yang dag thob byed pa/ /gsum pa ru ni shes par bya/ /ma mchu sgrang rtsis gzhibs byas pas/ /mgor gnas
15a7(rgyud 'grel): byang chub sems 'ju bas/ /ro 'thung dga' bas bdag mnyes pas/ /bzhi par rab tu shes par bya/ /lus la byug cing sna tshogs kyi/ /spyod pas rtsen che reg bya yis/ /yang dag dga' bar byed pas na/ /lnga ba ru ni shes
15b1(rgyud 'grel): par bya/ /de yis ye shes rnam pa gsum /rig par byed cing rang gi yid/ /yang dag dga' bar rab byed pa/ /drug par shes bya rnal 'byor pas/ /de yi lus ni bdag gi ni/ /rten du gnas pa sra ba yis/ /yang dag dga' bar byed pas na/ /?
15b2(rgyud 'grel): pa ru ni shes par bya/ /da yi pad+ma'i zil sogs dang/ /byang sems rlan gyis rang gi sems/ /rab tu dga' bar byed pas na/ /brgyad par rab tu shes par bya/ /gsang gnas drod sogs tsha ba yis/ /bdag gi yid ni yang dag par/ /dga' bar
15b3(rgyud 'grel): byed pa'i mchog yin pas/ /dgu pa ru ni shes par bya/ /de nas bskyod pas ye shes mes/ /phung po khams sogs sreg byed pas/ /yid ni yang dag dga' 'gyur pas/ /bcu pa rab tu shes par bya/ /bcu po de yis dang po dang/ /phyis kyi 'bras
15b4(rgyud 'grel): bu mchog 'gyur ba/ /gong du gsungs pa rab thob ste/ /de bas de 'dra'i don chen la/ /yang dag 'jug par mi nus pa'i/ /gdul bya rnams la bde gshegs kyis/ /rab tu dga' sogs mtshan nyid du/ /bstan nas de yi don
15b5(rgyud 'grel): zhugs pas/ /de yis rtogs kyang bla dang bcas/ /de nyid dang po rnal 'byor la/ /rten dang brten can dkyil 'khor gyi/ /'khor lo rab tu bstan byas nas/ /de zhugs de la brtan byas pas/ /rtogs kyang don 'di ma shes na/ /
15b6(rgyud 'grel): yang dag sangs rgyas ma yin no/ /'di ni rang 'byung bcom ldan 'das/ /gcig pu rab tu che ba'i lha/ /lhag pa'i lha zhes bya ba ni/ /bcu gsum sa zhes bya bar bshad/ /de ltar rim pa gnyis pa yi/ /de bzhin nyid ni thabs
15b7(rgyud 'grel): bcas pa'i/ bdud rtsi mchog 'di rnal 'byor gang/ /'thung bar byed pa sangs rgyas kyi/ /de yi sras su nges pa ste/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi grogs/ /rig pa 'dzin pa'i dpon po ste/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi khyo ru 'gyur/ /nyan thos
16a1(rgyud 'grel): rang 'dren rnams kyi ni/ /'dren par byed pa'i gtso bo ste/ /sems can phal pa'i rje btsun no/ /de la phyogs bcu khams bzhugs pa'i/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang/ /rig pa'i lha dang khro bo sogs/ /me
16a2(rgyud 'grel): tog la sogs mchod par bcas/ /zhag gcig skya red dang po dang/ phyed ni dros pa'i dus nyid dang/ /chal chil? mtshams su nam mkha' las/ /mchod pa byas nas sngags brjod cing/ /rang gi zhing du 'gro bar 'gyur/ /de bas dag pa'i lha
16a3(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyang/ /de bzhin du ni mchod byed na/ /ma dag pa yi lha rnams ni/ /de la ci yi phyir mi mchod/ /sems can phal pa gzhan gyis ni/ /me tog snyim pa bkang nas ni/ /mgrin par dma' bas zhabs 'dud cing/ /rtag
16a4(rgyud 'grel): tu bskur bar shin tu 'os/ /de ni skyes bu rkang gnyis gtso/ /kun mkhyen rnams kyis bzhag pa ste/ /phyin log khur chen por byed pas/ /ma 'ongs rdo rje 'chang ba ste/ /de la brnyas byed sems can gang/ /sgrub pa po de glad
16a5(rgyud 'grel): dang 'dra/ /de yis nga la brnyas byed pas/ /ngas ni de kun dus kun spong/ /cig shos lus la nga gnas phyir/ /mchod cing brjod pas lus rnams kyi/ /sgrib pa de yis dag byed do/ /rim pa gnyis 'dir sgrub pa po/ /rtse gcig
16a6(rgyud 'grel): pa yis rnam par gzung/ /de gzung tshe 'di nyid la yang/ /brtul zhugs cho ga nyid kyis ni/ /lha mos rkyen ni rab byas te/ /phyag rgya chen po rang rgyud la/ /'pho bar the tshom mi bya'o/ /da ni rang nyid byin brlab pa'i/ /rim pa 'di ni rnal
16a7(rgyud 'grel): 'byor pa/ /bya bas bskal pa 'ga' zhig la/ /yang dag tu ni bshad par bya/ /gang zhig bla ma mnyes byas nas/ /des gnang dam sdom bcas pa ru/ /bum pa la sogs rab thob ste/ /bla ma'i zhal las rnyed pa yi/ /de bzhin
16b1(rgyud 'grel): nyid ni rab thob cing/ /gsang dang mchog tu gsang rig pas/ /ji skad bshad pa'i bya ba yis/ /yang dag bsgom ni mi nus pas/ /ji bzhin pa yi de kho na/ /rim pa 'di yis bsgom par bya/ /gang zhig dus ni phyi zhig la/ /'chi ba'i mtshan ma bdag
16b2(rgyud 'grel): gis mthong/ /'chi bar gyur pa'i dus byung na/ /nad kyis yang dag ma rnyogs par/ /'pho ba'i sbyor ba yang dag bya/ /dpral ba dang ni lte ba dang/ /spyi gtsug dang ni mig dang ni/ /rna ba dang ni sna dag dang/ /chu yi gnas dang chu min gnas//
16b3(rgyud 'grel): kha yi gnas dang ye shes kyi/ /'gro 'ong gi ni rtags zhes bya/ /dpral ba gzugs kyi khams kyi ni/ /rtags skyes pa ru shes par bya/ /lte bar 'dod khams lha rnams kyi/ /rtags byung de ru skye bar des/ /spyi gtsug gzugs med khams
16b4(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyi/ /rtags byung de ru skye bar 'gyur/ /sna gnyis ye shes 'pho ba na/ /gnod sbyin gnas su skye bar 'gyur/ /rna gnyis rig pa 'dzin pa yi/ /gnas su nges par 'gro ba'o/ /mig gnyis mi rnams rgyal por 'gyur/ /rtags ni
16b5(rgyud 'grel): yang dag skye bar 'gyur/ /kha ru ye shes 'pho ba na/ /yi dags rtags su shes par bya/ /chu gnas dud 'gro rnams kyi rtags/ /rtags su yang dag rab shes bya/ /chu min bu gar ye shes 'gro/ dmyal ba rtags su shes par bya/ /de ltar
16b6(rgyud 'grel): ye shes 'pho ba yi/ /rnam pa'i cha ni shes byas nas/ /sgrogs pa lnga yi yi ge yis/ /steng gi sgo bdun dgag par bya/ /chu yi sgo ru sUM gis dgag /chu min k+ShuM gis dgag par bya/ /de ltar sgo dgu bkag nas kyang/ /rim pa
16b7(rgyud 'grel): 'di yis rang sems kyis/ /gnas ni rab tu btsal byas pas/ /dbyings nyid du ni des par 'gro /phung po skye mched khams rnams su/ /rnal 'byor rgyud kyis dpyad pa ltar/ /rnam par bsgom byas ye shes so/ /gong na med pa rtogs par
17a1(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur/ /bdag nyid ji skad gsungs pa bzhin/ /lha yi lus su gyur byas la/ /chos kyi dbyings dang rnam shes dang/ /bdag nyid sangs rgyas skur byas pa'i/ /gnas ni ri'i sna tshogs pa'i/ /kha dog sna lngas rab brgyan
17a2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i/ /rdo rje rtse mo dgu pa mchog /bdag gi spyi bo'i steng du ni/ /bsams nas de ru rang gi sems/ /rdo rje dkar po bcu tshal tsam/ /rtse lnga bsams nas brtag par bya/ /yang gyi rtse lnga thabs lnga ste/ /de bzhin mar bltas shes
17a3(rgyud 'grel): rab lnga/ /dbus kyi bum pa ri bong can/ /bsams nas de ru ye shes che/ /ser po byang chub sems 'dra ba/ /'dzag pa'i dang tshul dang 'dra ba/ /thig le tsa na ka yi 'bru/ /lnga 'byor tshad du bsgom par bya/ /de nas chos
17a4(rgyud 'grel): kun thams cad kun/ /med par bsams nas bdag dmigs te/ /bdag kyang bdag la thim byas nas/ /sems tsam de yang mda' bzhin du/ /spyi bor rdo rje 'og cha yi/ /pu gur zhugs nas thig le thim/ /de ni de bzhin
17a5(rgyud 'grel): gshegs pa rnams/ /lha mo rnams kyi rang bzhin gyi/ /gnas su shes par rab tu bya/ /de ni gdod nas grub pa'i gzugs/ /de ru shes pa rab zhugs pa /sems de yang dang yang du gzung/ /de las sems de yar ba ltar
17a6(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje rtse dgu steng cha yi/ /bu gur byung nas sna tshogs kyi/ /pad+mar zla ba gnas pa la/ /rdo rje sems dpa' i skur gyur te/ /mtshan dang dpe byang kun brgyan pa/ /rgyan kun brgyan pa'i na bza' dang/ /bral nas shin tu gsal
17a7(rgyud 'grel): dmigs te/ /de gnyis med pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /byin brlabs las byung 'khor lo che/ /rnam par 'phro zhing 'du bar bsam/ /de ltar rnam par bsgom pa mchog /yang dang yang du ci nus bsgom/ /bsam pa de yi rkyen
17b1(rgyud 'grel): gyis ni/ /bdag sems can dbyings su zhugs pa'i tshe/ /gsal zhing rab dga' mkha' 'dra rtogs/ /de nas rdzu 'phrul thug ldan pa'i/ /lo lnga lon pa'i byis pa'i gzugs/ /'grub tshe dpe med pa de rdzogs rtogs/ /de las skye gnas gzhan du na//
17b2(rgyud 'grel): 'phan par byed tshe sprul pa'i gzugs/ /yang dag du ni rtogs par 'gyur/ de lta bas na sems can gyi/ /bsam pa gang dang gang dag gis/ /mi rnams yid ni yang dag sbyong/ /de dang de ni mdo bzhin du/ /sna tshogs nor bu lta bur 'gyur/ /chos
17b3(rgyud 'grel): sku rab dga' mkha' mnyam pa/ shi dang brgyal dang gnyid log dang/ /glal dang 'khrig dus skad cig ci/ /myong bar 'gyur bas rab bsgoms na/ /lus can rnams ni yid ni sbyong/ /chog ga 'di yis sems can gang/ /mtshams med byed cing
17b4(rgyud 'grel): rmongs pa yi/ /skye bo bram ze gsod pa yang/ /de yis mi 'grub pa cung zad med/ /de bas bka' lung rab thob nas/ /dam sdom rnam par bsrung byas te/ /sku gsum 'grub par the tshom med/ /gal te sku gsum ma grub na/ /rig pa 'dzin
17b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i gtsor 'gyur te/ /rim gyis phyag rgya chen por 'gyur/ /de ltar rnam pa gsum gyis ni/ /dngos grub de ni bsgom pa bshad/ /gang zhig 'di ni ma rtogs par/ /gsang ba smra bar byed pa ni/ /de la nga dang de bzhin gshegs/ nam zhig de
17b6(rgyud 'grel): la sbyar byas pas/ /byin gyis rlob par mi byed do/ /'di ni don ldan 'ga' zhig la/ /nga ni de yis lus gnas te/ /bsgrub pa gzhan la mchod pa len/ /de yis de mnyes rang gi rgyud/ /las kyi sgrib pa dag byed do/ /'di don rna par 'pho
17b7(rgyud 'grel): byed pa/ /gang gi dus su gnas pa der/ /sangs rgyas bstan pa rin chen yang/ /gnas par rab tu bshad pa yin/ /brgyud pa'i rim pa 'di chad nas/ /sangs rgyas bstan pa nub pa ru/ /kun gyis rab tu shes par bya/ /de bas khyod kyi yid
18a1(rgyud 'grel): gcig tu/ /yang dag bsdus la ma 'ongs pa'i/ /gang zag mngon du tshogs bskyed pa'i/ /skal ldan 'ga' la rnam par brgyud/ /sim byed 'di la sbyor du chug/ 'di sbyor 'di ni yang dag pa'i/ /rnal 'byor pa du shes par bya/ khyod
18a2(rgyud 'grel): kyang zas kyi spyod pa dang/ nga la cung zad 'khrul rtogs pas/ /khyod kyi tshe 'di nyid la ni/ /gzugs bcas phung po rang lus ni/ /gnas ni yang dag mi 'gyur te/ /rnam par shes pa mi shigs pa/ /phyag rgya chen por rab tu 'grub/ /de bas khyod kyis yang
18a3(rgyud 'grel): dag blos/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi 'dus pa'i rgyud/ /gsang chen gsang la ches gsang ba/ /gong na med pa'i lung chen po/ /'di yi rim pa dang po yi/ /sgrub pa'i thabs dang sbyin sreg dang/ gtor ma sna tshogs 'khor lo dang/ /bsdus pa dang ni
18a4(rgyud 'grel): rnam bshad dang/ /dkyil 'khor mchog la sogs pa/ /mi shes mun sgrib sems can gyi/ /thur ma lta bur brtsam par gyis/ /de bas ma 'ongs rnal 'byor ches/ /'di shes bla ma rab mnyes te/ /yang dag 'dod pas blangs byas nas/ /sems ni de
18a5(rgyud 'grel): nas sbyang bar bya/ /sems ni kun rtog rnam spangs nas/ /de sbyong de la rig pa skye/ /rig pa skyes nas rdo rje 'dzin/ /de grub pas na sangs rgyas dang/ /pha rol phyin dang gzungs rnams dang/ /sa rnams thams cad bde chen po/ /rjes las yang dag 'grub par 'gyur//
18a6(rgyud 'grel): thams cad bde chen las byung phyir/ /de bsgoms ci phyir de mi 'byung/ /de bas rab tu 'bad pa yis/ /mchog de nyid rab gsang gsang/ /smon lam gyis kyang tha na 'grub/ /bsgrub pa la ni shin tu 'bod/ /a la la la ho/ /de ltar rol ba'i
18a7(rgyud 'grel): gar bcas sgra brnyan lta bu rdo rje'i glu /'khor lor bcas pas de nyid glu blangs bdag la bstod cing der/ /nam mkha' i khams su sprin rnams med pa lta bur thim par 'gyur/ /dge slong bla ma gnyis bcas de yang de bzhin mi snang 'gyur/ /rdo rje
18b1(rgyud 'grel): gdan gyi 'gab nas rgyang grags lnga bcu song ba'i sar/ /par pa ta yi phug la brten te sems can don bya'i phyir/ /'di bsdus rab tu byed pa thams cad rtsom dang ston sogs byas/ /dam pas gsol ba rgya chen btab pas bdag ni shin tu brod/ /der gnas 'khor
18b2(rgyud 'grel): bcas rnams kyi yo byad gos zas nor gyi mdzod/ /mchod pa'i yo byad rgya chen sna tshogs 'khor lo bya ba rnams/ /sa bcu'i byang chub sems dpar gyur pa mdzod gsungs gnod gnas che/ /nyin re karSha pa Na bdun brgyas rtag tu rab tu sbyor/ /de nas bla ma chen po
18b3(rgyud 'grel): b+ha li ba twI drung du bgrod/ /bdag gis bla ma de yang mnyes bya'i phyir na sgrub pa'i thabs/ /cung zad bsdus pas de ru bla ma la sogs kun/ /mnyes bar byas te sngon gnas bgrod nas skal ldan don dga' byas/ /de bas de ltar kun gyis gtam rgyud rgyas
18b4(rgyud 'grel): par shes byas te/ /mkhas pa'i gzu po dam pa thabs kun gyis ni mnyes byas ste/ /de yi lung la rab tu byed sogs mnyam dang bsam par bya/ /de la rab brten dgon sogs rab tu brten byas rang gi sems/ /de nyid bsgoms pas ji bzhin
18b5(rgyud 'grel): rab tu rtogs par byas pa yis/ /tshe 'di nyid la zla ba drug gis byang chub thob pa 'di ni su yis bzlog /bdud rtsi mchog 'thung 'di ni sems can kun gyis bkur ba'i gnas/ /sems chen de la rdo rje 'chang dang bder gshegs kun gyis
18b6(rgyud 'grel): bsngags/ /de'i phyir log pa'i sgribs pa thams cad sa bon nyams byas te/ /'khor bar gnas kyang skyon gyis mi gos par bzhin rtag tu gnas/ /de ru ma thob lan grangs gzhan la yang dag myong ba yi/ /'bras bu smin byed sngags pa'i
18b7(rgyud 'grel): yid la yang dag 'byung ba yi/ /dngos grub rgya chen thob nas gang+gA'i bye snyed dpag med kyi/ /'khor gyis bskor nas 'jig rten khams kun thams cad rab tu bgrod/ /de bas chu 'khor drag po bar lhung ltar/ /lus dang ngag dang sems kyi
19a1(rgyud 'grel): brtson 'grus bskyed/ /rim par sngon bzhin rab tu bsgrub par bya/ /dal 'byor lus 'di shin tu g.yo bla bas/ /ji ltar rlung gis mar me gsod pa ltar/ /skad cig tsam du mi sdod dus 'da' byed/ /de bas 'dir ni chud gsan mi bya ste/ /dngos
19a2(rgyud 'grel): kun de nyid mchog chen rang bsgom bya/ /de nyid spyod pa 'di la blo nges pas/ /ji skad bshad bzhin rab tu 'gyur bas na/ /sems ni yang dag bstan par gyis shig ces/ /bdag ni sems can rnams la gsol ba 'debs/ /gang gi phyir
19a3(rgyud 'grel): na 'di na gsang bas na/ /bdag gis gsal bar ma byas ci yod pa/ /des na de shes bla ma yang dag par/ /mnyes byas de nyid 'dod pas yang dag long/ /'di ni rnal 'byor spyod pas yang dag spyod pa la/ /snying po'i snying po 'bras gsol yang dag
19a4(rgyud 'grel): sbyong/ /mdza' yi par son bla chen yon tan ma lus brten/ /de las 'di ni yang dag zhal rnyed byas/ /de bas rnal 'byor chen po rgyud kyi don rnams ni/ /mi mtsham par ni snang yang nyi ma'i dpes/ /rang dang gzhan gyi don phyir nus pas na/ /rnal
19a5(rgyud 'grel): 'byor 'gas ni shin tu 'bad dgos so/ /the tshom som nyi med par dang pa yis/ /'di don grus pas yang dag blangs byas nas/ /shes rab kyis ni yang dang yang du rang/ /spyad pas bdag la gnyis med ye shes che/ /chu gtsang nang du
19a6(rgyud 'grel): zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ltar/ /'byung 'gyur 'di la the tshom ma byed cig /'di ni rang bzhin grub pa'i man ngag las/ /brgyud pa'i bla ma yang dag rab brten dang/ /rang gi bsod nams tshogs ni sngon bskyed pas/ /rtogs par rab tu 'gyur ba
19a7(rgyud 'grel): ma rtogs par/ /bsod nams chung ba'i mi yis bskal pa dpag med par/ /'di ni rtogs par mi 'gyur 'di don ma rtogs na/ /rnal 'byor chen po zhes bya ba de la mi bya'o/ /de ltar rab tu shes par byas nas su/ /rdzogs pa chen po ye shes spyi yi gzugs
19b1(rgyud 'grel): yongs su dag sku rdo rje 'chang chen po/ /dpal ldan kun gyi ngo bo rims gnyis 'dis/ /sdug bsngal lam bcas bskal ba gsum du yang/ /rang gi rjes mthun byang chub bla dang bcas/ /thob nas de bde cung tsam rab chags pa/ /rnal 'byor 'di yis ci phyir de mi bsgom
19b2(rgyud 'grel): dad dang brtson 'grus ting 'dzin shes rab dang/ /dran pa'i blo yis gong gi rim pa ltar/ /yid dga' i gnas brten kun tu bzang po mchog /lam 'di bsgom par bya ba kho na'o/ /de ltar zhal gyi lung bsdus las byung dge ba dri med pa/ /kha
19b3(rgyud 'grel): ba zla ba'i 'od ltar rab tu dkar ba de yis ni/ /'di don ma 'ongs 'gro ba skal ldan 'ga' dang phrad gyur nas/ /rab tu dang ba'i dad pas len cing 'di mchog rab bsgoms shog /blugs dang gtor dang dag par byas pas slob dpon cher
19b4(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur te/ /thams cad kun gyi rgyud 'dzin gzhan rnams rgyud kun la sbyor ba'i/ /dang po'i rim pa rab rtogs ni ma rnams ni dag byas te/ /ye shes sgyu ma'i snod du rung bar rnal 'byor de 'gyur shog /snying rje ldan pa'i bla ma'i zhabs la pus
19b5(rgyud 'grel): par rab ldan pas/ /ri bong 'dzin pa'i gzugs kyis rang rgyud rab tu smin byas te/ /zhing dag byas pas chos kun sgyu sogs don du rab rtogs nas/ /byams pa la sogs bzhin du sems can kun gyi 'gro bar shog/ //lhan cig byed
19b6(rgyud 'grel): pas byin brlabs rje btsun thugs rje chen po yis/ /dga' ba rnyed pas chos kun dag pa'i ngo bo chen po mchog /ji bzhin gnas pa'i don la mi bslu bcu drug thig le cha/ /ngal gso las thob man ngag chen po rab tu rnyed par shog /de rnyed de la
19b7(rgyud 'grel): sems ni yang dag rab tu mgu 'gyur bas/ /mgrin pa dma' bas brtags nas rang rig chos kyi sku ni yang dag thob/ /sku dang gsung dang thugs dang dpag med sprul pa'i gzugs kyis ni/ /khams gsum bkang nas sems can thams cad
20a1(rgyud 'grel): srid las sgrol bar shog/ //rim pa gnyis pa'i de kho na nyid bsgom pa zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi zhal gyi lung/ dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon chen po lha sangs rgyas dpal gyi ye shes zhabs kyis
20a2(rgyud 'grel): bsdus pa/ zhal nas zhal du brgyud pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po ka ma la gu hya dang/ /bod kyi lo tsa ba chen po lha ye shes rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// //
20a3(rgyud 'grel): !/ (/sangs rgyas ye shes kyi zhal snga nas kyi sgrub thabs kyi man ngag zhal gyi lung bzhugs so//) // */ /rgya gar skad du/ mu kha A ga ma/ bod skad du/ zhal gyi lung/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dpal ldan ral gri
20a4(rgyud 'grel): las byung gur gum mdog /zhi ba'i zhal gsum phyag ni drug ldan zhing/ /shes rab kyis 'khyud chu skyes la zhugs pa'i/ /dpal ldan 'jam pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal nas/ /dpal ldan 'dus pa'i rim pa'i gzhung lugs kyi/ /sgrub thabs
20a5(rgyud 'grel): bdag nyid dran phyir brtsam par bya/ /'jam dbyangs bde bar rtogs pa'i don du ni/ /rtog pa'i nga rgyal bde ba dang bral ba/ /sgra yi tshogs kyi sdeb sbyor bral dgongs pa/ /sbas rnams slob dpon zhabs kyis 'gro don du/ /gsal bar sgra
20a6(rgyud 'grel): ji bzhin du bshad don to/ /sdeb sbyor yangs shing mtshan nyid dang bral zhing/ /gang yang don zab tshad mas shin tu sbas/ /blo dman rnams kyis de rtogs mi 'gyur ba'i/ /dpal ldan ye shes zhal bshad sgrub thabs kyi/ /man ngag shin
20a7(rgyud 'grel): tu gsal bas bshad par bya/ /'bad pa chen pos bla ma mnyes bya ste/ /shin tu sdug sogs khyad 'phags sbyin pa dang/ /gzhan yang mchog tu gyur pas mchod byas na/ /'dir ni 'dod pa'i bka' drin ster bar 'gyur/ /chu yi
20b1(rgyud 'grel): dbang dang cod pan ming dang ni/ /rdo rje dril bu zhes ni bshad pa dang/ /bum pa zhes bya mchog tu gsang ba dang/ /shes rab zhes bshad lung bstan brtul zhugs dang/ /dbugs dbyung de rnams cho ga ji lta bar/ /rjes snang thob cing bla ma 'jam dbyangs dang//
20b2(rgyud 'grel): sngags pas bsrung ba'i thabs dang dam tshig dang/ /rtag tu sdom pa la gnas mngon ldan pa/ /yang dag thob cing sa phyogs gtsang mnyam pa/ /yid du 'ong zhing chu yis chags chag btab/ /dri bzang nyi zla chu dang sman rnams kyis/ /rab byugs me
20b3(rgyud 'grel): tog chal bar bkram pa dang/ /gla rtsi gur gum tsandan gyis mdzes pa/ /yang na sems kyis 'dir ni rnam par bsam/ /bde ba'i bstan la rdo rje skyil krung bcas/ /sems can la brtse ting 'dzin dang por bsgom/ /ji srid pa 'di sangs rgyas ma lus
20b4(rgyud 'grel): gyur/ /de srid bdag gis skyil krung gzhig mi bya/ /ma lus 'gro tshogs sangs rgyas rnam bya zhes/ /de ltar smon lam khyad 'phags gdab par bya/ /'gro ba rgyu dang mi rgyu thams cad dang/ /rang lus stong pa nyid du bsgom bya ste/ /rang lus lha yi ngo bo nyid
20b5(rgyud 'grel): du 'od gsal ba/ /rang gi sems tsam las byung ba lta bar bya/ /gang yang 'di ltar yi ge oM dang por/ /swa b+hA ba shud+d+ha sarba d+harmA/ /swa b+hA ba shud+d+ho nyaM gsang sngags rgyal/ /mdza' thugs brjod cing 'dir yang de 'og tu/ /rang gi snying gar a las zla
20b6(rgyud 'grel): ba bsgom/ /de dkyil 'od zer tshogs ni ser po maM/ /khams gsum mun pa'i tshogs ni 'joms byed pa/ /rnam thar rnam gsum gyi sgo dag par 'gyur/ /oM shU n+ya tA zhes dang por rnam par thar/ /gzhan ni a mri ta ra zhes su bshad/ /oM a pra ti hi taM
20b7(rgyud 'grel): sgra de rnams/ /'dir bdag ye shes la sogs zhal gsum 'dod/ /des ni lha mig dag pa thob gyur nas/ /de las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong/ /sna tshogs gzhal yas khang byas dbus gnas pa'i/ /bla ma mgon po nam mkha' la gnas
21a1(rgyud 'grel): mchod/ /snying po'i sa bon gyis spros 'od zer tshogs/ /las byung gzugs sogs dgu po'i bdag nyid dang/ /me tog la sogs phyi rol rang gi mgon/ /'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten gyis mchod bsam/ /rdzogs sangs 'khor lo'i spyan sngar?
21a2(rgyud 'grel): sa la ni/ /pus btsugs dman pa'i sems kyis thal sbyar byas/ /dkyil 'khor mgon po mchod pas rab mchod cing/ /sdig pa gshags pa la sogs brjod par bya/ /bdag gis lus dang ngag dang yid kyis kyang/ /chags dang zhe sdang rnam par rmongs pa yis//
21a3(rgyud 'grel): srid pa nyam nga rnams su sdig bgyis pa/ /des na sdig de thams cad rab tu bshags/ /sdig pa bshags pa'o/ /sngon chad byas pa'i sdig pa bshags nas kyang/ /slar yang de la 'jug par mi bgyid cing/ /byang chub snying po la gnas gyur gyi bar/ /rtag tu bdag
21a4(rgyud 'grel): bsod nams blo ldan shog /sdom pa'o/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas mgon byang chub sems dpa' mchog /'phags pa gzhan gyis dge ba gang bgyis pa/ /de la'ang bdag ni byang chub 'bras thob par/ /ma lus pa la bdag ni rjes yi rang/ /rjes su yi rang
21a5(rgyud 'grel): ba'o/ /legs par gsungs chus bran pa'i bsod nams kyi/ /myug ni bdag gis rim thob 'phel ba yis/ /'khor ba'i gdung bas bcom pa'i dgro rnams la/ /yang dag byang chub shing bcos 'bras bcas 'gyur/ /yongs su bsngo ba'o//
21a6(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs sangs rin chen rang gi sems gnas dang/ /rtog pa'i dra ba rab tu rnam bral chos/ /sa dbang sogs dang brtul zhugs dbang dge 'dun/ /rab tu dang pas rtag tu skyabs su mchi/ /gsum la skyabs su mchi ba'o/ /sdug bsngal tshogs kyis
21a7(rgyud 'grel): bsregs pa'i sems can kun/ /snying rje ldan pas byung kun gtong ba ni/ /dam chos chu char rab bsregs 'joms pa yi/ /sangs rgyas sgrub ces rang sems bskyed par bya/ /byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'o/ /sbyin pa la sogs bya bas skabs
21b1(rgyud 'grel): byas te/ /'das pa'i rgyal ba'i sras rnams kun gyi lam/ /gshegs dang gshegs 'gyur 'jig rten 'das pa yi/ /dpal 'bras lam mchog de la bsten par bgyi/ /lam la brten pa'o/ /rgyal dang bdag nyid la skyes de rnams la/ /kun nas kun tu bdag nyid
21b2(rgyud 'grel): bdag gis dbul/ /sems dbang mchog gis bdag nyid yongs bzung bas/ /dang bas khyed la 'bangs su mchi bar bgyi/ /bdag nyid dbul ba'o/ /glo bur nyon mongs tshogs chen gyis gdungs pa/ /bskyed pa'i skye bo mdza' med dgrol pa'i phyir/ /
21b3(rgyud 'grel): chos kyi bdud rtsi sngags rnams bshad pa ru/ /sman mchog mgon po la ni bdag bskul lo/ /bskul ba'o/ /mchog tu mi dge bsam pas rab bcom pa'i/ /bdud kyi skye rga na dang 'chi ba las/ /mya ngan 'das bzhed gyur pa spangs nas su/ /mgon mchog
21b4(rgyud 'grel): bzhugs par bdag ni gsol ba 'debs/ /gsol ba gdab pa'o/ /tshigs bcad rdzogs byas legs zhes brjod nas ni/ /thub dbang tshogs rnams de nas mi snang gyur/ hUM bsgoms nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /nam mkha' a dza ni ri'i mdog ldan pa/ /de
21b5(rgyud 'grel): byung sna tshogs rdo rje'i nyid dkyil gnas/ /de las gtso bo'i sa bon 'od ldan pa/ /de las sna tshogs rdo rje'i sprin tshogs kyis/ /phyogs rnams thams cad char gyis yongs su gang/ /de las phyogs brgyad rdo rje rang bzhin char/ /rab 'bab de yis dra bar
21b6(rgyud 'grel): sprul pa dmigs/ /des ni sa bdun 'og la sogs 'phel nas/ /srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar du mda' rnams so/ /steng gi sa bon gyur bas skad cig la/ /sna tshogs rdo rje yi ni bla re byung/ /'od zer de tshogs mda' dang 'dru ba yis/ /nam mkha' khyab par kun tu gdugs
21b7(rgyud 'grel): su gyur/ /yaM las byung ba'i rlung ni 'og tu bsam/ /gzhung byas 'od sngon rgyal mtshan gyis ni mtshan/ /b+he ram pa zhes bya ba dum bu min/ /'gro ba'i snying po 'dzin 'gyur bzhag par bya/ /dbus su gru gsum 'bar ba rab dmar ba/ /raM gyi
22a1(rgyud 'grel): sa bon las byung phyogs gzhu 'dren/ /mthong nas de'i dbus su mtshams bcing bya/ /baM dkar las byung ba yi bum mtshan chu/ /de dbus lam las byung ba'i mdog ser po/ /ra ba'i don du gru bzhi dbang gi'o/ /hUM gis sna tshogs rdo rje byas sa phyogs//
22a2(rgyud 'grel): de dbus ra bar rnal 'byor pa yis bya/ /'di ni zhing rnam par dag pa'o/ /brum ser las byung 'khor lo rtsibs bcu pa'i/ /rtse mo'i 'od zer phyogs bcur spro bar bya/ /rtsibs rnams thams cad kyi ni lte ba'i phyogs/ /paM byung pad+ma'i steng du ra skyes nyi/ /legs gsungs rgyal
22a3(rgyud 'grel): ba rnams kyi skyed byed yam/ /bruM byung ye shes rnams ni gang yin nyid/ /sdug bsngal la sogs bcu gcig rnams kyi phyir/ /nyi ma nyi ma'i steng du hUM dgong bya/ /ye shes bcu gcig bcas 'dir 'khor lo la/ /nyi ma la gnas hUM byung rdo rje sngo/ /lte ba'i pad+ma
22a4(rgyud 'grel): nyid byung rdo rje las/ /dpal ldan rdo rje hUM mdzad sku ru gyur/ /yan lag kun ni dbu ma'i zhal dang 'dra/ /g.yas pa dkar zhing g.yon pa'i zhal yang dmar/ /shin tu 'jigs pa'i phyag drug 'jigs pa'i spyan/ /'jigs pa'i bskal pa'i sprin 'dra sgra sgrogs pa//
22a5(rgyud 'grel): rig ma kun tu bzang mos yang dag 'khyud/ /phyag gnyis kyis ni yan lag yongs su sdems/ /g.yas gnyis rdo rje ral gri 'dzin pa dang/ /zhags pa lcags kyu lag pa g.yon gnyis 'dzin/ /g.yas pas u ma'i nu ma'i dkyil mnan cing/ /g.yon
22a6(rgyud 'grel): pas bde 'byung dregs pa'i mgo bo gnon/ /de bzhin zhabs kyi g.yas brkyang bzlog pa yis/ /gnas pa'i mgon po sku ni rab tu sgeg /rtsibs re re la nyi ma bcu gnas pa'i/ /hUM byung mtshan ma 'dzin pa spro bar bya/ /bsdus na tho ba dbyug pa pad+ma dang/ /rdo
22a7(rgyud 'grel): rje de rnams dbang sogs phyogs gnas bskyed/ /skor phyogs su ni lcags kyu dbyug pa mdung/ /rdo rje me la sogs pa'i mtshams su bskyed/ /'khor lo dgra sta gnyis ni steng 'og tu/ /skyed par byed de khro bo'i zhal ljang dgod/ /gshin rje mthar byed gzhan gyis mi thub
22b1(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /rta gdong bgegs kyi tshogs ni rnam par 'joms/ /Tak+ki dbyug sngon dang ni stobs po che/ /khro bo mi g.yo gtsug gtor gnod mdzes rgyal/ /gnyis ni dkar po rtag gdong dmar po ste/ /de bzhin gtsug gtor 'khor lo sgyur ser po/ /bdun po gzhan dag kyang ni shin tu sngo//
22b2(rgyud 'grel): kun kyang nyi ma'i dkyil gnas rab tu grag /g.yas pa'i pus mo'i tshig ni shin tu bskums/ /g.yon pa'i brla dang rje dar gnyis rab brkyang/ /sna tshogs pad+ma nyi ma'i steng du gnas/ /phyogs dbang lus ni ji lta ba bzhin mnan/ /be ta lya dze dri khro gnyer ral pa gcig /g+ho na
22b3(rgyud 'grel): skul byed se bzang mchog chen po/ /mud gzhags pa gshin rje mthar byed sogs/ /de rnams bcu po mnyam du lha mo bstan/ /'khor lo'i gtso dang gtsug gtor gnod mdzes dang/ /de bzhin mi g.yo 'dod pa'i rgyal po lnga/ /sma ra med cing de rnams cod pan ldan/ /yan lag
22b4(rgyud 'grel): rin chen rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan/ /shin tu mdzes pa'i 'od sngon gyen du 'byung/ /khro dang bcas par bzhad pa'i zhal gsum ni/ /mche ba cung zad btsigs shing spyan rnams dmar/ /shin tu mig zlum mi g.yo ba la sogs/ /yangs lta brdal brtan chos kun 'jigs med
22b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /gshin rje mthar byed gzhan gyis mi thub pa/ /dbyug sngon dang ni de bzhin rta mgrin dang/ /stobs po che dang bgegs mthar byed bcas pa'i/ /drug po mig ser gzhan yang shin tu drag /drag por lta bas sdang ba thams cad 'dul/ /gsus pa 'phyar zhing thung la
22b6(rgyud 'grel): mig? kyang zlum/ /shin tu lce bskyod khro gnyer 'jigs la drag /smin ma g.yo zhing spyan bgrang zhal mche btsigs/ /khros pas rnam 'jigs ha ha zhes bzhad pa/ /smin ma sma ra ser zhing skra ser spya/ /cod pan med cing rus pa sprul gyis brgyan/ /rked pa'i phyogs su
22b7(rgyud 'grel): stag gi pags pa mnabs/ /skad cig gis ni 'gro ba za mthur ldan/ /drag po 'di rnams mgo bo'i cod pan ni/ /rigs ldan dang ni mdza' yas mdog gnag gyur/ /'jog po zhes klu gser gyi mdog 'dra ba/ /de bzhin du ni sna cha dag tu 'gyur/ /de bzhin
23a1(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma zhes pa gser gtso'i mdog /'di rnams kyis mdzes mgul pa'i do shal gyur/ /stobs rgyu pad+ma'i rtsa ba 'dra dkar ba/ /thugs rje ldan pa rnams kyi mchod phyir thogs/ /pad+ma dmar po 'dra ba'i nor rgyas bu/ /'od dpag dag gi rgyu ru bcing byas te/ /? dang?
23a2(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma dmar dang dkar ba gnyis/ /pad 'dra pad+ma'i rkang gdung gnyis su byas/ /g.yas phyogs su ni 'khor lo myur bar 'khor/ /khro bo'i tshogs de rnams ni mi 'gul lta/ /rtsibs rnon po yis yongs bcad dum bu yi/ /nyon mongs sa phyogs bdud rnams slar mi skye/ /dkon
23a3(rgyud 'grel): mchog gsum la 'di ru sun 'byin 'gyur/ /de la gtso bo gnod mdzes kyis sngags kyis/ /da ni rnam par bzlog nas phyir phyogs su/ /khro bo'i tshogs de rnams ni bskyod par byas/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): uSh+NI Sha badzra tsakra barti sarba lo ki ka lo kot+ta ra yan+t+ra/ tan+dza mu la pra yo
23a4(rgyud 'grel): gI dI ni ma ma kri te ye na ke na tsi ta krita tA ni tA ni/ b+hinda b+hinda/ tshinda tshinda/ mu ru mu ru/ ku ru ku ru/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ kaM pa ya kaM pa ya/ bi d+hwan sa ya bi d+hwan sa ya/ sha ta sa ha srA/ bi tsur+NA ya bi tsur+NA ya/ uSh+NI Sha bi dza ya tsakra barti bruM hUM/
23a5(rgyud 'grel): da nas ji skad bshad pa'i bsgom pa'i rim pa yis/ /dgongs ka lan gsum sngags 'di bzlas par bya/ /sdad par sems par byed pa de yi ni/ /de nyid kyi 'grub 'gyur te the tshom med/ /gshin rje mthar byed la sogs rang sprul pa/ /phyogs
23a6(rgyud 'grel): bcur gnas pa'i drag po sgro bar bya/ /de rnams kyis kyang sna tshogs yongs khyab pas/ /bgegs dbang rnams kyis mgul nas thag pas bcings/ /oM suM b+ha'i sngags ni zhal bzhi pas/ /phyogs bzhi dag tu brjod nas bsrung bar bya/ /yongs su
23a7(rgyud 'grel): bsrungs nas khro bo'i tshogs sprul pas/ /shin tu khri dang bcas pa'i ldad mig gis/ /gtso bo'i rdo rje tho ba dbyug sogs kyis/ /rang gi lus kun rab tu brdung bar 'gyur/ /mdun du zhags pas drangs shing bsdams nas ni/ /sna tshogs sa la gdong yang sbyar
23b1(rgyud 'grel): par byas/ /de nas 'od 'bar rdo rje phur bu yis/ /de steng rang gzugs ji lta bzhin du sprul/ /bsdus nas 'khor lo'i gtso bo'i bka' thob nas/ /khro dang bcas pa'i gnod mdzes lus kyis ni/ lag pa g.yon pa kun tu 'od ldan pas/ /snying rje med par khu tshur gyis
23b2(rgyud 'grel): bsdams te/ /bgegs tshogs de rnams mgon pos bsdus nas ni/ /phur bu gdab/ oM g+ha g+ha g+ha ta ge na dang/ oM badzra la sogs bzlas pa'i tho ba yis/ /nam mkha' bsdams shing khro drag lta stangs kyis/ /lag pa g.yas pas shin tu brdung bar bya//
23b3(rgyud 'grel): yongs su bsrung ba'i cho ga rdzogs so/ /de nyid gsum gyi sa bon dkar dmar gnag /mgo dang zhabs su ho ser gnyis dkyil bcug /nam mkha' i phyogs nas nor bu bzhin lhung ste/ /kha yi nang nas nang du rab tu zhugs/ /de nas snying rje ldan pas gzugs brtag pa/ /
23b4(rgyud 'grel): dngos po smig rgyu dbang po'i gzhu rang bzhin/ /bsgoms nas bdag med rang bzhin bsams nas ni/ /shU n+ya la sogs sngags rnams brjod par bya/ /ma rig pa'o/ /skad cig de la kha yi nang du zhugs/ /'khor lo 'byung bas zla ba'i gzugs su gyur/ /de dbus hUM las byung
23b5(rgyud 'grel): ba'i rdo rje dmar/ /zla hUM rdo rje las byung kun tu bzang/ /zhal gsum de rnams kyi ni gnyis 'gyur phyag /zhal ni gangs ri'i mdog 'dra gnag dang dmar/ /rdo rje ral g.yas nor bu pad+ma ga-yon/ /phyag gnyis kyis ni rang gi rig ma 'khyud/ /g.yas pas g.yas min
23b6(rgyud 'grel): brla yi rgyu ba mnan cing/ /g.yon pas g.yas pa yongs su mnan pa yis/ /sna tshogs pad+ma la ni skyil krung bcings/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas bcas 'og steng phreng ba 'phro/ /kun tu bzang las byung ba'i chos kyi dbyings/ /rdo rje gsum stong dkar po'i gru gsum
23b7(rgyud 'grel): ste/ /hUM ser gyis sprul zab mo dbus su ni/ /paM ser de las byung ba'i sna tshogs pad/ /pad steng kham ljang de las byung ba yi/ /sna tshogs rdo rje phyogs bcur rigs 'od 'gyed/ /rdo rje'i steng byung 'khor lo dkar po rtsibs bcu gnyis/ /rten 'brel las
24a1(rgyud 'grel): ni kun tu 'byung ba yi/ /phyag g.yas 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad kyis mtshan pa'i/ /rig bcas rnam par snang mdzad blta bar bya/ /kun tu bzang po'i rang gzugs ji lta bzhin/ /'di yi 'od zer mkha' dbyings rnam spros pas/ /mnar med me chen la sogs rnam par
24a2(rgyud 'grel): zhi/ /sems can rnams kyi 'dod pa phun tshogs grub/ /de bsdus bdag nyid zla ba sa bon la/ /spro bsdu yang byas las byung sangs rgyas sku/ /sna tshogs rigs kyi bye brag tha dad pa'i/ /rgyal ba'i sku las byung ba'i sna tshogs 'od/ /mthu yis de la dkyil 'khor dag tu gyur/ /zur bzhi pa
24a3(rgyud 'grel): la shin tu mdzes par byas/ /de la sgo rnams de bzhin rta babs khyams/ /zla ba dra phyed rin chen mdzes rnams dang/ /rlung gis skyod pa'i ba dan dril bu dang/ ye shes dam pa bsod nams tshogs gnyis kyi/ /gtso ma'i gser gyi rang bzhin bum pa bzang/ /mdzes pa rnams kyi nang dang
24a4(rgyud 'grel): phyi rol bzhag /rdo rje rdo rje phyed pa rtse lngas brgyan/ /sna tshogs g.yer ka dril bu'i sgra rnams dang/ /me long dang bcas rnga yab rnams kyis brgyan/ 'khor lo rin chen chu skyes ral gris mtshan/ /ka ba brgyad can de ni rnam dgu ldan/ /sgo yi phyogs gnyis kyi ni ka ba ni/ /ri dags
24a5(rgyud 'grel): gnyis dbus chos kyi 'khor lo'o/ /rdo rje 'dzin pas 'khor lo byas shing zlum/ /de yi phyi rol kun tu 'od tshogs 'khyil/ /'du byed do/ /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun rnam par rag pa'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /nyi shur gcig gis mtshan de rnams kyi/ paM las byung
24a6(rgyud 'grel): ba'i sna tshogs pad+ma'i gdan/ /'gro ba ma lus nye bar 'khrul bas na/ /rnam par dag pa'i pad+ma'i gdan rnams yin/ /raM las byung ba'i nyi ma bdun du gyur/ /oM las byung ba'i rgyal pa'i zla bcu gnyis/ /nyon mongs thams cad nges par bsregs pa'i phyir/ /rnam par dag
24a7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i nyi ma bdun du gyur/ /bsod nams kun gyi myu gu bskyed pa'i phyir/ /zla ba'i gdan rnams dag ni byung ba yin/ /dbus su zla ba dbang po'i phyogs suAng zla/ /yongs su lhag pa'i phyogs suAng nyi ma gsum/ /zur bzhi mtshan suAng zla ba'o/ /rdo rje phreng bas bskor ba nye bar mdzes//
24b1(rgyud 'grel): phyi rol zur bzhi dang ni mtshams rnams dang/ /shar gyi sgo yi g.yon dang g.yas gnyis su/ /so so so so yi ni zla ba'i gzugs/ /sgo rnams de nyid du ni nyi ma bzhi/ /de bzhin dbus su zla ba'i steng du ni/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gnyis ni rnam par bsgom/ /g.yon pa'i zla 'dir yi ge
24b2(rgyud 'grel): bcu drug sogs/ /g.yas pa'i zla gyur ka sogs ha mthar thug /zla bcas de la wa ya la gsum dang/ /a ka pa o de la rab tu sbyar/ /de dag rnams ni nyis 'gyur rnams su bya/ /gang gyur de gnyis A li kA li zla/ /lugs su byung dang lugs las bzlog par bshad/ /dbyangs
24b3(rgyud 'grel): yig rnam dkar phreng ni gnyis su gyur/ /pha rol gsal byed rnams ni 'di ru dmar/ /de gnyis dbus su raM ni rnam par bsam/ /zhu bas gnyi ga gcig gyur 'od kyi tshogs/ /'od tshogs hUM byung hUM las rdo rje dmar/ /de yi dbus su zla gyur sa bon steng/ /zla hUM rdo rje las byung
24b4(rgyud 'grel): zla dbus su/ /ye shes rang bzhin las byung rdzogs par gyur/ /sku la sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan 'chang zhing/ /dpe byad bzang po brgya bcus yang dag spras/ /me long ye shes la sogs nang du ni/ /sngags rnams lnga po 'di dag legs par sbyar/ /oM sogs tsi ta pra ti pya d+haka/ /nga sri mdza' 
24b5(rgyud 'grel): mar? de bzhin legs par brjod/ /kun gzhi rnam par shes pa gzhan gyur pa/ /zla gnyis 'dus gyur pa yi rnam snang mdzad/ /me long ye shes rang bzhin de gcig go /nyon mongs yid kyi rnam shes gzhan gyur pa/ /'od tshogs gang yin de yang rin chen 'byung
