24b6(rgyud 'grel): de ni ye shes gnyis pa mnyam nyid gyur/ /rnam par rtog pa'i shes pa gzhan gyur pa/ /hUM byung rdo rje 'dzin pa 'od dpag med/ /so sor rtog pa'i ye shes 'di gsum pa/ /'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa gzhan gyur pa/ /rdo rje'i dbus kyi sa bon don yod grub/ /
24b7(rgyud 'grel): bya ba nan tan grub 'di bzhi pa yin/ /rang gi rnam par shes pa gzhan gyur pa/ /ye shes rnam bzhi rang bzhin gang yin gcig /de ni ye shes lnga par 'di ru bshad/ /spro dang bsdu ba thams cad las byung ba'i/ /rnam dag gnyis med chos dbyings rdo rje sems
25a1(rgyud 'grel): zhal gsum dbus dang yan lag thams cad dkar/ /g.yas dang g.yon gnyis zhal gnyis sngo dang dmar/ /rdo rje ral gri g.yas na rin chen pad+ma g.yon/ /phyag gnyis kyis ni rig ma 'khyud pa'o/ /nyes pa thams cad 'bigs pas rdo rje ste/ /las dang ma rig kun
25a2(rgyud 'grel): gcod phyir ral gri 'gro ba thams cad kyi ni bsam pa rnams/ /yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir ni rin chen no/ /'dod chags dang ni zhe sdang 'dam kun gyi/ /ma gos par gyur pa'i phyir ni pad+ma'o/ /'di ni rang gi don phun sum tshogs pa'o/ /srid gsum 'jig rten de ni nang
25a3(rgyud 'grel): gnas shing/ /dngos po thams cad ro gcig chos kyi dbyings/ /rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi yum/ /mtshan ni rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma/ /'dod chags la sogs kyis gdungs chus khengs pa'i/ /'gro ba chu bo bzhi yis kun tu bdas/ /nga rgyal la sogs
25a4(rgyud 'grel): dba' rlabs pha rol dogs/ /thag ring klong du las kyi rlung gis shin tu bdas?/ /byams pa phun sum tshogs pa'o/ /sems can 'khor bas gdungs pa mthong nas ni/ /snying rje'i ting 'dzin rgya cher bskyed par bya/ /thabs dang rig pa dgyes pa'i dgra rnams kyis /
25a5(rgyud 'grel): mkha' la sangs rgyas sems can dgyes pa bskyed/ /'od zer dra spros pas ni drangs pa'i mgon po rnams/ /kha yi dra bas nang du gzhug par bya/ /zhu gyur rdo rje lam byung gsang byung 'gyur/ /phyi na gnas pa'i lha mo rnam pa dgu /rim bzhin spos dang bdug pa
25a6(rgyud 'grel): mar me dang/ /dri dang de bzhin me long la sogs lnga/ /mchod pa bya phyir lag na thogs par blta/ /lha mo rnams dang rang nyid rdo rje sems/ /dang po spyan la sogs pa spro bar bya/ /gzugs la sogs pa lha mo kun kyang 'byung/ /slar bcug thams cad rdo rje lam
25a7(rgyud 'grel): byung nas/ /pad+ma sgo ru nges par 'bab 'gyur te/ /gsang ba'i lte ba'i zla dbus gzhug bar bya/ /'od zer de byung bshad pa'i dkyil 'khor nyid/ /bskyed nas srid pa gsum na gnas pa yi/ /sems can gang yin thams cad gzhug par bya/ /snying rje phun sum
25b1(rgyud 'grel): tshogs pa'o/ /rdo rje bcom nas pad+ma legs phye ba'i/ /de yi 'od kyis sangs rgyas spyan drangs nas/ /khar gzhug rdo rje lam ni byung gyur pa/ /rgyal ba la sogs zla ba zhus dbang bskur/ /mig la sogs pa drug dang gzugs rdo rje/ /spyan la sogs dang bde bar gshegs
25b2(rgyud 'grel): pa lnga/ /de bzhin gzhan yang khro po bzhi rnams dang/ /de dag rnams ni rang gi gzugs su gyur/ /dga' ba phun sum tshogs pa'o/ /stong gsum chen po'i 'jig rten khams gnas gyur/ /phyi rol sems can gzhan dag dga' med par/ kE la sogs pa'i sa bon gyis spro ste//
25b3(rgyud 'grel): de rnams thams cad byang chub la gzhol byas/ /gzhan gyi don rgyan sum tshogs pa'o/ /sems can don du smon lam byas gyur pa/ /gang yin de ni bdag gis yongs su bkang/ /'gro ba mya ngan 'das par 'dul don phyir/ /stong pa nyid du rab gzhug bzhed par gyur/ /rnam par
25b4(rgyud 'grel): shes pa'o/ /gtang snyoms yongs su ste rdzogs pa'o/ /oM dang A(rgyud 'grel): hUM dkar zhing dmar dang gnag /'od zer ho gnyis kyi ni dbus gnas pa/ /kha yi nang bzhugs pad+ma'i dbus gnas te/ /mgon po rig ma gnyi ga zhu bar byas/ /'das dang ma byon pa dang da ltar gyi/ /sems
25b5(rgyud 'grel): can dag tu gyur pa gang cung zad/ /de rnams rgyu gang gis ni yongs grol ba'i/ /mgon po bzhugs pa stong nyid rab zhugs gyur/ /gang rnams thog ma med pa'i dus dbus bsgom/ /thog med dus mdza' nas ni mi g.yo ba'i/ /tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi gzugs kyi
25b6(rgyud 'grel): lha mo rnams/ /rdo rje thugs khyod la sogs pa bzhi yis/ /rang gi glu rnams kyi mi yang dag bskul/ /rdo rje rdzogs la stong nyid yang dag spangs/ /mi bsam snga ma'i dkyil 'khor bzhin du gyur/ /sna tshogs pad+ma'i 'dab ma'i gdan dbus su /zla ba bcu gnyis dang ni nyi
25b7(rgyud 'grel): ma bdun/ /de dbus pad+ma zla ba'i gdan dbus su/ /maM las byung ba'i ral gri rnam par bsam/ /ral gri steng du yang ni zla maM ste/ /ral gri zla maM las byung 'jam rdo rje/ /ming dang gzugs so/ /rang gi zhal dang rang gi gur gum mdog /g.yas pa sngo zhing
26a1(rgyud 'grel): zhing g.yas pa ni na pa dkar/ /ral gri mda' dang utpal gzhu rnams shing/ /de yi phyag gnyis shes rab kun tu 'khyud/ /shes rab rnam dag ngo bo ral gri ste/ /chos rnams 'bigs par byed pa nyid kyis ni/ /rnam par dag pa'i thabs kyi ngo bo mda'/ /sems can
26a2(rgyud 'grel): thams cad tshim par byed pas na/ /utpal sngon po nyes kun gnyen po dang/ /yon tan thams cad 'dzin par byed pa'i gzhu/ /rnam pa sna tshogs mchog rnams kyis brgyan cing/ /yid du 'ong ba'i rin chen mchog gis brgyan/ /sangs rgyas sngar byas bdag nyid
26a3(rgyud 'grel): lus la spro/ /ri rab bzhin du mi g.yo dpal gyis mdzes/ /rang gi sa bon dkyil 'khor dbus su 'am/ /yang na gzhan ci 'dod pa'i cho gas mgon/ /de nyid kyis ni gnas su gyur pa ste/ /dkyil 'khor dbang po de yi gzugs 'dzin 'gyur/ /gzung ba dang ni 'dzin pa'i
26a4(rgyud 'grel): sems nyid med/ /oM d+harmA d+hA tu la sogs sngags brjod de/ /brjod pa tsam gyis rdzogs par gyur ba ni/ /de 'dir bsnyen pa'i yan lag rdzogs byas pa'i/ /mig gnyis nad dang rna ba sna dang lce/ /yan lag dam pa drang dang zla gnas drug /kAM dzraM de bzhin khaM gaM de nas
26a5(rgyud 'grel): yaM/ sh+raM saM yi ge drug nyid rnam par bsgom/ /'khor lo rdo rje rin chen pad+ma dang/ /ral gri dang ni rdo rje rim bzhin du/ /phyag mtshan de rnams yang dag byung ba dang/ /mtshan ma de rnams dbus su zla sa bon/ /phyag mtshan zla ba sa bon bcas byung ba'i/ /yan lag sa bon dkyil 'khor
26a6(rgyud 'grel): gyis brgyan rig /drug bo brla gnyis rdo rje skyil krung gis/ /zla bcas sna tshogs pad+ma kun tu gnas/ /sa dbang rdo rje'i dbang po lag na rin/ /'jig rten dbang phyug sgrib sel kun tu bzang/ /dkar dang sngo dang de bzhin ser dang dmar/ /ljang dang skya dang gzhan yang de la
26a7(rgyud 'grel): sogs/ /sa yi dbang phyug gzugs kyi rdo rje 'khyud/ /rdo rje dbang po yang ni sgra rdo rjes/ /nam mkha' i snying po'i dri yi rdo rjes 'khyud/ /'jig rten dbang phyug dang ni ro yis te/ /sgrib pa rnam par sel ba reg pas 'khyud/ /chos kyis 'khyud pa yang ni kun tu bzang/ /de rnams
26b1(rgyud 'grel): bcu gnyis phyi nang dbye ba las/ /skye mched de rnams rnam par dag pa'o/ /gzugs rdor la sogs lha mo de dag rnams/ /gang yin phun tshogs skye mched dkyil 'khor gnas/ /de dag rnams la 'khyud 'gyur de bzhin du/ /bzlog pas gnas tshe thams cad de bzhin 'gyur/
26b2(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin rtag tu bsgom pa bsgom bdag nyid/ /skad cig la ni mngon shes drug thob 'gyur/ /pha rol phyin drug rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor par/ /gyur te nye pa yi ni sgrub pa rdzogs/ /reg pa'o/ /rdo rje gsum rdzogs nges par gnas don gru /zla gsum snying ga
26b3(rgyud 'grel): lkog ma mgo por yang/ /brang dang lkog ma'i bar du bzhi pa dgod/ /sna tshogs pad+ma rgyas pa'i dbus gnas pa'i/ /hUM gis rdo rje las byung thugs rdo rje/ /a yi pad+ma las byung khyad 'phags dag/ /oM gyi 'khor lo yis ni sku rdo rje/ /maM gis ral gri las byung 'jam ?
26b4(rgyud 'grel): ?/ /chos dang longs spyod rdzogs pa sprul pa yi/ /sku gsum rnam par grol ba'i bdag nyid de/ /nges dbyings ye shes rang bzhin bzhi po'o/ /sngon po dmar po dang ni dkar dang ser/ /dpal ldan thugs kyi rdo rje'i phyag rgya che/ /dag ? sku 'khyud chos phyag rgya/ /de ba'i sku yi rdo rje'i ??
26b5(rgyud 'grel): 'jam dbyangs nyid 'khyud dam tshig phyag rgya'o/ /de rnams bzhi po zla ba'i 'od kyis brgyan/ /rdo rje'i skyil krung gis kyang shin tu gnas/ /phyag rgya rnams kyi so so'i dbus su ni/ /'di ltar bsgom par bya zhes la la 'chad/ /de rnams kyi ni dbus su 'di lta yang//
26b6(rgyud 'grel): raM baM yaM laM la sogs yi ge dgod par bya/ /'di rnams bzhi po rdzogs par gyur pa dang/ /me chu rlung dang dbang gi dkyil 'khor rnams/ /dmar po gru gsum dkar zhing zlum pa dang/ /gzhu 'od sngon po ser po gru bzhi pa'o/ /mdung dang bum pa ba dang rdo rje yis
26b7(rgyud 'grel): go rim ji bzhin de rnams mtshan par 'dod/ /dkyil 'khor/ de yi dbus su rang sa bon/ /dmar ba phyag mtshan zla ba la gnas nyis 'gyur bya/ /mdog dang phyag mtshan rnams dang gdan la sogs/ /thugs rdo rje dang 'dra bar de rdzogs bya/ /rig ma spangs shing
27a1(rgyud 'grel): phyag gnyis zhal gcig ste/ /cod pan mtshon cha rgyan med de rnams ni/ /sngar gsungs dkyil 'khor rnams kyi dbus su ni/ /rnam par bsgom par bya zhes gzhan rnams 'chang/ /sems kyi 'od zer tshogs las rang byung ba'i/ /shes rab yan lag gis
27a2(rgyud 'grel): 'khyud gsal ba'i thugs/ /rgyal ba'i dbang po'i zhing rnams yang dag mchog/ rang gi lus ngag yid gsum byin gyis brlab/ /dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang zhes thugs brjod de/ /chos kyi gsung lam zhes bshad gsung brjod de/ /de bzhin dpal ldan rdo rje
27a3(rgyud 'grel): 'chang sku ste/ /de ltar sngags brjod 'di ni sgrub yan lag /sngags spangs brjod/ de sems kyi dbang bskur te/ /dpal ldan ye shes sems dpa' rtag tu bskul/ /gang phyir 'di ni rdo rje 'dzin rgyad gsungs/ /shes rab rno can de rnams kyis
27a4(rgyud 'grel): rab sgrub/ /tshor ba'o/ /bdag gis bdag snying ye shes 'od tshogs kyis/ /mkha' bzhugs rgyal ba ma lus yang dag bskul/ /de yi lus nas? byung ba'i 'od zer las/ /gzugs sogs rdo rje rab byung gzhan yang ni/ /dpal ldan mA ma kI dang
27a5(rgyud 'grel): gos dkar can/ /sgrol ma zhes bya lha mo de rnams ni/ /rnga yi sgra ldan rnams kyi sgra sgrogs shing/ /byug pa la sogs me tog phreng thogs shing/ /gser gyi bum pa ye shes chus gang ba/ /bkra shis bum pa lag thogs glu rnams kyis//
27a6(rgyud 'grel): rang gtso cod pan thogs shing mkhas dkyil gnas/ /mchog tu dbang bskur bar ni dbab par bya/ /bab 'gyur de nyid las ni byung ba yi/ /mi bskyod rdo rje cod pan dag tu gnas/ /mthong na shin tu sems ni rnam dag par/ /gyur pa de nyid
27a7(rgyud 'grel): sgrub pa chen po'o/ /srid pa'o/ /rig ma mtshan mchog yon tan kun ldan pa/ /rang gi sa bon las byung kun tu rtags/ /dkyil 'khor mngon sum du ni rab tu bzhag /de la bsnyen pa la sogs des byas bdag/ sa snying la sogs rnams kyis
27b1(rgyud 'grel): gang bar blta/ /sku la sogs pa'i yi ge gsum gyi lus/ /de 'dir chos la sbyar bar gyur pa yis/ /glo bur las byung lus ni kun tu dgang/ /mgo snying lte ba rked pa brla gnyis su/ /oM hUM swA A(rgyud 'grel): hA zhes go rim bzhin/ /de rnams mdog ni bye brag shes nas ni/
27b2(rgyud 'grel): rnam dgod rigs lnga ru ni rab tu bya/ /a las byung ba'i gsang ba'i lte bar ni/ /hUM las sna tshogs pad+ma 'dab brgyad kyi/ /nor bu oM dang rang gi rdo rje hUM/ /sbubs gnyis su ni yi ge phaT bsgom bya/ /de 'og oM sarba ta thA ga ta zhes/ /a nu rA ga na 'khyud gnyis
27b3(rgyud 'grel): su bya/ /len pa'o/ /de nas sngar bshad dbang bskur shes byas nas/ /rig dang lhar cig 'di ru dga' bar bya/ /srid pa'o/ /dang po bsnyen pa'i yan lag de nas nyer sgrub pa/ /sgrub pa'i yan lag chen po la sogs kyang/ /rtul po la sogs sbyor byas
27b4(rgyud 'grel): ?so sor? ni/ /'gyur te bzhi ru yang ni bshad par grags/ /rtul sogs rgyu mthun rnam smin skyes bu byed/ /dbang gi 'bras bu rnam par bzhi ru bzhag /bsnyen pa'i yan lag nas brtsams bya ba nas/ /thabs las byung ba'i bya ba rnam pa bzhi/ /shes
27b5(rgyud 'grel): rab kyis 'gyur de bzhin cho ga rnams/ /bsnyen pa'i yan lag la sogs dbang skur mdza' / /rgyu mthun la sogs bcas pa dbus kyi ming/ /yan lag bzhir 'gyur dang po'i sbyor ba'o/ /snying gi'i zla dbus gnas pa'i sngags 'od kyis/ /rgyal
27b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i dbang po'i sku la ma lus gzhug /bde ba chen po las byung byang chub sems/ /hUM rdor las byung dkyil 'khor dkyil dbang dgod/ /skye ba'o/ /dwe Sha ra ti bcas pa'i thugs rdo rje/ /in+d+ra nI la bcas byas lus 'char zhing/ /zhe sdang rdo rje
27b7(rgyud 'grel): ngo bo sna tshogs pad+ma la/ /bzhugs pa'i badzra d+h+rika ni zla dbus su/ /rga shi'o/ /bruM 'khor las ni dzina dzika gtso ba/ /rnam par snang mdzad gti mug 'bras rang bzhin/ /zla ba bye ba yi ni 'od gsal ba/ /shar phyogs zla dbus mo ha ra tir bcas/ /oM
28a1(rgyud 'grel): gyi rin chen las byung gser gtso'i 'ong/ /rin dbang mgon po badzra ra ti bcas/ /nga rgyal gtso bo ratna d+h+rika ces pa/ /'di gdan nyi ma'i steng bzhugs lho phyogs su/ /dzriM gi pad+ma las byung mtshal mdog 'od/ /'dod chags la bzhugs mgon po 'od dpag
28a2(rgyud 'grel): med/ /rA ga ra tis dam 'khyud a ro lika/ nyi ma'i gdan la bzhugs 'gyur nub phyogs su/ /khaM gi ral gri las byung mdog mchog ljang/ /phrag dog rang bzhin de yang don yod grub/ /nu ma gnyis bsten badzra ra tir bcas/ /pradz+nyA d+h+rika ces byang phyogs nyi dbus su/ /ye
28a3(rgyud 'grel): shes lnga phung rnam par dag pa'o/ /lam gyi 'khor lo las byung mtshams su ni/ /rnam par snang mdzad mdog 'dra zla dkyil nas/ /sgeg pa'i cha byed rgyal la rab tu chags/ /mo ha ra ti gang yin de nyid spyan/ /maM gi utpal dmar po'i phyag mtshan byung/ /mi bskyod pa 'dra
28a4(rgyud 'grel): gshin rje'i phyogs zla dbus/ /rtag tu dang po'i sangs rgyas thabs gcig sbyor/ /dwe Sha ra ti mA ma kI gzhan min/ /paM gi pad+ma las byung zla dbus su/ /snang ba mdza' yas mdog 'dra rlung gi phyogs/ /pad+ma'i mgon po yis ni kun tu 'khyud/ /gos dkar gang yin rA
28a5(rgyud 'grel): ga ra ti 'ang de/ /taM gi utpal gser las byung gyur pa/ /rin dbang 'od 'dra badzra ra ti sgrol/ /dpal ldan phyogs su zla ba la gnas shing/ /don yod rdo rje'i yan lag gis 'khyud byas/ /'byung ba chen po bzhi rnam par dag pa'o/ /phyi rol byung nas me yi phyogs su ni//
28a6(rgyud 'grel): skor phyogs de nyid kyi ni nang du 'ang/ /zla ba drug dbus rang gi phyag mtshan rgyu/ /'od ldan yi ge drug po mthong nas ni/ /mtshams de rnams su dza hUM baM ho dang/ /khaM raM shar gyi sgor gyur phyogs gnyis su/ /me long pi paM dkar po dri dung chos/ /ro yi snod
28a7(rgyud 'grel): yang sna tshogs gos mkha' dbyings/ /sa bon bsams pa'i mtshan ma de mthong nas/ /gzugs rdo rje sogs lha mo de rnams drug /de rnams sa bon la sogs mdog 'dra zhing/ /lus la rtag tu de nyid gsum bsam bya/ /pha rol phyin drug rnam par dag
28b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /raM hUM nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa/ hUM gi sa bon mtshan byung khro ba'o gzugs/ /ji skad bshad pa'i khro bo'i tshogs nang gnas/ /bsgom bya de rnams rtag tu g.yas brkyang bzlog /mya ngan 'das srid rnam dag g.yas brkyang ba'o/ /gshin rje mthar byed dbang po zhes bya'i skor
28b2(rgyud 'grel): shes rab mthar byed nyi ma la skyes phyogs/ /pad+ma mthar byed klu yi gtso bo'i phyogs/ /bgegs mthar byed ba rnams thos phyogs na gnas/ /dad pa la sogs pa bzhi rnam par dag pa'o/ /gshin rje mthar byed de'i ba ta 'i/ /shes rab mthar byed gzhan gyis mi thub ma//
28b3(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma mthar byed lhan cig khro gnyer can/ /dgegs mthar byed pa ral pa gcig mar dmigs/ /ma lus 'khor lo sna tshogs pad+ma la/ /nyi zla'i dbus su ji lta ba bzhin bzhugs/ /zhi ba'i gzugs can gang yin 'dir lha rnams/ /de rnams thams cad rdo rje ba skyil krung
28b4(rgyud 'grel): gyur/ ting 'dzin chen po thob pas shin tu zhi/ /bdud rnams bzhi las mchog tu rgyal gyur pas/ /rnam par dag pa'i rdo rje skyil krung ngo/ /sangs rgyas sogs gzhan lha mo rnams bcas pa/ /dgyes pa'i brtson 'grus rtsom pa rnam par sbyar/ /dbus na gnas pa'i dkyil
28b5(rgyud 'grel): 'khor gtso bo yi/ /zhal 'di rnams kyi zhal ni nges par blta/ /rigs rnams dang bo'i rigs ni rdo rje'i rigs/ /de bzhin gshegs dang rin chen rigs gsum pa/ /de nas pad+ma'i rigs ni bzhi ba ste/ /sna tshogs rigs ni la lar las kyi rigs/ /sngon po la sogs gang yin
28b6(rgyud 'grel): mdog lnga yang/ /de mdog tha dad pas ni rigs rnam lnga/ /sems can bsam pa tha dad mdog tha dang/ /rigs las rang byung sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku/ /de rnams yan lag mchog rnams gsum gyis brgyan/ /sku gsung thugs ni rnam dag zhal gsum pa'o/ /sngon po dkar
28b7(rgyud 'grel): po gnyis kyis g.yon pa dmar/ /g.yas pa gnyis mdog rnam par zlog pa'o/ /ser po dang ni dmar po ljang gu'i sku/ /g.yas min dang ni g.yas pa dkar dang sngo/ /rigs kyi lha mo 'di dag rnams kyi ni/ /zhal gyi mdog rnams kyang ni so sor gyur/ /de rnams phyag drug 
29a1(rgyud 'grel): dang ni yang dag ldan/ /gtso bo phyag gnyis kyis ni mtshon cha spangs/ /lag pa gnyis kyis rdo rje khu tshur ni/ /so so so song nges bcings de 'og tu/ /mthe'u chung rtse mo lcags kyu'i gzugs kyis ni/ /lag pa gnyis kyis mkhrig ma gnyis ni sbyar/ /gnas
29a2(rgyud 'grel): ldan gang yin la ni phyi rol gyis/ /de yi phar dbus 'dug 'gyur des mgul phyogs/ /g.yon ba'i nang du lag gnyis phyi rol gyur/ /gcig la gcig 'khyung phyag rgya bcing bar bya/ /pha rol phyin drug rnam dag phyag drug po/ /bak te ne bka twaM pa ri tsum pa
29a3(rgyud 'grel): ma na/ /dan+te shwa na taM pa ri g+hi sha ma na/ /thabs dang rig pa'i yan lag mi phyed par/ /dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i rgyal po'i rnam par bsgom/ /ngo bo nyid kyis rnam dag 'khyud pa'o/ /gang yang phyag mtshan mchog las byung gang yin/ /mtshan ma mchog de lag pa
29a4(rgyud 'grel): g.yas su ste/ /phyag gsum thams cad la ni ral gri'o/ /ral gri las byung 'khor lo 'dzin 'gyur te/ /rin chen rigs kyi g.yon pa pad+mar gyur/ /de bzhin pad+ma rigs kyi rin chen te/ /'di gnyis kyi ni gsum par 'khor lor gyur/ /gzhan rnams kun
29a5(rgyud 'grel): gyi lag pa nor bu pad/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par dag pa dang/ /shes rab pha rol rnam dag phyag mtshan no/ /rgyal ba lnga po rnams kyi ral pa'i tshogs /'dir ni de rnams bye brag gcig yong 'gyur/ /zhi ba rnams ni rin 'bar cod pan thogs/ khro
29a6(rgyud 'grel): bo rnams ni sbrul gyis sku brgyan cing/ /dpung pa lag ngar rked pa rkang pa dag /mgrin pa dang ni rna ba mgor thogs pa/ /'od ldan nor bus spras pas gser gyis bcings/ /ji lta ji ltar yan lag rgyan gyis brgyan/ /thabs kyis gyur pa gang yin shes rab kyi
29a7(rgyud 'grel): phyag dang mdog dar mtshon cha gos 'byung ba/ /gnas dang gnas pa nyid kyi gang dang gang/ /de rnams kyang ni bar gyur pa yir gyur/ /dkyil 'khor 'di ni gsang 'gyur rnam par bsam/ /byung nas de yang go rim ji lta bzhin/ /yig gsum badzra d+h+ri ka
29b1(rgyud 'grel): sogs sngags rnams kyis/ /dam tshig la sogs pa dang thabs gcig bya/ /mi bskyod rdo rje snying gar thugs rdo rje/ /rab zhugs nam mkha' dang mnyam ngo bo nyid/ /rnam par snang mdzad la sogs gzhan rnams kyang/ /gsang ba'i nang bshad gang yin phyogs rnams su'o/ /de dbus sngags kyi
29b2(rgyud 'grel): 'od zer rnam byur nas/ /gshin rje mthar byed ltar gyur nam mkhar gnas/ /rdo rje lcags kyus 'khor lo drangs nas ni/ /de nas mdun kyi dkyil 'khor dag tu bya/ /rdzogs nas yon chab mchog bkang pad+ma'i snod/ /lag pa gnyis kyis kun tu bzung nas kyang/ /de nas
29b3(rgyud 'grel): lag pa g.yon pas ba dan bzung/ /lag pa g.yas pa yis ni tsan dan na mdzes/ /me tog chu sogs kyis mdzes bdud rtsi lnga/ /rang gi snying sogs zlas pa'i mchod pa 'bul/ /gshin rje mthar byed la sogs thams cad kyang/ /ji zhes lhag par smra zhing srung bar byed//
29b4(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin khro gzhan rang gi las kyi mdza' / /hUM baM ho bcas pa yi sgra sgrog shing/ /gzhan gyis mi thub pad+ma bgegs mthar byed/ /rab bzhugs cing pa dang ni dgyes par byed/ /zhes pa'i bar gyur 'di ltar lhag bsnyen pa/ /lhag pa'i rgyu mthun 'bras bu dang lhan cig/
29b5(rgyud 'grel): de nas thams cad kun tu dgyes pa dang/ /mig la sogs pa'i yan lag byin gyis brlab/ /sku sogs tshig gsum gyis ni byin brlabs te/ /dbang bskur byas pa'i dus kyi mdza' bar gnas/ /de rnams rim gyis gnas pa'i bar du ni/ /lhag pa'i 'bras bu gsum
29b6(rgyud 'grel): bcas yan lag go /rang gi sems las kun 'byung 'od chen 'phros/ /nam mkha' i rgyal dang rig na kun nas dangs/ /nam mkha' khyab par gdan la bzhugs par gyur/ /rang gi bdag po bcings nas cod pan bcings/ /gshin rje mthar byed pad mthar rdo rje gzhan/ /khro bo
29b7(rgyud 'grel): bgegs sgra rang gi dkyil 'khor gnas/ /nga rgyal bzhi po sems bdag 'jam dbyangs bcas/ /kun tu bzang dang phyag na rdo rje dang/ /dpal ldan rdo rje sems dpa' chos dbyings dang/ /dpal ldan dwe Sha rang bcas sgra rdo rje/ /'di rnams cod pan rdo rje mi bskyod pa/ /
30a1(rgyud 'grel): mi bskyod rdo rje'i steng du rdo rje sems/ /sa snying sku dbang dang na gzugs rdo rje/ /gshin rje mthar byed mo ha ra ti rnams/ /'di rnams kyi ni spyi bor rnam snang bzhugs/ /mkha' snying dri yi steng du rin chen tog /dag rdor 'jig rten dbang phyug dri dang ro
30a2(rgyud 'grel): pad mthar phyin rnams cod ban 'od dpag med/ /reg rdor sgrib sel badzra ra ti rnams/ /spyi bor yang ni don yod grub pa bzhugs/ /rang gi sa bon pad+ma'i nang gnas pa'i/ /'od kyis kyang ni phyag rgya lnga drangs nas/ /kha yi nang zhugs gsang ba'i dbus gnas
30a3(rgyud 'grel): te/ /zhu nas pa las gzugs la sogs par gyur/ /sku rdor la sogs mtshan ma de lha mo/ /me long sogs gang yin de las byur spros/ /gzhan yang phyi rol me tog gdug spos sogs/ /de rnams nam mkha' la ni gdums bzhin gyur/ oM
30a4(rgyud 'grel): sarba ta thA ga ta dang/ /pU dza la sogs sgra yi sngags brjod cing/ /mi bskyod rdo rje la sogs tshigs bcad lnga/ /brjod nas de nas mdun du rnam bsam pa/ /yi las byung ba'i 'od sngon gzhur byas nyid/ /rgyal mtshan gyis mtshan rlung gi dkyil
30a5(rgyud 'grel): 'khor la/ /de nas ri byung shin tu mdog dmar pa'i/ /gru gsum gyen nas me yi tshogs kyis mnan/ /de nas me yi steng du 'od dmar aM/ /de las byung ba'i pad+ma'i snod mchog bsam/ /rnam pa bco lnga rdzas kyis yongs gang ba'i/ /bdud rtsi lnga la
30a6(rgyud 'grel): sa bon lnga rnams kyis/ /oM hUM zla ba gnyis ni mkha' dkyil gnas/ /zhu nas de yi nang du lhung bar gyur/ /skol bas oM ni tshur gyur kun tu blta/ /hUM gi sa bon las byung rdo rje nang/ /rdo rjes dkrug pas rnam par zhu gyur pa/ /yi ge hUM bzlas ye
30a7(rgyud 'grel): shes bdud rtsir gyur/ /de las gzhan pa yi ni snod rnams kun/ /thams cad rang gi lag na thogs par spro/ /lce yi rtse mor hUM byung rdo rje dkar/ /snying la gnas pa'i dkyil 'khor 'khor lo rgyal/ /thams cad kun tu chim par bsam par
30b1(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /dkyil 'khor dam pa'i mchog 'gyur ting 'dzin no/ /gang yang 'jam dbyangs rdo rje thugs ka yi/ /sems dpa' i snying po las byung 'jam ral gri/ mi las byung ba'i sems kyi me bsgoms te/ /rdo rje gsum sku dang yang gnyan por byung/ /de?
30b2(rgyud 'grel): rnams snying nas rang mtshan sa bon las/ /byung nas ye shes 'od zer rab gsal ba'i/ /'od kyi ma lus sna tshogs kun tu gang/ /ye shes bdud rtsi rgyun gyis rjes song nas/ /'jig rten khams rnams thams cad rgal nas kyang/ /rnal
30b3(rgyud 'grel): 'byor bdud rtsi gzhan dang gzhan bsdus nas/ /'og tu gdong ltas nas ni de byung bas/ /skad cig gis ni 'jig rten gsum bcas rgyal/ /ma lus sna tshogs sangs rgyas nyid byas nas/ /'ongs nas spyi po'i nang du rab tu zhugs/ /lus kun tshim
30b4(rgyud 'grel): par kun tu gyur nas ni/ /thang gcig de la yang ba'i rang bzhin gyur/ /de nyid gsum mchod cho ga bzhin du bya/ /maM gi nang du rab zhugs rnam par blta/ /maM las byung gyur ral gri dbus su ni/ /zla gnas tsa na ka tsam thig ler gnas//
30b5(rgyud 'grel): de dbus dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor gyi dbang po/ /nyi shur gcig gis ma tshang de rnam dag /gang dang gang gis skyo med de bsgoms te/ /mngon sum byas nas thig le'i sbyor ba'o/ /rang gi lha yi sa bon las byung 'od 'phros pas/ /phyi
30b6(rgyud 'grel): rol gyi ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams/ /chos 'byung zhes bya'i sna yi rtse mor bzhugs/ /yang dag byang chub sems byung 'jam ral gri/ yang na 'khor lo pad+ma rdo rje 'am/ /nas kyi tshad dam zla ba'i dbus su ni/ /de yi steng du maM byung mdog
30b7(rgyud 'grel): lnga pa'i/ /yungs kar tshad tsam rin chen zur brgyad pa/ /rin chen 'bras bu ngaM las byas pa'i 'khor lo nyid/ /gang yin de gyur rnal 'byor shes mchog gis/ /rdo rje sogs mtshan de bzhin gshegs rnams kyi/ /de rnams nyid dang
31a1(rgyud 'grel): mtshan ma sbro bar bya/ /mtshan ma brtan por byas pas rtags na ni/ /'od zer du ba'i 'od dang de bzhin gzhan/ /me khyed 'od dang snang ba chen po ste/ /rim gyis mthar thug phra mo'i sbyor ba'o/ /rdub ba dang ni gnas dang ring du
31a2(rgyud 'grel): gyur/ /sdud dang gang ba dang ni 'dzin pa rnams/ /'ong ba dang ni rje dran sngon grub rnams/ /srog ma bsngams par gyur pa gang yin dge/ oM dang dbugs de mnyam du nang du zhugs /a'i sngags dang thabs gcig dbus na gnas/ /hUM gi mthar ni dang
31a3(rgyud 'grel): gi sgra dang ldan/ /bzlas pa kan dang mchu sbyar spang bar bya/ /de nyid sa bon las 'dir sangs rgyas spro/ /'od zer tshogs de nam mkhar song nas kyang/ /de nas byung ba'i lha mo de rnams kyis/ /dam tshig zhes bya'i 'khor lo mchod par byed/ /
31a4(rgyud 'grel): thams cad kun tu 'khyud par gyur pa dang/ /dga' ba'i dbang gis sangs rgyas rnams 'khyud 'gyur/ /de nas rang byas snying ga'i sems rdo rje/ /skad cig de la thub dbang zhugs par blta/ /gal te bsgoms dang bzlas pas skyo gyur na/ /
31a5(rgyud 'grel): rang gi snying ga'i de nyid rnams bsgoms pas/ /rigs ma'i tshogs 'ongs nas ni glu yi sgras/ /de dang de yis 'khor lo mchog sang byas/ /mgo bo pags pa'i mtho gang tsam du ni ma lus yongs su rdzogs pa'i zla ba dgod/ /bdud rtsi lnga rnams
31a6(rgyud 'grel): oM dang ldan pa ni/ /zhu bas skad cig de la rang lus bab/ /bsam bya gangs chu bsil 'dra bab gyur pas/ /ma lus skyo ba rnam par bsal bar bya/ /de nas thangs cig de yis ngal bsos nas/ /slar yang de yis gsang sngags bzlas
31a7(rgyud 'grel): brjod bya/ /gong du bshad pa'i dbang bskur mchod pa dang/ /stod pa la sogs smon lam mthar thugs brjod/ /byas nas gang dag gang rigs rab 'byung ba'i/ /de ni de dang de yi snying gar gzhug /de nyid gsum tshig gis ni byin brlabs
31b1(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /gnas nas thog med ye shes gnyis med tshul/ /de la gshegs gsol gleng bzhi de rnams ni/ /las rgyal mchog ces bya ba'i ting 'dzin no/ /de las langs nas ting 'dzin sbyor ba yis/ /bdag nyid chen por dang lha'i rnam pa gzung/ /snang ba tsam
31b2(rgyud 'grel): du yul de mthong nas ni/ /sku tshogs rdo rje bdag nyid dngos rnams dag/ /rang gi sa bon las byung yongs rdzogs pa'i/ /'khor lo rang gi snying zlar zhugs par bsam/ /raM las byung pa'i me yang bsgom par bya/ /zan zang gyur pa'i tshe na 'di skad
31b3(rgyud 'grel): gsungs/ /sngar bshad rlung dang me dang dgos dbus su/ /rdo rje la sogs cho ga bzhin byas nas/ /sku sogs lha rnams kun tu tshim par bya/ /nang gi bdag nyid kyi ni sbyin sreg las/ /mthar thug par yang sems kyi bya ba ste/ /phung po la sogs bud shing kun tu
31b4(rgyud 'grel): ldan/ /ye shes me 'bar ba yi phung po ni/ /bsreg pa gang yin de ni bla med bshad/ /ma lus 'dod pa yi ni cho ga nyid/ /de yis rang gi lha yi rnam par bsgom par bya/ /rang dang gzhan lus la yang kun tu mchod/ /sangs rgyas rnams bsten dam chog
31b5(rgyud 'grel): shin tu thog/ /rjes su mthun pa'i 'gro ba'i don byas shing/ /de bzhin gshegs rnams kun tu mchod par bsam/ /sems ni gcig tu mnyam par bzhag gyur pas/ /lus la sogs pa'i las rnams rtag tu bya/ /gang yang lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las
31b6(rgyud 'grel): dga' bas thams cad nyin mtshan rab byed pa/ /de yi sngags dang phyag rgya rab brtags par/ /sangs rgyas mchog rnams kyis ni rab tu gsungs/ /ji ltar dngos po gcig la rnam par rtog /dpag med 'byung 'gyur bud med mthong ba las/ /kyi dang 'dod pa can dang
31b7(rgyud 'grel): rang byung gsum/ /de dang sdug bsngal rnam par grol ba'i sems/ /lus la sogs pa'i dge dang mi dge'i las/ /gang phyir de ni sems kyi dbang gis gsungs/ /de bas rtag tu rnam rtog dra gcod pa'i/ /sems ni nag po'i las su mi 'gyur ro/ /dam
32a1(rgyud 'grel): tshigs nyams pas kham las byung ba yi/ /snying gar sna tshogs rdo rje yis bkod pa/ /kham las byung ba'i ral gri de nyid ste/ /sa bon 'di las byung ba'i don yod grub/ /sna tshogs pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa yis/ /gong gi go
32a2(rgyud 'grel): rim nyid bzhin thams cad bya/ /myur du dbang bskur bas ni nyes kun dang/ /'gro ba rang bzhin gyi ni dag par lta/ /phyi rol khrus la'ang cho ga 'dis bya'o/ /gang zhig thun mtshams nyams par gyur pa yis/ /des kyang cho ga 'di ni bya ba ste /ji
32a3(rgyud 'grel): lta ba bzhin nyes pa gsum 'byung gsungs/ /gang yang sna tshogs pad+ma'i dbus gnas pa'i/ /hUM las byung ba yi ni bgegs mthar byed/ /bdud rtsi zhes bya 'khor lo dbang bskur bas/ /'bad pas bgegs rnams thams cad gzhom
32a4(rgyud 'grel): bya ste/ /de ltar ting 'dzin gsum po bsgom bdag nyid/ /gang bsgoms pas ni shin tu skyo gyur nas/ /'khor lo rang snying nad zhugs rnam par bsam/ /rnal 'byor ldan pas rig mar ldan par nyal/ /rnal 'byor gnyid log ldang ba'i dus su ni/ /
32a5(rgyud 'grel): lha mo'i tshogs bkyil blangs pa'i glu yi sgras/ /myur ba'i kun tu langs nas yang byas te/ /sngar bshad pa yi mnyam par bzhag par bya/ /dngos grub mchen ma nye bar rtags nas ni/ /khang bzang ngos gnyis nas ni 'jig pa dang/ /dag
32a6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i gtsug lag khang rang sangs rgyas sku/ /rmi lam nu ma gzhan dang rgyal po mthong/ /de nyid gsum gyi cho ga bzhin mchod nas/ /dngos grub 'dod pa yis ni dkyil 'khor bya/ /rig pa 'dzin dang ri lu mig sman dang/ /bcud kyis len ni
32a7(rgyud 'grel): pa'am phyag rgya che la sogs/ /rta dang gser dang rin chen sa gzhi 'gro/ khrag dang bu dang bu mo du ma byin/ /bskal ba grangs med gsum la sogs pa yis/ /'dir ru la las sangs rgyas thob par 'gyur/ /gang yang bde ba chen
32b1(rgyud 'grel): po'i ting nge 'dzin/ /thams cad bsgoms pas bde bar nyer bsgoms nas/ /de steng sdig ba kun las rnam grol nas/ /skad cig gis te rdo rje 'dzin par 'gyur/ /bdag gis man ngag brtsams 'dir bdad pas/ /bla ma'i zhal gyi pad+ma las rnyed de/ /mkhas pa rnams
32b2(rgyud 'grel): gyis 'di la brtag mod gyis/ /'gro ba kun la phan phyir bdag gis byas/ /ji ltar log pa'i rdzun gyis byas pa yis/ /pha yi drung nas cung zad rnyed pa ltar/ /de bzhin bdag gis bsod nams cung zad rnyed/ /de nas 'jig rten 'jam pa'i rdo rjer shog
32b3(rgyud 'grel): dpal ldan u rgyan yul du ? can skyes shing/ /dpag med rgyud don ma lus rab mkhyen pa/ /dpal ldan rnam par dul zhi'i zhal snga nas/ /nga yis dbang bskur slob ma'i gtso bo mchog /de las sind+ha ngos su de skyes shing/ /rnam thos bsti gnas zhes bshad
32b4(rgyud 'grel): rgyal bzhugs nas/ /shAkya'i bshes gnyen bdag nyid sangs rgyas shing/ /de yis yongs bkrol zhal gyi man ngag go /dpal ldan u rgyan yul nas byung ba yi/ /sangs rgyas ye shes zhabs kyi zhal snga nas kyi sgrub thabs man ngag go rdzogs so// //
32b5(rgyud 'grel): lo ts+tsha ba dge slong khyung weng rin chen bzang pos bsgyur zhing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// //dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i sgrub thabs kun tu bzang po zhes bya ba slob dpon chen po sangs rgyas ye shes kyis mdzad pa'o// //*/ /rgya gar skad du/ sa man+ta b+ha dra nA
32b6(rgyud 'grel): ma swa d+ha ni/ bod skad du/ kun tu bzang po zhes bya ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs/ /bcom ldan 'das 'jam pa'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dpal ldan mi shes kun spangs dri med gzi brjid ldan/ /dpag med rigs kyi sprul pa rnams kyis dbu brgyan cing/ /shes rab yan lag
32b7(rgyud 'grel): 'dus pas 'bar zhing rnam mdzes pa/ /'jam dpal gad de mchod phyir de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dpal ldan 'dus pa'i gzhung lugs bshes gnyen ni/ /dram pa yis ni bskul phyir spyo byas te/ /'gro ba ma lus don ni phun tshogs pa'i/ /rgyur gyur
33a1(rgyud 'grel): cho ga bdag gis bshad par bya/ /ral 'byor 'di ni shin tu g.yo ba dang/ /'jig rten skye bo dam pa phrad rnyed dka' / /de bas shes rab thabs la gzhol ba yi/ /yid la byed pa'i mchog de bsgrub bar bya/ /de la sngags pa snying rje'i stobs kyis ni/ /
33a2(rgyud 'grel): byang chub mchog tu sems ni bskyed pa dang/ /gtong ba la sogs yon tan rnams kyis brgyan/ /zab mo'i tshul dag la ni lhag par mos/ /dpal ldan 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor cho ga yis/ /rang gi dbang bskur phun sum tshogs ldan zhing/ /cho ga bzhin du rjes gnang
33a3(rgyud 'grel): thob pa yi/ /blo dang ldan pas rang sngags mnyes par bya/ /la la dri med chu ni phun tshogs shing/ /shing mchog mdzes pas rnam par brgyan pa yi/ /ri bo'i phyogs gcig tu ni bcom ldan 'das/ /'jam dbyangs zhes bya de ltar rab bsgrub bya/ /dang por nang
33a4(rgyud 'grel): par snying ga'i zla dbus su/ /dri med 'od zer rab tu 'phro ba'i maM/ /de nyid zhes bya rnam bkod brtser ldan pas/ /sgo la sogs pa yang dag dag par bya/ /tsan dan bzang po la sogs kyis byugs shing/ /dri zhim me tog bcal bkram mchog
33a5(rgyud 'grel): gi cha/ /bsam gtan gnas su bde ba'i bstan la ni/ /gnas nas dus gsum bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/ /dmigs te sna tshogs mchod pa'i sprin rnams ni/ /dang por spro sogs blo ldan gyis bya zhing/ /dge ba rnams ni 'phel bar bya ba'i
33a6(rgyud 'grel): phyir/ /sdig pa dag ni bshags pa la sogs bya/ /gang zhig thog med srid pa'i chu klung du/ /ma lus kun rtog gis bsags rnyog pa rnams/ /thugs rje che ldan spyan lngar de dag ni/ /cho ga bzhin du thams cad bshags par bgyi/ /rdzogs sangs
33a7(rgyud 'grel): rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang/ /'phags pa gzhan gyis dge ba gang mdzad pa/ /de dag kun la yang dag yi rang zhing/ /byang chub tu ni yongs su bsngo bar gyi/ yid kyi rol pa dri med zla 'dras bsgrubs/ /snying rje dam pa mdza' yas pa yi thabs//
33b1(rgyud 'grel): rang gi yid la gnas par gyur pa yi/ /bde gshegs rnams la rtag tu skyabs su mchi/ /rtog pa ma lus pa las nges grol zhing/ /sems dpa' dam pa kun gyi phun tshogs gzhi/ /dngos po thams cad ro gcig ngo bo nyid/ /dam pa'i chos la rtag par skyabs
33b2(rgyud 'grel): su mchi/ /'ching ba rnams las yang dag grol gyur cing/ /snying rje mchog gis ? pa'i dpal dang ldan/ /rab tu dga' sogs sa la rab zhugs pa/ /brtul zhugs dbang po'i tshogs la skyabs su mchi/ /bsam dang rnam par smin pa dag gyur pas/ /sgrib pa kun gyi bag
33b3(rgyud 'grel): chags yang dag 'byin/ /lhag par mos pas rnam par brgyan pa yi/ /sems ni byang chub dam pa bskyed par bgyi/ /bde gshegs sras bcas rnams kyi lam gcig pu/ /sbyin sogs rnam bcu dkar po'i yon tan tshul/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas dag ma lus ngo bo'i slos//
33b4(rgyud 'grel): yang dag nyid du da ni gnas par bgyi/ /snying rjes 'jig rten 'di ni ma lus pa/ /lta ba'i dra bas bcings la dmigs nas ni/ /yang dag byang chub sems ni mnyam med pa/ /sngags pas cho gas de ltar bsgom par bya/ /ngo bo nyid dang bral phyir stong pa ste/ /rang bzhin
33b5(rgyud 'grel): rgyu dang bral bas mtshan ma med/ /rtog pa rnams dang bral phyir dngos po ni/ /ma lus smon pa las ni nges par gro/ /oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba Atka konyahaM/ /de 'og hUM gis rdo rjer byas pa'i sar/ /kun tu bzang las byung bar bsam pa ni/ /ston ka'i zla ba lta bur
33b6(rgyud 'grel): ? dkar pa/ /mdza' las phyogs gnas sna tshogs 'od dang ldan/ /grub gsum gyen du gnas pa'i nang gi ni/ /nam mkha' rang gi ngo bo rdo rje 'dzin/ /chos 'byung zhes bya phyag rgya'i dbus gnas pa/ /pad+ma sna tshogs rdo rje mdzes pa der/ /brum gyi 'khor lo
33b7(rgyud 'grel): las byung rig bcas pa'i/ /rnam snang mdzad yan lag las yang dag byung/ /thub dbang 'od kyi dkyil 'khor sna tshogs pa'i/ /zer gyis phyogs tshogs ma lus kun tu khyab/ /mi mnyam pa dag med phyir zur bzhi mnyam/ /dran dang dbang po'i mchog gi sgo
34a1(rgyud 'grel): rnams yin/ /bsam gtan bzhi po dag gi rta babs dang/ /ting 'dzin kha khyer gyis ni kun tu bskor/ /kha khyer de la brten pa'i mchod pa ni/ /dam pa 'dzin pa gzungs kyi tshogs rnams yin/ /sna tshogs rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam
34a2(rgyud 'grel): spras pa/ /gang phyir 'gro ba'i bsam kun rdzogs mdzad pa'i/ /rlung gis bskyod pa'i ba dan phreng ba dang/ /dril bu sgra sgrogs phyogs sgo kun khyab pa/ /gang phyir dam chos gsung rab yan lag dgu/ /gdul bya thams cad la ni bskyod pa po/ /me long
34a3(rgyud 'grel): 'dre ba dra phyed me tog gi /phreng ba sna tshogs kyis brgyan mnyam pa med/ /ye shes me long dri med byang chub kyi/ /yan lag dri ni me tog phun sum tshogs/ /ka ba bzang po brgyad kyis nyer mdzes pa/ /rnam thar brgyad po rnam par dag pa yin/ /rdo rje'i thig
34a4(rgyud 'grel): dang yang dag ldan pa ni/ /rdo rje theg chos 'khor lo rab bskor ba'o/ /bla med mdza' yas 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga/ /gzugs sogs yul rnams rnam par dag pa yin/ /mchod pa lnga yis rnam par brgyan pa ni/ /chos dbyings rnam par dag pa'i rgyu mthun
34a5(rgyud 'grel): yin/ /sna tshogs pad+ma'i 'dab mar leg gnas pa'i/ /nyi zla mgon bcas lha yi gnas rnams dang/ /rin chen ma lus pa yis rnam spras pa/ /gzhal yas khang pa der ni bsam par bya/ /bcu drug cha dang tshogs las byung ba yi/ /zla ba'i dkyil
34a6(rgyud 'grel): 'khor dag ni dbus nyid du/ /'od zer dpag tu med pa'i tshogs ldan pa/ /dbus ma'i gdan la cho ga bzhin du bsam/ /dpal mchog dang po'i snying po las byung ba'i/ /rdo rje bzang 'dir nor bu dmar 'dra la/ /dpag med thub pa'i 'od tshogs
34a7(rgyud 'grel): rnam 'phro ba/ /phyogs sgo mdza' yas khyad par rab bsgrub pa/ /dang po'i snying po mchog bcas bsgoms nas ni/ /nga rgyal de ltar mdza' yas sprul pa yis/ /'gro ba mchog gi don rnams byas gyur cing/ /thub mchog phra rab las bsgrubs mtshungs med pa//
34b1(rgyud 'grel): zla ba rgyas 'drar dkar ba'o mdangs ldan zhing/ /g.yas dang g.yon pa'i zhal ni sngo dang dmar/ /sna tshogs rgyan rnams 'bar ba'i phyag gnyis kyis/ /rig ma dam par 'khyud par mdzad pa'o/ /lhag ma'i phyag gis rdo rje ral gri dang/ /pad+ma rin chen bsnams pas zung
34b2(rgyud 'grel): gnyis mdzes/ /khams gsum khod ni rnam par brgyan pa yis/ /thub pa'i 'od tshogs su ma rnam par 'gyed/ /rnam par thar ba'i sgo gsum rnam dag bas/ /shes rab thabs kyi bdag nyid snying rje mchog /ma lus 'gro ba'i de nyid gcig pu nyid/ /rgyal ba
34b3(rgyud 'grel): skyed byed nyid kyi sku ru bsam/ /mchog tu rjes chags phun tshogs dpag med kyis/ /'dul ba'i 'jig rten thams cad dmigs nas ni/ /dga' ba'i sgyu ma'i sgra yis de rnams dang/ /rgyal ba'i tshogs rnams ma lus gzhugs par bya/ /de ni spyan la
34b4(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa'i lha mo dang/ /gzugs sogs ma lus yul gyi rang bzhin du/ /phyung nas rig ma de dag thams cad ni/ /rang gi rig ma'i nang du chud par bya/ /de yi pad+ma'i te ba'i nang du ni/ /dkyil 'khor dri med zla zer las byung bar/ /bsams nas
34b5(rgyud 'grel): blo yis 'gro ba'i tshogs rnams ni/ /ma lus de ni rab tu gzhug par bya/ /gsang ba'i rdo rje dam pa'i dbus su ni/ /rnam snang la sogs rgyal ba'i tshogs gzhug ste/ /zla ba zhu ba'i gzugs su gyur pa dang/ des ni de rnams de 'og dbang bskur
34b6(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /sa yi snying po phyag na rdo rje dang/ /mkha' snying 'jig rten dbang phyug sgrib sel bcas/ /dpal ldan kun tu bzang po zhes bya bas/ /de dag dmigs la sogs pa grangs bzhin no/ /gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dag dang/ /reg bya dang ni chos
34b7(rgyud 'grel): dbyings rdo rje dang/ /sa dang chu dang me dang rlung rnams kyi/ /ngo bo nyid gyur spyan la sogs par grags/ /gzugs dang tshor ba de bzhin 'du shes dang/ /'du byed dang ni rnams par shes bshad pa/ /rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa de gshegs te
35a1(rgyud 'grel): de rjes sa bon gyis ni dbyung bar bya/ /k+Sh+riM dzaM khaM gaM Sh+kaM saM zhes bshad pa/ /'di dag mig la sogs pa rnams kyis mig /dza hUM baM hUM khaM raM zhes bshad pa/ /de dag zugs kyi rdo rje la sogs pa/ /laM baM paM taM zhes bya bzhir
35a2(rgyud 'grel): bshad pa/ /de dag spyan la sogs pa rnams kyi yin/ /bruM Am dzrAM khaM hUM zhes bya ba 'di/ /rim pa ji bzhin brtag pa la sogs pa'i 'o/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM zhes bya ba'i sems nyid ni/ /'od ldan ho dang spel ba chog bzhin/ /pad+ma'i nang du zhugs
35a3(rgyud 'grel): pa mnyam med pa/ /shes rab chags pas zhu bar bya bar bsam/ /de yi 'od kyi mthu yis gnyis ka yang/ /zla ba zhu bar byas bar mthong ba dang/ /spyan la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams kyis ni/ /glu yi sgra yis bskul bar byas bar bsam/ /sems
35a4(rgyud 'grel): can khams na gnas kyi dbang phyug khyod ni rdo rje'i thugs/ /dga' ba yid 'ong don chen 'dod pas bdag las khyab tu gsol/ /mgon po gal te de ring bdag gi gson par mchi bzhed na/ /sems can yab chen mnyen mchog bdag
35a5(rgyud 'grel): la dgyes par mdzad du gsol/ /rdo rje'i sku khyod bka' yi 'khor lo sems can kun la phan/ /sangs rgyas don du byang chub don dam rab tu phan par gzigs/ /mgon po gal te de ring bdag ni gson par mchis bzhed na/ /'dod chags
35a6(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig chags pas bdag la dgyes par mdzad du gsol/ /khyod ni rdo rje'i gsung ste kun la ban zhing thugs brtse ba/ /'jig rten dag gi don dang dgos pa mdzad la rab tu brtson/ /mgon po gal te de ring bdag ni gson
35a7(rgyud 'grel): par mchis bzhed na/ /dga' ba'i spyod pa kun tu bzang po bdag la dgyes par mdzad du gsol/ /khyod ni rdo rje 'dod pa dam tshig mchog gi phan don che/ /yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi gdung mchog mnyam nyid thugs brtse ba/ /
35b1(rgyud 'grel): mgon po gal te de ring bdag ni gson par mchis bzheng na/ /yon tan rin chen mang po'i gter gyur bdag la dgyes par mdzod/ /de lta'i glu yi ngo ru byas bas na/ /chos kun sgyu ma lta bur yang dag rig /snang ba'i 'od zer gyis ni dkyil 'khor
35b2(rgyud 'grel): can/ /rang gi sngags kyi lus su rang nyid gyur/ /de yi 'od zer ma lus pa rnams kyis/ /rang lha dang mtshungs sprul pa'i thub dbang pos/ /dpag tu med pa'i yid kyis bcug pa las/ /dpal ldan 'jam pa'i rdo rje zhes byar gyur/ /gur gum
35b3(rgyud 'grel): bzang po'i mdog ltar dmar ba la/ /g.yas dang g.yon pa'i zhal ni sngo dang dkar/ /sna tshogs brgyan gyis rnam par rgyan pa yi/ /phyag gnyis shes rab dam pa 'khyud pa dang/ /mdangs ldan ral gri dang ni mda' nyid dang/ /utpal sngon gzhu mdza' 
35b4(rgyud 'grel): yas 'od ldan bsnams/ /ma lus rigs rnams 'phro bas rnam brgyan cing/ /skyob pa nam mkha' ma lus dkyil 'khor yin/ /dngos rnams thams cad gzung dang 'dzin pa dang/ /bral bas dngos po med pa nyid du shes/ /rnam par byang la mngon par
35b5(rgyud 'grel): zhen pa ni/ /med pas byin gyis brlabs pa 'di nyid bya/ /oM d+harmmad+hA tu swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ de 'og rang snying sa bon 'od rnams kyis/ /rang gi mig sogs sa snying la sogs pas/ /ji bzhin dkang nas dri med rang zla yis/ /rdo rje lte ba'i
35b6(rgyud 'grel): dbus gnas yi ge hUM/ thugs kyi rdo rje'i de bzhi kha dang ni/ /mgo bor pad+ma 'khor lo la gnas pa'i /a dang oM ni gsung gi rdo rje dang/ /sku yi rdo rje nyid du bsam par bya/ /de yi thugs kha'i 'od kyi tshogs rnams dang/ /shes
35b7(rgyud 'grel): rab dam par gnas pa'i 'od rnams kyis/ /kun nas rgyal ba'i dbang po mchod nas ni/ /thugs kyi rdo rje la sogs byin gyis brlab/ /dpal ldan rdo rje thugs 'chang ba/ /rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas/ /deng bdag byin gyis brlab
36a1(rgyud 'grel): nas su/ /rdo rje thugs kyis mdzad du gsol/ /phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/ /rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas/ /deng bdag byin gyis brlab nas su/ /rdo rje thugs kyis mdzad du gsol/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta tsit+ta badzra
36a2(rgyud 'grel): swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ chos kyi gsung lam dpal dang ldan/ /rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas/ /deng bdag byin gyis brlab nas su/ /rdo rje gsum gi mdzad du gsol/ /phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/ /rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms
36a3(rgyud 'grel): pas/ /deng bdag byin gyis brlab nas su/ /rdo rje gsung gis mdzad du gsol/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta bAk badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma kohaM/ /dpal ldan rdo rje sku 'chang ba/ /rdo rje mi byed gsum bsgoms pas dang bdag byin gyis bslab nas su/ /rdo rje skus ni
36a4(rgyud 'grel): mdzad du gsol/ /phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/ /rdo rje mi byed gsum bsgoms pa/ /deng bdag byin gyis brlab nas su/ /rdo rje skus ni mdzad du gsol/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ nam mkha' lta bur ngo bor rdo
36a5(rgyud 'grel): rje gsum/ /mtshan nyid dag dang bral bar dmigs nas ni/ /phyogs bcur kun bzhugs pa yi thub pa'i tshogs/ /snying po'i 'od zer rnams kyis yang dag bskul/ /thub pa'i mchog gi 'od zer las byung ba'i/ /rig pa'i tshogs rnams phyag na bum
36a6(rgyud 'grel): bsnyams te/ /ye shes chu yis mngon par dbang bskur bas/ /rang gi rigs kyi gtsos brgyan cod pan gyur/ /de bzhin rang gi lha 'dra rang snying pos/ /sprul pa'i rig pa nyid ni yang dag lta/ /mig la sogs pa dgang zhing yi ge gsum/ /rnam par
36a7(rgyud 'grel): bkod pas lus ni 'od dang ldan/ /de nyid shes bas mgo dang snying ga dang/ /lte ba gsang ba de bzhin brla gnyis sogs/ /oM hUM swA A(rgyud 'grel): hA zhes grags pa rnams/ /de ni sku thugs rdo rje bzang rigs sogs/ /lnga po rnams kyis yan lag byin brlabs te//
36b1(rgyud 'grel): 'od kyi phreng ba dam pas 'gro gsum khyab/ /a yis sna tshogs pad+ma'i lte ba bya/ /hUM gis 'dab ma brgyad pa rnam par sprul/ /shes rab dam pa'i rgyu mthun ngo bo nyid/ /thabs dang bcas par 'byung ba'i rang gi lus/ /de yis bde gshegs rjes su mnyes bya zhes/ /sngags
36b2(rgyud 'grel): pas dga' ba kun tu brtsam par bya/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta a nu rA ga Na badzra swe b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ thugs ka'i zla ba'i sngags kyi 'od rnams kyis/ /ma lus sangs rgyas tshogs rnams bcug nas ni/ /hUM gi rdo rje las byung dri ma med pa yi/ /yid tshul dam
36b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i tshul skyes la gnas pa/ /rang gi snying po las byung ma las pa'i/ /rang gi dkyil 'khor pa yi gzugs bsams la/ /cho ga 'di yis sems ni brtan po dang/ /'jig rten rnams la phan phyir yang dag 'byung/ /badzra d+h+rika ces bya dang thugs rdo rje/ /skye
36b4(rgyud 'grel): bo dam pa'i don mdzad yang dag bskul/ /nor bu sngon po'i 'od 'drar yang dag 'bar/ /g.yas dang g.yon pa'i zhal ni dkar dang dmar/ /dam pa dang po lta bu'i phyag dang ldan/ /kha dog dpag tu med pa'i 'od chogs mnga' / /blo dang ldan pas legs bsdus bdag
36b5(rgyud 'grel): nyid kyi/ /dngos po thams cad kyis ni zhugs par bya/ /dzi na dzika ces bya ba sku rdo rje/ /rdo rje 'dzin dang 'dra ba'i sku mdog zhal gyis mdzes/ /'khor lo la sogs phyag mtshan rnams de bzhin/ /shar gyi pad+mar zla ba'i dbus su bsam/ /ratna d+h+rika ces bya ba 'di
36b6(rgyud 'grel): yis ni/ /nor bu rin chen 'byung zhal gzhon nu 'dra/ /gtso ma'i gser gyi mdangs dang 'dra ba la/ /phyag drug brgyad rin chen la sogs bsnams/ /A ro li ka 'od dpag med pad+ma ni/ /rA ga ltar dmar zhal gnyis de dang 'dra/ /'od zer 'bar zhing phyag
36b7(rgyud 'grel): na pad+ma sogs/ /mtshan ma bsnams ba nub tu bsam par bya/ /pradz+nyA d+h+rika ces bya dang don yod grub/ /rin chen mrgad lta bu'i mdog ldan zhing/ /snga ma lta bu'i zhal sogs phun sum tshogs mnga' ba/ /ral gri la sogs bsnams pa byang du bsam/ /ral pa cod
37a1(rgyud 'grel): pa na mdzes dang sna tshogs pa'i/ /rin chen chog gi 'od zer 'bar bas brgyan/ /rig pa mgon dang rab tu bcas pa'i sku/ /thams cad nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dag la bsam/ /mo ha ra ti zhes pas lha mo spyan/ /zla ba dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa la
37a2(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa/ /mchog tu sreg cing sku yi rdo rje 'dra/ /me yi phyogs nyid du ni bsam par bya/ /dwe Sha ra ti zhes pa dga' ba che/ /dga' chen mchog 'dod mA ma kI zhes pa/ /zhal mdzes phyag rnams thugs kyi gtso bo 'dra ba/ /rnam par sgeg ba bden bral
37a3(rgyud 'grel): mtshams su bsam/ /rA ga d+hi zhes bya yum ma tshogs ni/ /gos dkar yon tan rin chen mdza' yas pa/ /dri med sku ni gsung gi dbang phyug 'dra/ /rlung gi phyogs su rnam par bsam par bya/ /badzra ra ti sa rab bskul sgrol ma ni/ /dri med rin chen 'od
37a4(rgyud 'grel): kyi phreng ba yis/ /phyogs kyi tshogs khebs rang gi ngo bo ni/ /rin chen dbang 'dra dbang ldan phyogs su bsam/ /lha mo 'di rnams nges pa'i phyag mtshan ni/ /'khor lo bzang dang utpa la dmar po dang/ /pad+ma utpal gser mdog rim bzhin bsam//
37a5(rgyud 'grel): lhag ma rnams ni bdag po ji bzhin 'dod/ /de nyid gsum gyis gzugs kyi rdo rje sogs/ /lha mos rnams ni sku la sogs 'dra bar/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni mtshams gyur bzhi po dang/ /rtsa ba'i sgo yi ngos gnyis dag tu bsam/ /ya
37a6(rgyud 'grel): mAn+ta krita ces byas gshin rje gshed/ /mdza' yas 'jigs 'od phyogs kun khyab dang ldan/ /dus mdza' mi bzad sprin gyi dkyil 'khor mdog /thugs kyi rgyal po dag dang sku mtshungs pa/ /drag po'i rigs 'od dpag med rnam 'phro
37a7(rgyud 'grel): bas/ /gshin rje mthar mdzad shin tu gdug pa yi/ /sprul gyis lus kyi yan lag rnam brgyan pa/ /dpal ldan shar gyi sgo na bsam bar bya/ /pradz+nyAn+ta krita ces byas bla med 'od/ /drag cing phyogs sogs sku yi rdo rje 'dra/ /gzhan gyis mi thub
37b1(rgyud 'grel): ces phyag tu ma po ni/ /lho phyogs kyi ni sgo ru bsam par bya/ /pad+man+ta krita ces byas phyogs rnams kyis/ /'khor los 'od kyis mngon par khebs byed pa/ /'od mdangs 'jigs dus med 'drar 'jig par ldan/ /phyag la sogs par gsung gi rdo rje 'dra/ /gdug pa du
37b2(rgyud 'grel): ma rnam gnon 'jigs pa'i zhal/ /thub dbang ha ha zhes ni bzhad pa yis/ /ri bor bcas pa skyel bas skrag mdzad pa/ /rta mgrin de bzhin nub kyi phyogs su bsam/ /big+hAM ta krita ces byas dpa' bo ni/ /dus mdza' i me ltar nag po bdud rtsi 'khyil/ /'phags
37b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i zhabs sogs mi bskyod dang mtshungs pa/ /de bzhin byang gi sgo ru bsam par bya/ /rnam par snang mdzad thugs gtso 'od dpag med/ /thugs kyi dbang po rim bzhin cod pan yin/ /tho ba dbyug pa de bzhin pad+ma dang/ /rdo rje sogs 'di phyag ni kun la
37b4(rgyud 'grel): bsam/ /de ltar yongs su rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor la/ /dngos po thams cad kyis ni bstan? ? te/ /snying po'i sngags kyi 'od zer lcags kyu yis/ /drangs nas bde bar gshegs rnams bsgom par bya/ /shes rab thabs kyi rang bzhin dri med pa'i/ /ting
37b5(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin las byung dam pa'i ba des gang bar/ /'khor lo bsams nas de nas pa gshin rje ni/ /mthar byed la sogs bshad pas bsrung bar bya/ /rang gi snying pos mngon bzlas mchod yon ni/ /tsan dan bzang sogs me tog gis mdzes dbul/ /rang las
37b6(rgyud 'grel): byas pa lta bur dbang bskur zhing/ /cho ga yis ni mngon par mchod par bya/ /pad nang rang gi sa bon 'di rnams kyis/ /gzugs la sogs pa thams cad drangs nas ni/ /yang dag byang chub yid kyi ngo bo yi/ /'od kyi dkyil 'khor ngag tu bsgom par
37b7(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /shes rab ba spu re las byung ba yi/ /'od zer rnam pa sna tshogs rgya chen tshogs/ /ma lus nam mkha' i gtos ni kun tu khyab/ /de la blo dang ldan pas rab tu spro/ /'od kyi sgo las nges par byung ba yi/ /yan lag dri med rgyan kun gyis legs brgyan/
38a1(rgyud 'grel): me long pi wang dri ngad ro yi snod/ /gos dang chos 'byung ba la sogs pa yi/ /mtshan mas rim gyis rnam par sgeg bcas shing/ /ral pa'i lag pa dam pa rnams dang ni/ /'od kyi snang bas sprul pa sna tshogs pa'i/ /mchod pa'i sprin
38a2(rgyud 'grel): gyi dra bas khyab pa dang/ /dngos rnams sgyu ma la sogs so sor ni/ /yang dag rig cing 'jig rten lta mkhas pa/ /rtog pa ma lus kun las nges gral zhing/ /mchog tu bde ba bskyed pa'i rgyur gyur pa/ /gzugs la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams dang ni//
38a3(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin phyi yi dri sogs thams cad kyis/ /rgyal ba'i dbang po rnams ni legs mchod cing/ /de ltar tha dad rtog la nges grol bya/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dza badzra swo b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ sgra yi yul rnams ma lus pa rnams ni/ /brag ca'i sgra 'drar nges
38a4(rgyud 'grel): brtag der rjes la/ /yang yid lhag pa'i lha ru gnas pa la/ /chos rnams bstod pa'i sgra ni byed par bsam/ /mi bskyod rdo rje ye shes che/ /rdo rje dbyings ni mkha' i chen po/ /rdo rje gsum mchog dkyil 'khor gsum/ /rdo rje dbyangs la phyag 'tshal
38a5(rgyud 'grel): lo/ /rnam par snang mdzad dag pa che/ /rdo rje zhi ba dga' chen po/ /rang bzhin 'od gsal mchog gi mchog /ston pa rdo rje phyag 'tshal lo/ /rin chen rgyal po rab tu zab/ /rdo rje nam mkha' dri med mkha' / /rang bzhin dag pa gos pa med//
38a6(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje mi 'chi rgyal po che/ /mi rtog nam mkha' rdo rje 'dzin/ /'dod chags pha rol phyin pa brnyes/ /rdo rje'i gsung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /don yod rdo rje rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /bsam pa thams cad rdzogs mdzad pa/ /rang
38a7(rgyud 'grel): bzhin dag pa nyid las byung/ /rdo rje sems dpa' phyag 'tshal lo/ /'bar ba'i rlung gis byin brlabs rlung dang me'i/ /dkyil 'khor la gnas rab sbar bdud rtsi lnga/ /de nas yi ge gsum bzlas dpag med pa'i/ /thub pa'i dbang po'i nang du chud par bya/ /ye
38b1(rgyud 'grel): shes bdud rtsi'i ngo bor bsams nas ni/ /hUM dgod rdo rje'i lce ni bzang po dang/ /snying ga'i zla ba'i dbus su ma lus pa'i/ /rgyal ba'i 'khor lo des ni tshim par bya/ /snying po'i 'od zer dpag med kyis sprul ba'i/ /thub pas mi shes kun tu nges gsal nas/ /'gro ba
38b2(rgyud 'grel): ma lus rdzogs sangs rgyas byas te/ /rang gi gsang sngags nang du chud par bya/ /gzugs la sogs pa'i rnam pa dang bral bas/ /'dzin pa de ni mngon sum mthong mi nus/ /gzung ba rnams kyang cung zad yod min la/ /gzhan pa'i 'brel pa yis
38b3(rgyud 'grel): kyang mthong ba med/ /bde sogs de ni yongs su 'dzin pa ni/ /bya ba 'ga' yang yod par ma mthong ste/ /cig car shes pa'i phyir na gzugs sogs bzhin/ /'di dag 'dzin ba por ni yod ma yin/ /dkar po la sogs gang zhig mthong ba rnams/ /de nyid
38b4(rgyud 'grel): dus gzhan dag tu mthong mi 'gyur/ /'di nyid rtag tu gcig la gcig 'gal ba/ /yin phyir bde ba la sogs dag dang mtshungs/ /thog mdza' la sogs bye brag snang bas na/ /gzugs la sogs pa 'di dag gcig ma yin/ /phra rab rnams kyang mthong ba ma yin
38b5(rgyud 'grel): pas/ /du ma'i gzugs su min pa'ang de dang 'dra/ /rdul phran cha shas med pa nyid kyang ni/ /phra rab du ma 'dus pa yod min pas/ /sa yi dkyil 'khor la sogs rang bzhin te/ /bsags pa 'ga' yang 'dir ni med par 'gyur/ /de bas 'dzin po la sogs
38b6(rgyud 'grel): ngang bral bas/ /rang rgyud gzugs sogs brtag pa'i ngo bo nyid/ /rgyu dang mi rgyu dngos po ma lus pa/ /dri za'i grong khyer dag dang mtshungs pa yin/ /bdag dang bdag gi rnam rtog rgyun gyi ni/ /ngo bo dag gis der ni 'khor ba ste/ /dag pa phyin ci log de med pa
38b7(rgyud 'grel): yi/ /ngo bo tsam gyis rnam par shes par bya/ /'dir ni zhi dang srid pa'i ngo bo dag /chos nyid kyis ni dbye ba 'ga' yang med/ /gang phyir gzung ba la sogs rnam pa dang/ /bral bar thams cad de ni rtag tu grub/ /de ni snang ba'i rang bzhin kun rtog las/ /thams
39a1(rgyud 'grel): cad ci yang yod pa ma yin te/ /sems las gzhan pa dag ces bya ba ni/ /yod pa ma yin de phyir de bdag nyid/ /gang zhig gzugs la so sor zhugs gyur pa/ /de'i bdag nyid gang yin de nyid gzugs/ /de bas thams cad khyab par
39a2(rgyud 'grel): med par brtag /snang bar gyur pa'i yul rnams gang yin pa/ /gang zhig rtog pa'i gnas su gyur ba rnams/ /de de gnyis su sbyor ba dang bral bas/ /des na rnam par dbye ba thams cad min/ /dad dang brtson 'grus rnam par dang/ /de bzhin
39a3(rgyud 'grel): dran dang bsam gtan rnams dag pa'ang/ /sgo bzang srung bar byed pa'i ngo bo nyid/ /shes rab rnams dag ma lus yul du snang/ /mtshan ma med pa'i dga' ba rnam dag pa/ /ma lus lha mo'i tshogs kyi ngo bo nyid/ /sems can don dang
39a4(rgyud 'grel): bdag dang rnam rtog dang/ /'jug pa'i rnam shes rnam par dag ba yang/ /me long sogs yid dri med ngo bo bas/ /sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yang rang bzhin te/ /de bzhin nyid ni rnam dag sbyor ba yis/ /'khor lo'i gtso bo 'di
39a5(rgyud 'grel): ni rnam par bzhugs/ /gzugs la sogs pa'i 'khrul pa rnam bral bas/ /dri med phung po la sogs ngo bor grub/ /ser sna la sogs ldog par gyur pa ni/ /pha rol phyin pa dkar po'i chos rang bzhin/ /rnam rtog med par bdag
39a6(rgyud 'grel): gzhan don 'byung ba'i/ /rgyu nyid kyis na de yang go rim bzhin/ /zab pa dang ni rgya che ba yis na/ /shes rab thabs kyis bdag nyid can sems yin/ /dam pa'i don du ci yang gzhan dag las/ /dbye med dbye ba med min mi 'dod ste//
39a7(rgyud 'grel): gzhan du 'dzin pa las ni bzlog phyir dang/ /de bzhin bye brag la sogs rtog bral yin/ /de ltar brtags nas rab snying dri med pa/ /zla ba la gnas mtshon mar bsgom par bya/ /gsang sngags dam pa thig le'i gzugs su ni/ /rang
39b1(rgyud 'grel): yid 'od dang ldan par yongs su bsgom/ /sems de'i 'od zer dri med pas sad pa'i/ /sku gsung rdo rje'i lus ni mchog gyur pa'i/ /slar yang 'di nyid du ni nges bzhugs shing/ /ye shes bdud rtsi 'bab par bsam par bya/ /nang gi lus dang de bzhin
39b2(rgyud 'grel): thams cad kyang/ /de yis kun tu mthar ni snang byas nas/ /ba spu re re'i khod las byung ba yi/ /tshogs kyis sna tshogs kun tu dgang par bya/ /yang na rang gi mtshan ma phra mo ni/ /'od ldan sna rtser gnas par thub pa yi/ /'khor lo nang du chud byas
39b3(rgyud 'grel): snying rje yis/ /nang gi shes rab dam pa nyid mtshan bsgom/ /mtshan ma brton po mthong na spro ba ni/ /'od zer de yis sprul pa'i thub dbang dang/ /rnam pa sna tshogs pa yi phyag mtshan rnams/ /blo dang ldan pas yang dang yang du spro/ /yang na
39b4(rgyud 'grel): bzlas la rtse gcig sems nyid ni/ /dngos kun bdag nyid rang gi sems dbang po/ /rang gi sngags ni sna tshogs 'od ldan par/ /byas pas blo dang ldan pas bsgom par bya/ /srogs dang brtsol ba shin tu ma bsdams par/ /gsang sngags/
39b5(rgyud 'grel): rgyal po gsal bar brjod bya zhing/ /sku sogs rim pa bzhin du yang na ni/ /cig car spro ba dag ni legs par bya/ /nam mkha' gtos dang mnyam pa sku sogs pa'i/ /'od kyi sku yi snang bas yang dag dgang/ /de nas snga ma bzhin du sna
39b6(rgyud 'grel): tshogs pa'i/ /mchod pa'i sprin gyis bkod pa kun tu spro/ /yongs su sbas pa'i rig pa mchog rnams ni/ /bde chen bab pas gzhan gyis dbang thob nas/ /rnam par sgeg pa'i thub dbang tshogs rnams ni/ /mthar ni rang gi lus la gzhug
39b7(rgyud 'grel): par bya/ /rang gi snying po'i de nyid nges rtogs pa'i/ /skyo bas sems kyi spyod pa zhum gyur na/ /rig pa'i tshegs kyis yang dag glung blangs pas/ /rab tu bskul nas yongs su mchod par bya/ /sems bzang po yi chu rgyun srog dang ni/ /stsol ba'i
40a1(rgyud 'grel): 'od kyi lcags kyus drangs nas ni/ /cho ga ji bzhin sku rdo rje sogs la/ /nges par dbang pas skyo ba bsal bar bya/ /de ltar thangs cig ngal gso byas nas ni/ /sngar bshad cho ga yis ni de nyid shes/ /gsang sngags dam pa rgyun tu bzla ba ni
40a2(rgyud 'grel): sngags pa'ang kun tu chags pa med par bya/ /bstod dang mchod sogs gshegs su gsol ba dang/ /sngags pas rab tu 'bad de rnams bya zhing/ /oM la sogs par 'khor lo bsdus nas ni/ /sku la sogs pa brtag pa ngag tu bya/ /de ltar
40a3(rgyud 'grel): de nyid mthong bas rnam grol ba/ /sems can khams rnams kun tu dmigs nas ni/ /snying rje 'gro ba rnams la phan don du/ /smon lam rnams ni mngon sum nyid du bya/ /langs nas dag pa'i sems dpa' rang gi lha'i/ /rnam pa'i nga rgyal
40a4(rgyud 'grel): yid la byas nas ni/ /kun tu snang bar gnas pa'i yul rnams ni/ /snga ma bzhin du yul du yongs su bsgom/ /rang rang gi ni ngo bo rnam dag pa/ /rim bzhin sku la sogs pa'i rdo rjer gyur/ /dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin pa lta bur ni/ /chos nyid kyis
40a5(rgyud 'grel): na phan tshun khyad par med/ /phyin ci log gi rtog pa spangs pa yis/ /bya ba ma lus pa ni rdzogs par bya/ /de yi thub pa'i 'khor lo ma lus pa/ /mchod pa 'di ni kun tu mchog yin no/ /bza' za'i tshe na snying ga'i zla ba la/ /'khor
40a6(rgyud 'grel): lo'i gtso bo rang gi gsang sngags kyis/ /kun tu dmigs te byang chub sems kyi ni/ /ngo bo nyid gyur 'od dang ldan par bsam/ /rang gi zas la de nyid gsum bzlas te/ /thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyis rnam dag pa/ /de yis sku yi
40a7(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje la sogs pa/ /lha rnams kun tu tshim pa nyid du bya/ /phyi yi sbyin sreg cho gas bsgre bya zhing/ /yid kyi'ang yid nyid kyis ni bya ba ste/ /phung po'i bud shing rnam par bsreg pa yi/ /ye shes 'bar ba bla na med par bshad/ /de ltar
40b1(rgyud 'grel): ma lus pa yi 'dod pa yis/ /sa? bdag nyid dam ni gzhan dag rang rang gi /lha yi gzugs gyur pa la yang dag mchod/ /dam tshig 'di ni bde gshegs rnams kyis gnad/ /rjes su mthun pa'i 'gro ba'i don rnams ni/ /ma lus bde gshegs
40b2(rgyud 'grel): mchod par yang dag brtag /lus la sogs pa'i las rnams de dang de/ /rtag tu legs par mnyam par bzhag ste bya/ /rnam pa de 'dra'i sems ldan lus dang ni/ /ngag yid las rnams ci yang rung ba dag /phyag rgya dang ni sngags kyi rnam
40b3(rgyud 'grel): pa ru/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyis de gsungs so/ /gang phyir dngos po gcig la'ang sna tshogs pa'i/ /kun tu rtogs pas bsags pa'i rnam pa las/ /sdug bsngal bde dang grol ba skyed byed pa'i/ /las kyi khyad par mang po 'byung
40b4(rgyud 'grel): bar 'gyur/ /de bas lus sogs ngag dang mi dge ba'i/ /rnam pa'i las rnams sems kyi dbang las gsungs/ /de ltar rnyog pa ma lus spangs pa yi/ /sems ni nag po'i las su ga la 'gyur/ /dam tshig nyams la snying ga'i
40b5(rgyud 'grel): zla bar ni/ /snying pos sna tshogs rdo rje ci bzhin bsam/ /dpal ldan dam tshig rdo rje'i rnal 'byor pas/ /'gro ba rang bzhin gyis dag rnam bsams la/ /sna tshogs pad+ma'i 'dab ma dbus su ni/ /sngar gyi rim pas dbang bskur kun tu
40b6(rgyud 'grel): blang/ /phyi rol gyi yang khrus kyi cho ga la/ /rim 'di khyad par du yang bsam par bya/ /thun mtshams su yang de bzhin mchod la sogs/ /sngon du 'gro ba'i bzlas brjod byas nas ni/ /snying ga'i nang du 'khor lo chud byas la/ /snying rje dang
40b7(rgyud 'grel): ni shes rab ldan par nyal/ /ldang ba'i dus su dam tshig lha mo yi/ /yang dag glu yis dpal ldan bskul bas ni/ /langs na thub pas bzlas brjod la sogs pa/ /cho? ga snga ma bzhin du bya ba yin/ /dngos grub thob pa'i mtshan
41a1(rgyud 'grel): ma mthong nas ni/ /de nyid gsum mchod byas nas rang gi sems/ /sngar bshad dkyil 'khor dag la gnas nas ni/ /'dod pa'i dngos grub rab tu bsgrub par bya/ /bgegs rnams bdud rtsi thab sbyor 'khor lo yis/ /dbang
41a2(rgyud 'grel): bskur byas nas 'bad pa med par 'joms/ /gang zhig dbus su gnas par gyur pa yi/ /'khor lo de yang de yi yin par 'gyur/ /tha mal rnam rtog rgyun las gzhan pa yi/ /srid pa'i sdug
41a3(rgyud 'grel): bsngal gzhan ci 'ang yod ma yin/ /de dang rnam par 'gal bar 'gyur ba'i sems/ /'di ni mngon sum du ni rtogs par 'gyur/ /zab cing rgya che ba yi bdag nyid can/ /gang yin der ni kun rtog snang mi 'gyur/ /rig pa las ni gzhan du gyur
41a4(rgyud 'grel): pa dag /yod pa min par sngar ni bsgrubs pas na/ /gang zhig gang dang mi mthun pa dag tu/ /lan cig gyur pa'ang de bgrod rgyas gyur pa/ /mthong ba'i bslabs pa rnam par 'phel pa yis/ /rang gi mi mthun shin tu 'gag par byed/ /sbyin pa la sogs
41a5(rgyud 'grel): bdag med ldan pas kyang/ /tha mal pa yi rang gi ngo bo las/ /rnam par ldog par mi 'gyur gang phyir 'dir/ /yod kyang de ni mi mthun 'gyur ma yin/ /de ltar rtogs na snying rjer ldan pa dag /ye shes bsam yas skad cig gis sgrub pa/ /
41a6(rgyud 'grel): dpal ldan kun tu bzang po'i rang gi ni/ /ngo bo su zhig nges par bsgom mi byed/ /dri med blo yi 'od zer rnams kyis ni/ /mun pa thams cad rnam par sel byed pa/ /rnam par bstan pas mdzad pa 'dis mchog gi /bdag 'dra'i go skabs dag
41a7(rgyud 'grel): ni ga la yod/ /bla ma dam pa'i gzhung ni cung zad tsam/ /bzung ba gang yin de yang dang por ni/ /'ching pa lhod ces bya bar grags pas na/ /des na 'di la shin tu 'bad pa yin/ de ltar rnam par sbyar las legs byung pa'i/ /dge ba dri med
41b1(rgyud 'grel): de'i nang du rdzas rnams bzhag la/ de'i steng du oM bsam mo/ /bdud rtsi'i snod kyi kha gab rdo rje rtse lnga par lte bar hUM dang ldan pa bsams la rlung gis me sbar bas bdud rtsi bcas par bsam mo/ /oM dang hUM gi 'od zer gyis kyang smin par byas te/ rnal
41b2(rgyud 'grel): 'byor ba skra ba shig la/ lus dud khrod kyi thal bas byugs te/ rtag tu bsgoms nas bza' bar bya zhes bya ba rdzas de 'bar gyi bar du bsgoms la/ 'bar nas bza' bar bya ste/ stong par bsgom mo/ /gzhung de dag gis mnyam par bzhag pa'i
41b3(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor yin no/ /rnal 'byor pa langs nas kyang mchod pa'i las dang/ 'gro ba la phan gdags pa dang/ dus thams cad du dmigs pa med pa'i shes rab dang mi 'bral ba dang/ thabs kyis snying rje bsgom pa dang/ mi bskyod
41b4(rgyud 'grel): pa ni ye shes che zhes bya ba'i bstod pa bya ba dang/ thod pa'i rgyan la sogs pa bcang ba dang/ car ti'u dang kha TwAM ga gzung bar bya'o/ /yang na snying po zla bar bya'o/ /oM a h+ri hUM zhes bya ba bzlas par bya'o/ /de ltar bya ba
41b5(rgyud 'grel): thams cad rnam par gsang ste/ he ru ka'i brtul zhugs spyad par bya'o/ /gnas dgu ni zhi gnas dur khrod shing gcig dang/ lam mdo brag phug chu 'gram dang/ /ri rtse khang stong ma mo'i gnas/ /'di ni dur khrod sa dgu
41b6(rgyud 'grel): yin zhes bshad do/ /mtshan mo sgrub pa'i dus ni mtshan mo yin no/ /yon tan kun brtsegs 'od zer can gyi gtsug lag khang chen du/ /dngos grub mchog thob ye shes rim pa'i tshul/ /blo dman nyams chung rgyas par
41b7(rgyud 'grel): mi nus phyir/ /mdor bsdus 'ga' zhig dran phyir dbye ba byas/ /dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i rim par phye ba dpal he ru ka'i grub pa'i thabs kyi 'grel ba rdzogs so// / */ (/grol ba'i thig le zhes bya ba slob dpon chen po sangs rgyas
42a1(rgyud 'grel): la bcom ldan 'jam dbyangs zhes bya rab tu bsgrub par bya/ /dang po mtho rangs snying ga'i dbus su dri med 'od 'phro de nyid bsam/ /bkod nas snying rje can gyis sgo la sogs pa yang dag par yang bya/ /dam pa'i tsan dan sogs bkrus
42a2(rgyud 'grel): dri zhim me tog bkram pa'i mchog cha la/ /bsam gtan gnas su bde ba'i gnas su 'dug nas dus gsum sangs rgyas rnams/ /dmigs te sna tshogs mchod sprin spro sogs sngon du byas nas blo ldan pas/ /sdig pa la sogs 'di ltar bya'o dge
42a3(rgyud 'grel): ba 'phel don du/ /thog ma med ldan srid pa'i rgyun la rtogs pas bsags pa'i sdig kun gang/ /snying rje chen po'i mdun rim bzhin te thams cad bshags par bgyi/ /yang dag sangs rgyas byang chub 'phags dang gzhan rnams mdzod pa'i
42a4(rgyud 'grel): dge ba gang/ /ma lus bdag gis yi rang yang dag de ni byang chub phyir bsngo'o/ /sems rgyas zla ba dri ma med las grub pas mdza' yas snying rje gnas/ /bdag gi yi la gnas pa'i bde bar gshegs la rtag tu skyabs su mchi/ /rtog pa kun las
42a5(rgyud 'grel): nges grol ma lus dam pa sems dpa' i bkra shis gzhi/ /dngos po kun gyi ngo bor chos la bdag nyid skyabs su mchi/ /bcings pas yang dag spangs pa'i snying rje mchog gis drangs pa'i dpal ldan pa/ /rab dga' la sogs sa la gnas
42a6(rgyud 'grel): pa dam bcas tshogs la skyabs su mchi/ /bsam pa rnams smin dag pas/ /sgrib kun bag chags ma lus btsom pa ste/ /mos pas rnam par brgyan pa'i sems kyis byang chub sems ni bskyed par bgyi/ /bde gshegs sras bcas lam
42a7(rgyud 'grel): gcig sbyin sogs bcu po dkar po yon tan ngo bo la/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas dag kun gyi rang bzhin blo yis de ltar bsten par bgyi/ /'jig rten 'di dag lta ba'i dra bas bkab la snying rjes dmigs nas su/ /yang dag byang chub sems kyi gzhal med
42b1(rgyud 'grel): bsgom rim 'di ni bsngags pas bya/ /stong pa rang bzhin med phyir rgyu 'bras phyir ni rang bzhin mtshan ma med/ /rjes su dpag pa gsal bas ma lus gzhi yi smon pa des bral lo/ /oM shUn+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swA b+hA ba At+ma konyahaM/ de 'og ston zla dkar po mdza' med phyogs
42b2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor gnas pa sna tshogs 'od/ /'phags par gnas pa'i gru gsum nang gi mkha' yi rang bzhin rdo rje 'dzin/ /chos kyi 'byung zhes phyag rgya dbus gnas pad+ma sna tshogs rdo rjes brgyan/ /hUM gis rdo rje rgyan pa'i sa la kun tu bzang po las byung bsgom/ /
42b3(rgyud 'grel): bruM yig 'khor lo las byung rig ma dang bcas snang mdzad skur gyur pa/ /gsal ba thub dbang dkyil 'khor sna tshogs 'od zer gyis khyab phyogs 'khor kun/ /gru bzhis mnyam pa'i phyir na mchog bzhis bran pa dbang po sgo rnams kyis/ /bsam
42b4(rgyud 'grel): gtan bzhi'i twa ra Na ting 'dzin mu khyud bzhi yis yongs bskor ba/ /mu khyud de la gnas pa dam pa'i mchod pas 'brel ba'i gzugs rnams rgyun/ /sna tshogs rgyan rnams bkod pa 'gro ba'i bsam pa thams cad yongs rdzogs phyir/ /'dul
42b5(rgyud 'grel): pas bskyod pa gsung rab yan lag dgu yi dam chos kun 'gro ci yi phyir/ /rlung gis bskyod pa rgyal mtshan phreng dang dril sgras grags pas phyogs sgo kun/ /me long ye shes rtag tu dri med byang chub yan lag me tog spos bkram zhing/ /dra
42b6(rgyud 'grel): ba dra byed me long me tog phreng ba sna tshogs brgyan pa'i gzugs/ /rnam par thar brgyad rnam par dag pas ka ba brgyad kyis klub pa'i mchog /rdo rje tshul gyis chos kyi 'khor los sgyur phyir rdo rje'i theg ldan la/ /gzugs la sogs pa'i spyod yul
42b7(rgyud 'grel): dag pas bla med mdza' yas 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga/ /zas lngas brgyan pas rnam par dag pa'i chos kyi dbyings rgyu mthun/ /sna tshogs pad+ma la gnas nyi ma zla bar bcas pa lha yi gdan/ /ma lus rin chen bkod pa'i gzhal yas brtsegs
43a1(rgyud 'grel): pa de la bsgom/ /bcu drug cha shas sde pa las byung zla ba'i dkyil 'khor pa yi dbus/ /dbus kyi gdan la cho ga bzhin du 'od dpag med bzhi bsam par bya/ /mchog gi dang po'i snying po las byung rdo rje dam pa ye shes gzugs/ /
43a2(rgyud 'grel): grangs med thug po'i 'od zer phreng bas grub pa'i phyogs sgo kun/ /bsam nas dang po snying por bcas pa'i nga rgyal ldan pas sprul pa mdza' yas kyis/ /'gro ba'i don mchog rab mdzad pa yi thugs mchog rdul phran rnam bkod gzugs brnyan
43a3(rgyud 'grel): can/ /g.yas g.yon zhal ni gnag dang dmar po zla ba rdzogs ltar dkar ba'i mdog/ gsal ba rnam par bkod pas brgyan pa'i phyag gnyis dam pa'i rig ma 'khyud/ /lhag ma'i phyag zung gnyis brgyan rdo rje ral gri rin chen pad+ma 'dzin/ /'jig
43a4(rgyud 'grel): rten gsum khong brgyan pa'i 'od zer rnam pa bde 'gro thub pa'i dbang/ /rnam thar gsum dag shes rab bdag nyid snying rje'i mchog gi thabs ldan pas/ /'gro kun de nyid gcig pa rgyal ba skyed byed sku bzhi mngon sum bya/ /mchog tu rjes
43a5(rgyud 'grel): chags phun sum tshogs pas 'jig rten thams cad 'dul dmigs nas/ /dga' ba'i rdzu 'phrul sgra yis rgyal ba'i tshogs rnams rang gi lus nang gzhug /de ni spyan la sogs pa'i lha mo gzugs sogs yul gyi rang bzhin bas/ /
43a6(rgyud 'grel): byung nas rig ma thams cad gzhi yi rig ma'i nang du thim par bya/ /de yi pad+ma'i snying po'i dbus su dkyil 'khor dri med zla 'od las byung ba/ /glo yis bsams nas rdzogs par bde la skye bo'i tshogs rnams gzhug par bya/ /daM
43a7(rgyud 'grel): pa gsang ba'i rdo rje dkyil 'khor rnam snang mdzad sogs rgyal po'i brgyan zhugs nas/ /zla ba zhu ba'i ngo bor gyur pas dbang bskur byas te de 'og tu/ /sa snying phyag na rdo rje nam snying 'jig rten dbang phyug sgrib ba sel/ /dpal ldan
43b1(rgyud 'grel): kun tu bzang po de dag mig la sogs pa'i grangs su gyur/ /gzugs sgra dri dang ro dang reg bya chos dbyings rdo rje yang/ /sa chu me rlung rang bzhin gyur pa spyan la sogs pa'i grangs su 'gyur ro/ /gzugs dang myong ba mtshan ma de bzhin kho na
43b2(rgyud 'grel): 'du byed yid brjod pas/ /rnam snang mdzad sogs bde gshegs rnams te de 'og sa bon gyi sa dbyung bya/ /k+ShiM dzaM khaM gaM skaM saM dang brjod pa de dag mig la sogs rnams so/ /myong ba mtshan ma de bzhin kho na 'du byed yid brjod pa/ /rnam
43b3(rgyud 'grel): snang mdzad sogs bde gshegs dze hUM baM ho khaM raM brjod pas gzugs kyi rdo rje la sogs so/ /laM maM pi taM zhes kyang gsungs pa de bzhin spyan la sogs pa'o/ /bruM aM dzi hUM zhes pas rtag la sogs so/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM zhes sems 'bar ho'i
43b4(rgyud 'grel): bar du zhugs pa cho ga bzhin/ /pad+ma'i nang nas mnyam med shes rab chags pas zhu ba byed mthong ste/ /de yi 'od kyi mthu yis kyang ni zla bar zhu bar byed mthong ste/ /'di ltar stan la sogs pa'i lha mos dbyangs kyi sgra yis bskul bar bsam//
43b5(rgyud 'grel): sems can khams na gnas pa'i dbang phyug khyod ni rdo rje'i thugs/ /dga' ba'i yid 'ong don chen 'dod pas bdag la bskyab du gsol/ /mgon po gal te de ring bdag ni gson par mchis bzhed na/ /sems can yab chen gnyen mchog
43b6(rgyud 'grel): bdag la dgyes par mdzad du gsol/ /rdo rje sku khyod bka' yis 'khor lo sems can kun la phan/ /sangs rgyas don du byang chub mchog sgrub rab tu phan par gzigs/ /mgon po gal te bdag ni de ring gson par mchis bzhed na/ /'dod
43b7(rgyud 'grel): chags dam tshig chags pas bdag la dgyes par mdzad du gsol/ /khyed ni rdo rje'i gsung ste kun la phan ba'i thugs brtse ba/ /'jig rten dag gi dgongs pa'i don mdzad pa la rtag tu brtson/ /mgon po gal te bdag ni de ring gson par mchis bzhed na/ /spyod pa dri med kun tu bzang pos
44a1(rgyud 'grel): bdag la dgyes par mdzod/ /khyod ni rdo rje'i 'dod ba dam tshig mchog gi phan don che/ /yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi gdung mchog mnyam pa nyid gzigs pa/ /mgon po gal te bdag ni de ring gson bar mchis bzhed na/ /yon tan
44a2(rgyud 'grel): rin chen mang po'i gter gyur bdag la dgyes par mdzod/ /de ltar dbyangs kyis bskul bas sgyu 'phrul dra bar dngos kun legs bsams nas/ /'od zer 'bar bas bskor ba'i gzhi yis sngags kyis lus su rang bsgyur bya/ /de la 'od
44a3(rgyud 'grel): kyis ma lus lha rnams rgyal ba'i thub dbang rnams/ /nang du thim nas 'od kyi dpal ldan 'jam pa'i rdo rjer gyur par bya/ /gur gum mchog 'od dmar 'dra g.yas g.yon zhal ni gnag dang dkar ba'i mdog/ sna tshogs rgyan gyis
44a4(rgyud 'grel): brgyan pa'i phyag gnyis dam pa'i shes rab 'khyud/ /gsal ba'i ral gri mda' dang utpal mthing ga gzhu ni mdza' yas 'od/ /ma lus rigs rnams 'phro bas brgyan pa'i mkha' kun dkyil 'khor ldan skyob pa/ /gzung 'dzin
44a5(rgyud 'grel): bral bas dngos po thams cad ngo bo nyid med shes nas su/ /rnam par byang ba mngon bzhugs zab don byin brlabs 'di ltar bya/ /oM d+harma d+hA tu swa b+hA ba At+ma konyahaM/ de 'og gzhi yi sa bon 'od kyi ji ltar rang la gang ste mig sogs
44a6(rgyud 'grel): rnams/ /sa snying la sogs dri med rang snying zla ba'i rdo rje bum pa'i dkyil gnas ba /hUM gi thugs kyi rdo rje mkha' dang mgo la pad+ma 'khor lo'i dkyil du yang/ /a dang phyag 'tshal gnyis kyis gsung gi rdo rje sku yi rdo rje 'ang bsam par
44a7(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /de thugs 'od zer rgyun gyis rang gi shes rab dang sbyor snang bas kun tu ni/ /rgyal ba'i dbang po rnams la mchod nas thugs kyi rdo rje la sogs byin gyis brlab /dpal ldan thugs kyi rdo rje 'chang/ /rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas//
44b1(rgyud 'grel): de ring bdag la byin brlabs nas/ /thugs kyi rdo rjes mdzad du gsol/ /phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/ /rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgom pas/ /de ring bdag la byin brlabs nas/ /thugs kyi rdo rje mdzad du gsol//
44b2(rgyud 'grel): oM sarba ta thA ga ta tsit+ta badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma konyahaM/ dpal ldan chos kyi gsung gi lam/ /rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas/ /de ring bdag la byin brlabs nas/ /gsung gi rdo rjes mdzad du gsol/ /phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i
44b3(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas rnams/ /rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms nas/ /de ring bdag la byin brlabs nas/ /gsung gis rdo rjes mdzad du gsol/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta bA ka badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma konyahaM/ /dpal ldan sku yi rdo rje 'chang/ /rdo rje mi phyed gsum
44b4(rgyud 'grel): sgoms pas/ /de ring bdag la byin brlabs pas/ /sku yi rdo rje mdzad du gsol/ /phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/ /rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms nas/ /de ring bdag la byin brlabs nas/ /sku yi rdo rje mdzad du
44b5(rgyud 'grel): gsol/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma konyahaM/ rdo rje gsum ni nam mkha' i rang bzhin mtshan ma spangs pa mtshon byas te/ /sems kyi 'od zer rnams kyis bskul nas thams cad tshogs su gyur pa'i thub pa'i sde/ /thub
44b6(rgyud 'grel): mchog 'od zer las byung rig ma tshogs kyi yang dag 'dzin pa yi/ /bum pa'i ye shes chu yis blugs pas rang rig gtso bo snang bas dbu brgyan gyur/ /de bzhin rang gi lha mo 'dra bar rang gi snying po 'ang bsgoms nas rig mar sprul/ /mig
44b7(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa gang nas yig 'bru gsum bkod 'bar ba'i lus ldan ma/ /'og snying lte ba gsang ba de bzhin brla gnyis sogs la de nyid shes par bya/ /oM hUM swA A(rgyud 'grel): hA zhes byas pas lus yid rdo rje dam pa'i rigs tshogs kyis//
45a1(rgyud 'grel): de lnga'i byin brlabs lus ni 'gro gsum khyab pas dam pa'i 'ong tshogs bsam/ /as bskyed rnam par bkod pa'i snying po hUM las sprul pa'i pad+ma 'dab brgyad pa/ /pad+ma'i shes rab rgyu mthun rang bzhin thabs dang bcas
45a2(rgyud 'grel): par gyur pa yi gzhi'i lus bsngags pa/ /de dang lhan cig bde gshegs rnams la rjes su chags par bgyi zhes brtsams/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta a nu rA ga na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ sems kyi zla ba'i 'od kyis ma lus sangs
45a3(rgyud 'grel): rgyas tshogs ni bzhugs gnas te/ /hUM gi rdo rje dbyung nas dri med pad+ma la gnas dam pa'i yid kyi gzugs/ /bsams nas rang gi snying pos bskyed pa thams cad gzhi yi dkyil 'khor lha gzugs su/ /cho ga 'di yi sems ni
45a4(rgyud 'grel): brtan po dag zhes pa nas rA ga rA ti zhes bya yum mchog ni/ /mchog gi rjes su dkar mo zhes par mdza' yas yon tan rin chen ma/ /rin chen dbang phyug dra ba'i dngos po sgrol ba badzra ra ti zhes bskul bas/ /dri med rin
45a5(rgyud 'grel): chen phreng bas bsgoms pa'i phyogs 'khor byed ma dbang ldan la/ /dam pa'i 'khor lo utpal dmar po pad+ma utpal ser po rnams kyis mtshan/ /de dag gi ni rim pa'i nges pa'i lhag ma'i ji ltar 'dod pa'i phyag bsnams
45a6(rgyud 'grel): yin/ /dkyil 'khor grwa bzhi dang ni shar gyi sgo gnyis la ni bsam bya ba/ gzugs sogs rdo rje lha mo sku la sogs dang gsum gyis so/ /shar gyi sgo ru grags pa bsam pa thams cad 'grub mdza' yas pas 'jigs
45a7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i 'od/ /'bar la ya man+ta krita ces pas zang dus drag sprin dkyil 'khor dngos po ste/ /thugs bdag rgyal po mnyam pa'i sku ni du ma'i khro bo rigs kyi 'od phyung ba/ /gshin rje mthar byed ces bya mi zad pa'i sgrub kyis
45b1(rgyud 'grel): sku brgyan dpal ldan pa'o/ /lho phyogs kyi sgor gnas pa pradz+nyA n+ta krita ces pas bla na med ldan pa/ sku yi dbang phyug bzhin du phyag la sogs pa drag po gzhan gyis mi thub gsal/ /de nas rta mgrin nub kyi phyogs kyi sgo ru 'od zer 'khrigs pas
45b2(rgyud 'grel): phyogs bskor ba/ /pad+man+ta krita ces pas 'bar ba'i 'jigs pa'i me ltar 'jigs pa'i gzugs/ /gsung gi bzhin du phyag la sogs pa du mas sdang ba 'jigs byed zhal/ /gang sgrogs bzhad pas ri rnams g.yo bar bye ba
45b3(rgyud 'grel): dang thub pa'i dbang rnams so/ /de nas mi bskyod 'dra ba'i zhal sogs big+han'n+ta krita ces bya byang sgo ru/ /zad dus byin za lta bu 'phags pa bdud rtsi khyil pa dpa' ba' o/ /rnam snang mdzad dang thub dbang snang ba mdza' yas thugs kyi
45b4(rgyud 'grel): dbang phyug dbu rgyan dang/ /rim par mtho ba be con pad+ma rdo rje la sogs phyag kyang de bzhin no/ /de ltar rdzogs par bskyed par dkyil 'khor mthong nas dngos po thams cad kyis/ /snying po sngags kyi 'od zer lcags kyus bde gshegs
45b5(rgyud 'grel): spyan drangs bsgom par bya/ /thabs dang shes rab dngos po dri med ting 'dzin las byung dam pa'i bde bas gsang bar ni/ dkyil 'khor bsams te de nas mthar byed la sogs bsrung byas nas/ /rang snying bzlas pa'i dam pa'i
45b6(rgyud 'grel): tsan dan sogs dang me tog mdzes pa phul te thim/ /rang dang 'dre ba'i cho gas dbang bskur byas nas 'di ltar nan tan mchod par bya/ /pad+ma'i nang gi rang gi sa bon 'od kyis drangs nas gzugs thams cad ni/ /pad+ma'i 'od zer dkyil 'khor
45b7(rgyud 'grel): yang dag byang chub yod kyi sa bon bsam par bya/ /shes rab so so'i ba spu las byung sna tshogs rnam pa'i 'od zer rgyas pa'i tshogs/ /ma lus khyab pa'i mkha' gzhi thams cad de nas blo dang ldan pas spro bar bya/ /'od zer sgo nas byung ba'i
46a1(rgyud 'grel): dri med thams cad rgyan gyis shin tu brgyan sku dang/ /me long pi wang dri dang ro yi snod dang na bza' chos 'byung la sogs dang/ /mtshan ma rnams kyi rim pas mdzes pas ldem bag chags ni lo ma 'od dang bcas/ /gsal ba'i 'od
46a2(rgyud 'grel): zer sprul pa mang po sna tshogs mchod pa'i sprin gyi dra ba rnam 'byung dang/ /sgyu ma la sogs dra ba'i dngos po so so yang dag rig pa'i 'jig rten lta dge dang/ /rtog pa thams cad nges grol mchog gi bde ba 'phyung rgyu'i dngos ldan pa'i//
46a3(rgyud 'grel): gzugs la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams kyis de bzhin phyi ma'i dri sogs thams cad kyis/ /dbye ba'i rtog pa grol bas rgyal ba'i dbang po rnams la yang dag mchod par bya/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dza badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ de yi
46a4(rgyud 'grel): 'og tu sgra brnyan 'dra bar sgra yul thams cad la ni yod bsams na/ /rang yid rig pa'i lha yi bstod pa'i sgra dang ldan pa'i chos rnams zhes su gsungs/ /gzugs la sogs pa gcig min rdul phran cha yang ma mthong du ma'i gzugs
46a5(rgyud 'grel): kyang ma yin zhes pa'ang de bzhin no/ /yan lag med pa'i rdul phran nyid la du ma'i rdul phra rab kyis rjes 'brang med phyir dang/ /sa yi dkyil 'khor la sogs gzugs kyi dbye bas de la 'ga' yang mi 'gyur ro/ /de bas 'dzin pa
46a6(rgyud 'grel): la sogs bral bas rang dbang gzugs la sogs pa kun brtags ngo bo yin/ /ma lus g.yo dang mi g.yo'i dngos po dri za'i grong khyer dag dang 'dra ba yin/ /bdag gir 'dzin pa'i rgyun gyis ngo bos 'khor ba 'di dag ste/ /dag pa
46a7(rgyud 'grel): yang ni de las ldog pa'i ngo bo tsam la rnam par shes par bya/ /chos nyid kyis ni srid dang zhi ba'i ngo bo 'dir ni dbye ba 'ga' yang med/ /ci'i phyir 'dzin pa la sogs rnam par bral ba rtag tu kun la sgrub pa'i phyir/ /thams
46b1(rgyud 'grel): cad 'ga' yang med de so sor snang ba'i rang bzhin rtog pa las/ /sems las gzhan du gyur pa'i nga zhes 'ga' yang med de de phyir bdag kyang de/ /gang gi ngo bo gang yin de yi de nyid rtog pa'i gzhi ste ci phyir dngos/ /de bas thams cad dbyer 
46b2(rgyud 'grel): med shes te dngos po thams cad dbyer med pa nyid yin/ /kha cig yul dang kha cig gzhan du snang bar rtogs pa phun sum tshogs pa gang zhig gis/ /de dang de yi bral dang bral ba'i phyis te de phyis thams cad ma yin no/ /dad dang brtson 'grus
46b3(rgyud 'grel): rnam par dag pa de bzhin dran pa bsam gtan dag pas kyang/ /dam pa'i sgo srung gzugs te shes rab rnam par dag pas thams cad yul du snang/ /mtshan ma med pa'i dag pa thams cad dag pas lha mo tshogs kyi rang bzhin dang/ /thams
46b4(rgyud 'grel): cad don dang bdag po rnam par rtog pa rab tu 'jug pa rnam par dag pa yis/ /me long la sogs mkha' chen po/ /rdo rje gsum mchog dkyil 'khor gsum/ /rdo rje dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rnam par snang mdzad dag pa che/ /rdo rje
46b5(rgyud 'grel): zhi ba dga' ba che/ /rang bzhin gyi ni 'od gsal mchog /ston pa rdo rje phyag 'tshal lo/ /rin chen rgyal po rab tu bzang/ /rdo rje nam mkha' dri ma med/ /dngos nyid dag pas gos pa med/ /rdo rje sku la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje mi 'chi
46b6(rgyud 'grel): 'dod chags che/ /mi rtog nam mkha' i rdo rje 'dzin/ /'dod chags pha rol phyin pa brnyes/ /rdo rje gsung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /don yod rdo rje rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /bsam pa thams cad yongs rdzogs pa'i/ /dag pa ngo bo nyid las byung
46b7(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje sems la phyag 'tshal lo/ /phyag 'tshal 'bar bas byin gyis brlabs pa'i rlung me'i dkyil 'khor gnas 'bar ba'i/ /bdud rtsi lnga la de nas 'bru gsum bzlas pa'i dkyil nas grangs med thub pa'i dbang/ /ye shes
