70b4(rgyud 'grel): par sbyangs pa longs spyod pa'i dug las 'chi ba la sogs pa 'byung ba'i nus pa ma mthong ba'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin du 'dir lus la sogs pa'i las phyir phyogs pa thun mong du gzhan nas bkag pa yin yang 'dir khyad
70b5(rgyud 'grel): par can gyi snying rje la sogs pas kun nas bslang bas 'dod pa ma yin pa'i 'bras bur mi 'gyur te/ /de ltar gyur pa'i gang zag rnams brtse bas spang ba la sogs pa'i las kyis gnod pa skyed pa lta bu dang/ /bud med
70b6(rgyud 'grel): chu la sogs pas khyer ba la sogs pa la sa'i 'du shes kyis bton pa ba dang 'dra ba yin no/ /byang chub sems dpa' dag la ji srid du dge ba la sogs pa'i yid la byed pas rab tu zhugs pa'i las de ni mngon par
70b7(rgyud 'grel): snad ba'i yul yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' i lam gyi mtshan nyid kho na yin pa'i phyir te/ snying rje ldan dang byams phyir dang/ sems dge ba la nyes pa med ces bya ba dang/ brtser ldan gzhan gyi don mthong na/ /bkag
71a1(rgyud 'grel): ba rnams kyang de la gnad zhes gang gsungs la/ /gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' i kun rtog las/ /dge ba 'am gal te mi dge ba 'am/ /gang phyir de yi yid dbang 'gyur/ /thams cad dge ba nyid
71a2(rgyud 'grel): yin no ces gsungs pa yin no/ /thabs la mkhas pa ma gtogs par srog gcod pa la sogs pa nges par ldog par rnam par bzhag pa yin pa'i phyir la/ /thabs la mkhas pa ni de gnang ba yin pa'i phyir te/ sum
71a3(rgyud 'grel): cu rtsa gsum pa'i mdo dang/ /mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa las kyang/ 'dir byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis thams cad du srog gcod pa las slar ldog par bya ste/ /gzhan du dkon mchog gsum la
71a4(rgyud 'grel): gnang bar byed pa'i sems can mthong na zhes bya ba'i bar dang/ de bzhin du ma byin par len pa las slar ldog par bya ste/ sems can ser sna can mthong na zhes bya ba'i bar dang/ de bzhin du gzhan gyi chung ma
71a5(rgyud 'grel): gzhan gyis yongs su bzung ba la brnab sems skyed par yang mi byed na 'on kyang yan lag ma yin pas bshad pa 'am/ /gnyis kyis gnyis sprod pa lta ci smos/ /gzhan du de lta bus 'dul ba rnams la ni zhes bya ba
71a6(rgyud 'grel): rgyas par gang gsungs pa yin pas bslab pa thams cad kyi cha blta bar bya'o/ /'dod chags kyi bsam pas kun nas bslang ba'i lus dang ngag gi las ni kun nas nyon mongs pa'i 'bras bu can yin pa'i phyir mi dge
71a7(rgyud 'grel): pa yin gyi rang gi ngo bos ni ma yin te/ de lung du ma bstan pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro/ /gang yang gzhan la phan pa'i bsam pas rab tu zhugs pa de ni bla na med pa'i 'bras bu skyed par byed pa nyid kyis byang chub
71b1(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' bslab pa'i rang bzhin no/ /bdag nyid kyi tshul khrims bsrung bar byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa' i kho na ma thob pa dang bcas par 'gyur ba ma yin te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis chos gang nges pa rnams kyi byang chub yon tan
71b2(rgyud 'grel): 'byung 'gyur pa/ /'di ni yon tan chos ldan rnams kyi tshul khrims don/ /chos gang phan byed rnams kyi byang chub yon tan nyams byed pa/ /'di ni tshul khrims 'chal ces 'dren pa rnams kyis gsungs zhes gang gsungs
71b3(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ /'phags pa blo gros mi bzad pas bstan pa las kyang thabs la mkhas pas thams cad la rnam par smad par mi bya'o zhes gsungs pa yin no/ /gzugs la sogs pa'i yul la longs spyod par mtshungs su zin
71b4(rgyud 'grel): kyang zhes pa'i dbang gis kha na ma thob dang bcas pa dang/ /kho na ma tho ba med par rnam par bzhag pa yin pa'i phyir ro/ /nyon mongs pa'i bdag nyid can gyi longs spyod la zhen par gyur pas la yul la longs spyod pa ni kun nas nyon
71b5(rgyud 'grel): mongs pa'i yul la longs spyad pa yin la/ nyon mongs pa'i bsam pa med pas ni kun nas nyon mongs pa can ma yin no/ /de yang rnam pa gsum ste/ /'jig rten pa'i 'bras bu dang rjes su mthun pa dang/ rang gi mya
71b6(rgyud 'grel): ngan las 'das pa dang rjes su mthun pa dang/ bla na med pa'i 'bras bu dang mthun pa'o/ /de la dang po ni mtho ris la sogs pa thob pa'i phyir lha la sogs pa rnams la ji lta ba bzhin du thob pa'i yul stob pa'i yid la byed
71b7(rgyud 'grel): po'o/ /gnyis pa nyan thos la sogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer ba yin te/ de kho na nyid du gzugs la sogs pa rnams la mi rtag pa la sogs pa'i rnam par so sor rtog pa yin te/ ji skad du yang dag par ldan pa'i lung las/
72a1(rgyud 'grel): dge slong dag dge slong gi mig gis gzugs mthong ba na gzugs rnams zil gyis gnon par byed kyi gzugs kyis de dag zil gyis gnan par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba nas/ /mi rtag par dmigs nas mi
72a2(rgyud 'grel): gnas par byed pa de'i phyir gzugs kyis zil gyis gnon par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar du rgyas par gsungs pa yin no/ /gsum pa la yang rnam pa bzhi ste/ smon lam la mos pas rab tu 'jug pa dang/ de kho
72a3(rgyud 'grel): na nyid 'ba' zhig so sor rtogs pas rab tu 'jug pa dang/ rgya che ba tsam gyi dmigs pas rab tu 'jug pa dang/ zab pa dang rgya che bas rab tu 'jug pa'o/ /de la gzugs la sogs pas snang ba thob pa rnams kyi de'i rang
72a4(rgyud 'grel): bzhin ngo bo nyams su myong ba'i rjes su 'brang nas 'gro ba ma lus pa la phan pa bskyed pa'i sems dpa' la mngon du phyogs pa nyid yin te/ spyod yul yongs su dag pa las 'dir byang chub sems dpa' i mig gis gzugs yid bde ba'i
72a5(rgyud 'grel): gnas su gyur pa mthong ba na sems can thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i mchog thob par gyur cig ces de ltar yang sems bskyed par bya'o/ /yid mi bde ba'i gnas su gyur pa mthong ba na sems can thams cad
72a6(rgyud 'grel): 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las skyo bar gyur cig ces de ltar yang sems bskyed par bya'o/ /btang snyoms kyi gnas su gyur pa mthong na sems can thams cad chos thams cad la sems mnyam par gyur cig ces de ltar
72a7(rgyud 'grel): yang sems bskyed par bya'o zhes rgya cher gang gsungs pa dang/ de ltar mdo sde'i rgyan las kyang/ /ji lta ji ltar dbang po'i spyod yul la/ /brtse ldan bdag nyid sbyod pas 'jug gyur pas/ /de lta de ltar ci rigs
72b1(rgyud 'grel): mthun gnas te/ brtse bas sems can dag la mngon du byed ces gsungs pa yin no/ /gnyis pa ni brtse ba dang bcas pas sems can gyi khams la bltos pa dang bcas pas yul la longs spyod pa ma lus la? rnams la
72b2(rgyud 'grel): bdag med pa'i so sor rtog pa'i yid la byed pa yin te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs kyi bu dge slong chos smra ba de la bdud sdig can gyis bar chad bya ba'i phyir sems bsgyur ba'i gzugs dang/ /sgra dang dri dang ro
72b3(rgyud 'grel): dang reg bya dag nye bar bstan pa de dag 'dir thabs la mkhas pa dang/ shes rab kyis zil gyis mnan nas yongs su spyod par bya'o zhes rgyas par gang gsungs pa yin te/ de kho na nyid yid la byed pa ni nyes pa ma
72b4(rgyud 'grel): lus pa skye ba'i gnyen po nyid yin pa'i phyir ro/ /gang gi phyir 'dor ba ma yin pa'i las mngon par bsgrub pa yang de kho na nyid la so sor rtogs pas nyams shing zad par 'gyur te/ de'i dpal gis ni 'dod pa'i
72b5(rgyud 'grel): 'bras bu bskyed pa'i nus pa nye bar bcom par 'gyur na gang du yang dag par so sor rtog pa'i bdag nyid can gyi gzugs la sogs pa khong du chud pa de la nyon mongs pa can gyi las kyi skabs lta ga la yod/ /phyin
72b6(rgyud 'grel): ci log gi sems kyi khyad par nyon mongs pa can gyi las ni bdag med pa so sor rtog pa de dang 'gal ba'i phyir cig car skye bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de skad du yang/ 'jig rten sna tshogs gang de 'dod pa min/ skyes
72b7(rgyud 'grel): bu'i kun rtog 'dod chags 'dod pa yin no/ /'jig rten sna tshogs de bzhin gnas kyang ni/ /'on kyang brtan rnams 'di la 'dod pa spangs zhes gsungs so/ /gsum pa la yang rgya che ba la dmigs pa nyid kyi 
73a1(rgyud 'grel): phyir rang gi bdag nyid kyi gzugs la sogs pa yang tha mal pa'i gzugs la zhen pa'i gnyen po nyid yin pas brgyud pas rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi go 'phang la 'jog pa'i rgyu yin te/ rdzogs pa'i
73a2(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo'i nga rgyal gyis rjes su mthun pa'i gzugs la sogs pa longs spyod pa'i phyir ro/ /gal te de lta yin du chug na de lta na yang bcom ldan 'das rang gi ngo bor yongs su bsgoms pa de ni don dam pa nyid
73a3(rgyud 'grel): du rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhe na/ de lta na ni tha mal pa'i bdag gis longs spyad pa yang yod par mi 'gyur te/ de kho na nyid du gang zag la sogs pa med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /
73a4(rgyud 'grel): ji ltar bdag gis gzugs la sogs pa mthong ngo zhes zhen pas yul du byas pa'i gzugs la sogs pa de dag ni de kho na nyid du de ltar yod pa ma yin no zhes bstan pa dang 'dra'o/ /de bas na de kho na nyid du
73a5(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa la bltos pa med pa'i zhen pa 'ga' zhig ni mi 'dod pa skyed pa nyid kyi phyir mi dge ba yin la /cig shos ni mchog gi skyes bu'i don la mkho ba nyid kyi phyir dge ba yin no zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das
73a6(rgyud 'grel): kyi gzhung las mthong ngo/ /de nyid kyi phyir ming tsam gyi sgo nas kyang rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi nga rgyal ni phun sum tshogs pa mchog rdzogs par byed pa'i rgyu yin no zhes rnam par bzhag pa yin gyi bdag nyid kyis nye bar
73a7(rgyud 'grel): longs spyod pa kho nas thams cad dge ba'i bdag nyid du mi 'gyur ro zhes rnam par gzhag pa ni mi nus te/ bsam pa'i dbang gis de yang dge ba'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'ga' zhig lo
73b1(rgyud 'grel): stong phrag brgya cur de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor dge slong stong phrag brgya cu dang bcas pa re re la bskal pa du mar bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis stob par byed la byang chub sems dpa' gzhan 'ga' zhig kyang dam pa ? pa ?
73b2(rgyud 'grel): gzung ba'i rgyus bdag nyid bsod snyoms kyis longs spyod par byed na snga ma de bas byang chub sems dpa' 'di la bsod nams mang du 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa yin no/ /rnam par rtog pa bzhi pa ni nyid kyi rang
73b3(rgyud 'grel): bzhin ngo bo nyid rtog pa'i dri ma ma lus pa spangs pas bde bar gshegs pa'i sku'i bdag nyid can 'od zer can gyi tshogs rnam pa du ma'i sgo las yang dag par byung ba'i sprul pa sna tshogs rnam par 'phro bas
73b4(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ba ma lus pa'i don mdzad pa la gzhol ba de dang rjes su mthun pa'i gzugs la sogs pa gong du smos pa'i khyad par gyis dngos po ma lus pa mnyam pa nyid kyis blta ba ni gcig tu phun sum tshogs pa mchog gi rgyu
73b5(rgyud 'grel): yin te/ mngon sum du bsgrub par bya ba'i ngo bo la dmigs pa nyid kyis phyir ro/ /de lta bu'i rnam pa'i gzugs la sogs pa la ma nges par dpyod pa'i bdag nyid kyi rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mchod pa la kha na ma tho ba dang
73b6(rgyud 'grel): bcas par dogs pa nyid ni kha na ma tho ba chen po'i rgyu ma yin te/ tha mal pa'i phyin ci log gi yid la byed pa'i gnyen po nyid kyis 'di ni lhag pa'i tshul khrims kyi bslab pa'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir ro/ /mig
73b7(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa'i yul yang dag pa ma yin pa rnams la yid la byed pa thams cad 'gog pas mya ngan las 'das pa mchog gi gzhi nyid yin pa'i phyir sdom pa mchog gi don yin no/ /de ltar yang/ mig gi stobs
74a1(rgyud 'grel): legs ba ste/ rna ba'i sdom pa legs pa yin/ /sna yi sdom pa legs pa ste/ lce yi sdom pa legs pa yin/ /lus kyi sdom pa legs pa ste/ /yid kyi sdom pa legs pa yin/ /dge slong kun tu bsdams
74a2(rgyud 'grel): pa yis/ /sdug bsngal kun las rab tu grol zhes gsungs so/ /rang dang gzhan rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ngo bor dmigs pa nyid kyis lhag pa'i sems kyis bslab pa'i rang bzhin la/ rang gi ngo bo la phyin ci ma log pas lhag
74a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i shes rab kyi bslab pa la dmigs pa yang yin no/ /de bzhin du ser sna la sogs pa'i nyes pa las ldog pa nyid kyis pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa ma lus pa nang du 'dus pa ni snga ma'i rjes su 'brang nas blta bar bya'o/ /
74a4(rgyud 'grel): rnam pa de lta bu'i byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa dang rjes su mthun pa'i rang bzhin las rnam par log pa rnams ni rgyu'i mchog spangs pas rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi snod du mi 'gyur zhing/ gnas ma yin pa la skrag pa ni don med
74a5(rgyud 'grel): pa brgyud pa bskyed par byed pa'i rgyu nyid yin te/ 'gro ba gang zhig rmongs pa'i rgyu yis gnas ma yin la skrag 'gyur ba/ yun rings dus su bsod nams phung po chen po min pa 'byung 'gyur rgyus/ /rigs med
74a6(rgyud 'grel): bshes med bla mo sbyangs shing snga mar dge ba ma bskyed pas/ /chos 'di dag la skrag par gyur ba don chen 'di las nyams par 'gyur/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub gzhan don mchog gi rgyur gyur sna tshogs mthu
74a7(rgyud 'grel): yi gnas/ /de las de dang mnyam nyid sems 'di 'ba' zhig rgyu'i mchog yin zhes/ /bdag gis bshad par gyur ba las cung zad dri med bsod nams des/ /sangs rgyas ye shes 'khrul spangs blo can skye
74b1(rgyud 'grel): po byang chub thob gyur cig /slob dpon sangs rgyas ye shes kyi zhal snga nas kyis mdzad pa bdag sgrub pa la 'jug pa zhes bya ba rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta shAn+ti b+ha dra dang lots+tsha pa mgos lhas btsas kyi bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab
74b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// (//rje btsun 'dags pa gnod 'dzin chu dbang gi sgrubs thabs slob dpon chen po sangs rgyas ye shes kyis mdzad pa'o//) */ /rgya gar skad du/ b+haTTa rA ga A rya dzaM b+ha la dza len+d+ra sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ rje btsun 'phags pa gnod 'dzin
74b3(rgyud 'grel): chu dbang gi sgrub pa'i thabs/ /sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung ldan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang/ sdom pa dang/ dbang bskur ba dang/ brtson 'grus dang dad pa dang ldan pa'i sngags pas gnas yid du
74b4(rgyud 'grel): 'ong par maN+Dal dang mchod pa dang gtor ma bshams te/ bstan bde ba la ci bde bar gnas pas bla ma dang/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang/ 'phags pa dzaM b+ha la yang bskul te/ phyag 'tshal ba la sogs pa yan
74b5(rgyud 'grel): lag bdun pa bya'o/ /de nas tshad med pa bzhi bsgoms nas byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /de nas shU n+ya tAs stong pa nyid du bsgoms la/ /de'i ngang las pad+ma dang zla ba'i steng du yi ge dzaM ser po dang/ bi dza pU ra yongs su gyur pa las
74b6(rgyud 'grel): byung ba'i 'phags pa dzaM b+ha la sku mdog gser btso ma 'dra ba /gsus pa rab tu che ba /sangs rgyas lnga'i rin po che'i cod pan dang lha'i ras kyis brgyan pa/ rgyan ma lus pas brgyan pa/ zhal gcig pa phyag gnyis pa
74b7(rgyud 'grel): g.yas pa na bi dza pU ra 'dzin pa/ g.yon ne'u le'i kha nas 'bar ba'i rin po che yongs su 'dzin pa/ utpa la sngon po'i phreng ba can 'od zer dpag tu med pa 'khrigs pa/ zhabs kyi 'og na rin po che'i snye ma'i bum pa
75a1(rgyud 'grel): yod pa/ steng gi ngos gnyis na rin po che'i snyem las nor gyi char 'bebs ba 'am/ /'bebs pa'i gnod sbyin gnyis so/ /'di lta bu rab tu gsal bar bsgom mo/ /de nas rang gi snying ga'i dzaM yig las 'od zer
75a2(rgyud 'grel): 'phros pas/ /de dang 'dra ba'i 'phags pa dzaM b+ha la mdun gyi nam mkha' la gnas pa la/ mchod pa dngos dang yid las byung bas mchod la/ /mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad bas bstod de/ gnyis su med par byas la gnas gsum
75a3(rgyud 'grel): du yi ge 'bru gsum dang/ phyag rgyas brgyan no/ /lag pa gnyis khu tshur bcangs te gung mo'i tshigs dbus ma dang/ gsum pa bkug pa 'di ni phyag rgya'o/ /de nas dbang bskur te rin chen rdo rje dbu rgyan du
75a4(rgyud 'grel): bsam mo/ /de nas dgod pa ni/ spyi bor oM/ kha la dzaM/ dpung pa g.yas pa la b+ha /g.yon pa la la /snying gar dzaM /brla g.yas pa la le/ /g.yon pa la tra /gsang gnas su ye/ byin pa dag la swA /rkang
75a5(rgyud 'grel): mthil dag la hA dgod do/ /de nas ser sna can dang dbul po rnams la dmigs/ spro bsdu ci nus byas te yid skyon sngags bzlas so/ /de nas yi ge brgya pa brjod la/ dge ba ji ltar 'dod par bsdos la btang ngo/
75a6(rgyud 'grel): langs la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ci rigs par bklag go /phyi rol che chung byas nas khrus bya'o/ /mnyam par 'jog tsan yi ge brgya pas brtan par bya'o/ /'di ltar thun mtshams gsum mam bzhir
75a7(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /thun mtshams re re la yang dang po dang tha mar mchod pa dang bstod pa byas la thun tha ma la gshegs su gsol zhing/ /thun dang po la spyan drangs te/ mchod pa yang dngos su ma 'byor na yid kyis bya'o/ /
75b1(rgyud 'grel): gtor ma yang thun mtshams thun mtshams kyi dang po 'jug ka 'jug kar sbyin no/ /yang nas yang du spyod lam gyi bya bar chu dbul ba dang/ mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad gdon no/ /yang na bdag nyid lhag pa'i lha gang yang rung ba'i na bza' ?
75b2(rgyud 'grel): du gnas par bzlas pa dang bstod pa dang chu dbul bas bsgrub ste/ de'i rim pa yang 'phags pa dzaM b+ha la'i lugs ma rab tu gnas par byas la bya/ gong ngam nyi ma'i rtse la snod bzang po gas chags dang bug rdol med par
75b3(rgyud 'grel): de bzhugs la bstod pa dang bzlas pa ci nus byas te/ de nas chu phul la dngos grub gsol ba gdab po/ /de nas yang za ma tog ser po dri zhim pos bkang bar sba'o/ /de la chu dbul ba'i man ngag ni zla ba dang rdo rje bsam//
75b4(rgyud 'grel): yi ge aM las gdu bu ni/ /so sor mkhrig mar bsam par bya/ /baM ni zla ba'i mdog can te/ /de las bdud rtsi rab 'bab pa/ dri med ser po mngon phyogs pas/ /mkhas pas bum pa bzhin du blta/ /mdzub
75b5(rgyud 'grel): mo pa ni nor bu bzang/ /gang zag zhes bya gung mo la'o/ /srin lag la ni nor sbyin te/ /nor sbyin chen po mthe chung la/ mthe bor bi tsi kuN+Da li/ /ka li ma li mkhrig ma ste/ /sgo dbang spyod pa'i dbang po dag /
75b6(rgyud 'grel): lag pa'i ngos la rnam par bsam/ /sngags pas gnod 'dzin chu dbang ni/ /lag pa'i dbus su rnam bzhag ste/ rang rang sngags kyis rim bzhin bsam/ /dang po yi ge aM dang ni/ /rasna badzra rang ming ldan/ /
75b7(rgyud 'grel): bzhi yi mdza' dang de bzhin du/ swAhAr bcas pas sngags su grags/ /rdo rje bdud rtsi lag par bsam/ /ji ltar spyi bor cho ga bzhin/ /mkhas pas chu yi sbyin glugs brgya/ /nyin re legs par dbul zhes so/ /dmar
76a1(rgyud 'grel): dang ser dang ser bo dang/ /sngo dang dmar dang ljang gu dang/ /ser po dag dang gser mdog dang/ /de dag gis ni kha dog bstan/ /g.yas na lcags kyu zhags pa dang ne'u le/ /g.yon pa dza pu ratna rdo rje
76a2(rgyud 'grel): lcags kyu dang/ /ne'u le can gyi lag pa bstan la brten pa'o/ /de nas bzlas pa'i sngags ni ji ltar bkod pa nyid dam/ /yang na dzaM b+ha la swA hA zhes pa'o/ /chu dbul ba'i sngags ni ji ltar btus pa nyid dam yang
76a3(rgyud 'grel): na bzlas pa'i sngags kyi 'jug la/ /d+ha naM me de hi swAhA zhes pa spel ba 'am/ /yang na oM dzluM tsluM swAhA zhes pa'o/ /yang na oM dzaM b+ha la dza len+d+rA d+ha naM me de hi swAhA zhes pa'o/ /chu dbul ba na yang gtso bo la khyor ba'am
76a4(rgyud 'grel): snyim pa brgya rtsa brgyad dbul zhing gnod sbyin brgyad po la yang snyim pa re re 'am gsum gsum mam bdun yan chad dbul lo/ /dbul ba ni ting nge 'dzin gyis ci bde bar ro/ /kha zas za ba na yan lag la lha rnams
76a5(rgyud 'grel): dgod do/ /oM dzaM b+ha la dza len+d+ra ye swAhA /oM ma Ni b+ha drA ya swAhA/ oM pUr+Na b+ha drA ya swAhA/ oM d+ha na dA ya swAhA/ oM paM sh+ra ba NA ya swAhA/ oM pi tsi kuN+Da li ni swAhA/ oM ki li mi li ne swAhA/ oM mu khen+d+rA ya swAhA/
76a6(rgyud 'grel): oM tsa ren+d+rA ya swAhA/ thams cad kyi swA hA'i sngon du d+ha ni me de hi zhes pa spel la/ /chu phul nas 'khor lo la thim pa 'am gshegs su gsol lo/ /sbyor ba 'dis tshe 'di nyid la dbul ba 'dor ba dang 'byor ba mi bzad
76a7(rgyud 'grel): pa thob bo/ /sbyor ba 'di dman pas kyang srid pa gzhan la 'byor ba tha med par 'gyur ro/ /longs spyod rnams dkon mchog dang pha ma dang bla ma dang sdug bsngal ba rnams la zad par bya bar bsam zhing zang bar yang bya'o/ /gzhan
76b1(rgyud 'grel): du na 'grub pa med do/ /nan tur du bya bar rigs pas nan tur du byed na rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi rnal 'byor la gnas pas spra tshil las byas pa'i mtshan ma rab tu 'dra ba la dug dang tsha ba gsum dang ske tshe dang tsha ba'i mar khu dang khrag gis byugs la
76b2(rgyud 'grel): de'i sngags zlos pas dur khrod kyi me la gdungs na zhag bdun gyis mngon sum du ci 'dod pa ster ro/ /de nas bzod par gsol la mtshan ma gnas dben par bzhag ste/ rdzas dang dpral bar bya'o/ /nan tur gyis sgrub pa'o/ /da ni
76b3(rgyud 'grel): mnyes par bya bas thabs gzhan bshad par bya'o/ /gser dngul lam zangs lcags kyi sheg pu la pad+ma 'dab brgyal pa gnyis byas la/ /gcig la snga ma lta bu'i lha dgu bya/ gcig la lha mo dgu bri zhing de nas rab gnas
76b4(rgyud 'grel): byas la da gnyis kha sbyar bas mnyes bar bsams la mar dang sbrang rtsi dang ka ras gril la za ma tog ser pos bkang pa'i dbus su brtsal te maN+Dal khru brgyad pa/ /gru bzhi ba byi dor legs par byas la me tog ser po bkram
76b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i dbus su za ma gtog bzhag la dus gsum du mchod pa bya ba dang bstod pa dang/ bskor ba dang bzlas ba byas na dngos grub chen po brgyad kyang ster na dngos grub phal pa lta ci smos /nor rgyun ma ni gser mdog la g.yas
76b6(rgyud 'grel): mchog sbyin/ g.yon 'bras kyi snye ma 'dzin pa/ rgyan ma lus pa dang ldan zhing rab tu mdzes pa'i na chung ma'o/ /zla 'od ma dang sbyin ma dang/ rab sbyin ma dang 'phags ma dang/ rab bzang ma dang sbas ma dang/ /lha mo
76b7(rgyud 'grel): dang ni dbyangs can ma/ /rang rang gi grog po dang mdog dang lag cha 'dra ba'o/ /nor lha brgyad chung ma dang bcas pa phyag gnyis par yang rung ngo/ /oM ba su d+hA ri Ni d+ha naM me de hi swA hA/ oM tsan+d+ra kankyai swA hA/ oM d+ha na dA ya swA hA/ oM su
77a1(rgyud 'grel): b+ha tryai swA hA/ oM A rya yai swA hA/ oM suM b+ha tryai swA hA/ oM gub tyai swA hA/ oM dat+tyai swAhA/ oM swa ra swa styai swA hA/ sgrub pa na d+ha na me de hi zhes spel la bzlas so/ /rje btsun dzaM b+ha la'i sgrub pa'i thabs slob dpon mi
77a2(rgyud 'grel): bskyod rdo rje sangs rgyas ye shes kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po shud+ha ka re b+ha tra dang/ lo tsa ba dge slong chos kyi shes rab kyis bsgyur ba'o/ /gnod sbyin thams cad dzaM b+ha la bzhin la/ gnod sbyin
77a3(rgyud 'grel): mo thams cad nor rgyun ma bzhin no zhes gsang ba'i dzaM b+ha la'i sgrubs thabs nas 'byung ngo/ /kha dog so so las zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa phyag g.yas pa thams cad la bi dza bU ra dang/ g.yon thams cad
77a4(rgyud 'grel): ne'u la'o zhes rgya che ba'i sgrub thabs las gsungs so// //rgya gar skad du/ gu hya dzaM b+ha la sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ gsang ba'i dzaM b+ha la'i sgrub thabs/ /'phags pa dzi b+ha la la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de la
77a5(rgyud 'grel): thog mar re zhig sngags pas gdong gi gtsang sbra la sogs pa byas nas/ /skye bo med pa'i sa phyogs su bde ba'i stan la gnas te/ bdag gis rje btsun dzaM b+ha la mnyes par byas la sems can thams cad mchog gi bde ba
77a6(rgyud 'grel): la sbyar bar bya'o zhes byang chub kyi sems bskyed la/ rang gi snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la dzaM gi yi ge ser po bltas te/ de'i 'od kyis bla ma dang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang/ rje btsun dzaM b+ha la mdun du
77a7(rgyud 'grel): bsams la yang dag par mchod de phyag byas te/ sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa byas te/ 'jigs pas sdigs pa thams cad bshags par bya/ /dga' bas 'gro ba'i dge la rjes yi rang/ dkon mchog gsum la
77b1(rgyud 'grel): skyabs su mchi/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems ni rnam par gzung/ /de'i rjes su byams pa dang snying rje dang dga' ba dang btang snyoms bsgom par bya'o/ /oM shU na tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+ha ba At+ma kohaM zhes pa'i sngags ni thams cad stong pa nyid
77b2(rgyud 'grel): du bsgom par bya'o/ /de'i rjes su smon lam gyi shugs kyis naM khaM baM laM gi sa bon las skyes pa'i sna tshogs pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa'i steng du zla ba la dzaM ser po las skyes pa'i bcom ldan 'das dzaM b+ha la bsgom par bya ste/ rgyan thams
77b3(rgyud 'grel): cad 'dzin pa gser gyi kha dog can/ lto ba 'phyang ba/ g.yon pa dang g.yas pa'i phyag dag gis sre mong dang sa bon gang ba 'dzin pa/ rin chen 'byung ldan gyi gcod pan can utpa la'i phreng pa 'dzin pa'o/ /shar la
77b4(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa'i 'dab ma rnams su nor bu bzang po dang/ gang ba bzang po dang/ nor sbyin dang/ rnam thos rnams so/ /me la sogs pa'i 'dab ma rnams la rna rgyan ko slebs dang/ rol ba 'khyil ba dang/ rtsen pa'i phreng ba
77b5(rgyud 'grel): dang/ grong gi dbang phyug dang/ de bzhin du spyod pa'i dbang phyug ste bshad pa'i rim pas der de ltar nor rgyun ma dang/ zla mdzes ma dang/ sbyin ma dang/ legs sbyin ma dang/ 'phags ma dang/ legs bzang ma
77b6(rgyud 'grel): dang/ spas ma dang/ lha mo dang/ dbyangs can ma ste/ /gnod sbyin mo 'di dag rnam bsam par bya'o/ /nor rgyun ma dang dzaM b+ha la lhan cig tu'o/ /gnod sbyin ma thams cad nor rgyun ma bzhin no/ /gnod sbyin thams cad dzaM
77b7(rgyud 'grel): b+ha la bzhin no/ /'di ltar bsams te sngags bzlas par bya ste/ de la gnod sbyin rnams kyi ni/ oM dzaM b+ha la dza len+d+rA ya d+ha na me de hi de hi swA hA/ oM ma Ni b+ha drA ya swA hA/ oM pUr+N+Na b+ha drA ya swA hA/ oM d+ha na dA ya swA hA/ oM bai
78a1(rgyud 'grel): sha pa NA ya swA hA/ oM bi tsa kuN+Da li ne swA hA/ oM ki li mi'i ne ya swA hA/ oM mu khen+d+ra ye swA hA/ oM tsa ren+d+rA ya swA hA/ de nas gnod sbyin mo rnams kyi sngags ni/ oM ba su d+ha ri N+ye swA hA/ oM tsan+d+ra? kan+tye?
78a2(rgyud 'grel): swA hA/ oM dat+tyai swA hA/ oM pra dat+tyai swA hA/ oM A rya yai swAhA/ oM pUr+N+Na b+ha tryai swAhA/ oM gub tyai swAhA/ oM de pyai swAhA/ oM sa ra swa styai swAhA/ 'di lta bu thun gsum du bzlas pas chu khyor ba brgya rtsa brgyad ster ba la 'jig
78a3(rgyud 'grel): rten gsum gyi rgyal srid ster ro/ /tho rangs bya rog mi grag par chu'i dbus su bzlas na nor mdzad pa med cing 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas gser la sogs pa'i 'dab ma la nor rgyun ma dang/ gnod sbyin mo lhan cig pa dang/
78a4(rgyud 'grel): 'dab ma gnyis pa la bcom ldan 'das dzaM b+ha la la gnod sbyin gyis yongs su bskor ba bris nas mar dang sbrang rtsi dang ka ras sbyar te/ rab gnas legs par byas la/ mnyes par byas na grub pa chen po brgyad ster ro/ /zho dang bu ram
78a5(rgyud 'grel): dang bcas pa'i zan dang sha dang/ chang spangs pa'i gtor ma bzlas pa'i sngags kyis rgyun tu sbyin no/ /slob dpon sangs rgyas ye shes zhabs kyis mdzad pa/ gsang ba'i dzaM b+ha la'i bsgrub thabs rdzogs so// //mkhas
78a6(rgyud 'grel): pa chen po dza ya se na'i zhal snga nas dang/ btsun pa d+harmA yon tan gyis bsgyur ba'o// //rgya gar skad du/ bsti ra dzaM b+ha la sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ rgya che ba'i dzaM b+ha la'i sgrub pa'i thabs/ /nor gyi dbang phyug la
78a7(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal lo/ /sngon bzhin du thams cad byas la/ stong pa nyid bsgoms pa'i rjes su cung zad dmar ba'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gnod sbyin gyi shing lta bu'i steng du pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa'i rnam pa'o/ /de'i dbus su baM gi sa bon
78b1(rgyud 'grel): las nor rgyun ma sku mdog ser mo 'bras kyi snye ma dang mchog sbyin mdzad pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis bklubs pa mo/ /gnod sbyin mo brgyad kyis bskor ba 'di lta ste/ zla 'bras/ sbyin ma/ legs sbyin ma/ 'phags ma rnams ni phyogs kyi'o/ /
78b2(rgyud 'grel): legs bzang ma/ sbas ma/ lha mo dang/ dbyangs can ma nas mtshams kyi zer te 'di dag go /bzang mo dang/ shin tu bzang mo dang/ mdzes ma dang/ sbas ma dang/ shin tu spas ma dang/ dbyangs can ma dang/ 'phags ma dang/
78b3(rgyud 'grel): zla mdzes ma'o/ /'di rnams kyis yongs su bskor ba'i lha mo chen mo de'i b+ha ga'i dbus su dzaM gi yi ge las skyes pa'i dzaM b+ha la nor rgyun ma la 'khyud cing kha sbyar ba las byang chub kyi sems rnam par 'thon pa las skyes pa'i rin po che'i tshogs
78b4(rgyud 'grel): kyis phyag rgya can rab tu gsal bar bsgom par bya ste/ 'dzag pa'i tshul du bcom ldan 'das kyis shar la sogs pa'i phyogs su nor bu bzang po sku mdog sngon po'o/ /lhor gang ba bzang po ser po/ /nub tu nor sbyin dmar
78b5(rgyud 'grel): po/ /byang du rnam thos sras ser po/ /me dang bden bral dang rlung dang dbang ldan gyi gra rnams su rna rgyan ko sleb sngon po rtsen pa'i phreng ba dmar po/ /gdong gi dbang phyug ljang gu /gser gyi mdog can gyi spyod pa'i dbang phyug
78b6(rgyud 'grel): ste/ zur phung lnga pa can g.yas pa'i phyag na sa bon pi bU ra gang ba dang/ g.yon pa'i phyag na rin po che'i char 'bebs pa'i sre mo 'dzin pa/ sangs rgyas lnga'i dbu rgyan can/ de bzhin gshegs pa lnga 'phro ba/ de dag
78b7(rgyud 'grel): gis kyang rin po che'i char 'bebs par bsam/ zhabs kyi 'og nas dung gis 'gro ba dang/ pad+ma'i tshogs kyi gter dang/ rin po che la sogs pa'i char khyim du zhabs kyis 'bebs bar bsam par bya'o/ /dpal dzam b+ha la mgon
79a1(rgyud 'grel): po mdog ser po utpa la'i phreng ba 'dzin pa'o/ /gnod sbyin brgyad po 'di rnams kyi yang yum gyi b+ha ga'i dbus nas rin po che'i char 'bebs par gyur pa dzaM b+ha la dang 'dra ba bsgom par bya'o/ /
79a2(rgyud 'grel): shar gyi sgor nor sbyin dang nor sbyin chen po dgod/ lho sgor gnod sbyin dang gnod sbyin chen po dgod/ /nub sgor rtsen pa dang rtsen pa chen po dgod/ /byang sgor gang ba dang shin tu gang ba dgod/ 'di rnams
79a3(rgyud 'grel): gcer bu 'bras bu 'phyang zhing lto ba 'chang ba rin po che'i char 'bebs pa rnams so/ /mgo bo la nor bu bzang po mig gnyis la rnam thos kha la grong gi dbang phyug go /nu ma'i bar du gang ba bzang po/ /lte bar
79a4(rgyud 'grel): nor sbyin/ brla dag la rtsen pa'o/ /rna rgyan ko sleb dang spyod pa'i dbang phyugs gnyis ni rkang pa gnyis la ste 'di ni lha dgod pa'o/ /yi ge dgod pa ni gtso bo'i lus la sngags dged par bya ste/ spyi bor oM/ kha
79a5(rgyud 'grel): la dzaM/ lag pa gnyis la b+ha la/ snying la dza/ lte bar len/ brla gnyis la dra ye/ ngar gdong gnyis la swAhA'o/ /gzhan yang yod/ spyi bor oM/ dpral bar dzluM/ rna ba dag la tsu luM/ mgo'i rgyab tu swa/
79a6(rgyud 'grel): mkhrig mar oM/ lag pa'i dbus su dzluM/ sen mo'i rtse mo thams cad la tsa luM/ /sor mo'i rtsa ba thams cad du swAhA'o/ /oM dzaM b+ha la dza len+d+ra ye swAhA/ oM dzluM tsluM swAhA/ zhes bya ba chu'i sngags so/ /de
79a7(rgyud 'grel): bzhin du mdzub mo la nor bu bzang po/ /gung mo la gang ba bzang po/ /srin lag la nor sbyin/ /mthe'u chung la rnam sras/ /lag pa'i logs su grong gi dbang phyug /rna rgyan ko sleb ni mthe bo la'o/ /sdigs mdzub '
79b1(rgyud 'grel): dang mthe bo'i bar du spyod pa'i dbang phyug /lag pa'i dbus su dzaM b+ha la dza len+d+ra'o/ /yi ge 'di rnams dngos su lha yin te lag pa la dgod par byas nas rdo rje'i chu la sogs pa'i bdud rtsi lnga yis sbyin par bya'o/ /lnga po med na yang re dang bsres
79b2(rgyud 'grel): ba 'am/ lang na rdo rje'i chu dang bsres pa khyor ba gang 'thungs nas lag pa khyor ba brgya rtsa brgyad thun pa zhir byin na lha yun mi ring par 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /gser dngul la sogs pa yang dag par 'phel zhing sa gzhi rdzas kyis gang bar
79b3(rgyud 'grel): byed do/ /oM dzluM tsluM bluM saM(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba brjod pas chu'i khyor ba rnam par sbyin par bya'o/ /de ltar byas kyang gal te ma grub na de'i tshe dpal rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi gzugs su bdag nyid bsgoms te dzaM b+ha la'i sku dug dang ske tshe dang lan tshwa dang da
79b4(rgyud 'grel): du ra'i lo ma'i khu ba dang dur khrod kyi sol bas byugs nas dus gsum du bsro zhing skam par bya'o/ /phyis dur khrod kyi me la gdung bar bya ste khros pas nges par 'grub po/ /rgya che ba'i dzaM b+ha la'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so// //
79b5(rgyud 'grel): gro sbyin dbang po'i sgrubs thabs 'di gsum dbang ma thob pa la sbyin du mi gtub po// // */ (/stang stabs kyis bkod pa slob dpon chen po sangs rgyas ye shes kyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa bzhugs so//) //bgegs rnams ma lus
79b6(rgyud 'grel): skrag mdzad pa/ /dpal ldan rdo rje hUM mdzad la/ kun nas dang bas phyag 'tshal te/ /stang stabs rim pa bshad par bya/ /g.yon brgyad? dpe dang mthun pa'i stabs/ /sa ga'i 'dug stangs g.yas brkyang dang/ /zlum por gnas dang rkang
79b7(rgyud 'grel): pa gcig /rus sbal rkang stabs mdun par bshad/ /gang yang gshol dbyibs lta bur ni/ /g.yon pa'i brla dang pus mo gnyis/ /g.yas pa'i byin pa brlar bcad te/ /thad kar 'jog par byed pa dang/ /rgyad ni rkang
80a1(rgyud 'grel): mdza' i lngar bcas pa/ /g.yon brkyang par ni rab tu grags/ /rkang mthebs dang ni rting pa dang/ /mnyam por shin tu bcer ba ni/ /bstan pa mthun pa'i rkang stabs su/ /de nyid shes pa rnams kyis bshad/ /rkang pa'i
80a2(rgyud 'grel): sor mo phyir bstan cing/ /pus mo'i lha nga gnyis brkyang ste/ /rgyar ni nyi? shu rtsa drug sor/ /sa ga'i 'dug stangs yin bar brjod/ /g.yon las yongs su bzlog pa ni/ /g.yas brkyang bar ni shes par bya/ /gang dU pus
80a3(rgyud 'grel): mo gnyis 'jog pa'i/ /gnas su lag gnyis 'jog pa ni/ /dang pa'i gshog pa ltar byas pa/ /zlum pa'i 'dug stangs yin par 'dod/ /g.yas pa'i brlang ni g.yon pa gzugs/ /de ni rkang pa gcig ces bya/ /
80a4(rgyud 'grel): g.yas pas g.yon pa'i sor mo mnan/ /rus sbal rkang stabs yin par bshad/ /dang po bcu yin gnyis pa lnga/ /gsum pa drug ste bzhi pa dgu /lnga pa de bzhin drug pa gnyis/ /bdun pa la ni gcig dang sbyar/ /
80a5(rgyud 'grel): de dag kyang gang zhe na/ seng ge'i stang stabs dang/ seng ge'i glal ba dang/ rdo rje sgrog dang/ rdo rje tho ba dang/ bud med kyi sgyu 'phrul dang/ rdo rje dral ba dang/ rdo rje mche ba dang/ ral gri'i thabs dang/ lcags kyu'i thabs
80a6(rgyud 'grel): dang/ mdung thung gi thabs dang/ thag mdung 'phen thabs dang/ rdo rje'i stang stabs dang/ rdo rje gsong ba dang/ rdo rje ro langs dang/ gtun shing gi thabs dang/ ba dan gyi thabs dang/ rdo rje 'gugs byed dang/ rdo rje 'jo
80a7(rgyud 'grel): tshul dang/ maM 'jigs pa'i tshul dang/ 'bras bu'i thabs dang/ mchog sbyin pa'i thabs dang/ phyag 'tshal pa'i tshul dang/ rdo rje 'phen pa dang/ rdo rje 'jigs su rung ba dang/ rdo rje stobs po ches 'degs pa dang/ rdo rje
80b1(rgyud 'grel): gang mo dang/ rdo rje'i thabs dang/ zhags pa'i thabs dang/ be tson gyi thabs dang/ mtshon rtse gcig pa'i thabs dang/ mdung bu'i thabs dang/ rdo rje'i gar dang/ sgo bzhi byin gyis brlab pa dang/ rdo rje gdung bu dang/ rdo rje 'khyil pa dang/
80b2(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje'i sgra dang/ 'khor lo'i thabs dang/ pad+ma'i tshul dang/ gzhu'i thabs dang/ mda' gzung ba'i thabs dang/ mda''phang ba'i thabs dang/ rkang pa ya gcig gi stang stabs dang/ bung pa'i 'phur stang dang/ rdo rje 'degs pa la
80b3(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa la sogs pa de dag go /de dag gi thabs bshad par bya ste/ rang nyid kha 'og tu bltas te gdangs la lag pa gnyis kyi mkhrig ma mdud de kha'i drung du bzhag pa ni seng ge'i stang stabs so/ /de nyid las thams cad du lta bas lte?
80b4(rgyud 'grel): 'gul ba dang bcas pa ni seng ge'i glal ba'o/ /rdo rje sgrog ni rang gi snying gar rdo rje bcing ba byed pa ste/ rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bsdams la/ /mdzug mo bkug ste bcings nas su/ /bskor ba'i tshul du bya ba ni/ /lha rnams dgug pa'i dam
80b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'o zhes bshad pa'o/ /g.yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis phur bu bzung ste bgegs kyi steng du bzhag la dgug par byed pa ni bud med kyi sgyu 'phrul lo/ snying gar rdo rje gdams pa 'byed pa ni rdo rje dral ba'o/ /rdo rje khu tshur gyi mtheb chung
80b6(rgyud 'grel): gnyis bsgreng ste bzlog la kha'i 'gram du mche ba'i tshul du bzhag pa ni rdo rje mche ba'o/ /g.yon pa'i khu tshur gyi shubs nas drangs te g.yas pa'i khu tshur gyis dpung mgor ral gri 'dzin pa'i tshul du bzhag pa ni ral gri'i thabs so/ /g.yon
80b7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i mdzub mo dang g.yas pa'i mthe chung mdung par byas te g.yas pa'i mdzub mo lcags kyu ltar byas pas 'gugs pa ni lcags kyu'i thabs so/ /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis g.yon du 'debs pa ltar byed pa ni mdung thung gi thabs so/ /lag pa g.yon 
81a1(rgyud 'grel): dkur brten pa la g.yas pa'i khu tshur gyis thog mdung skor ba'i tshul du lan gsum du bsgor nas 'phen pa ni thag mdung 'phen pa'i thabs so/ /rdo rje bsnun pa'i tshul ni rdo rje'i stang stabs so/ /lag pa gnyis kyis rdo rje 'og tu
81a2(rgyud 'grel): lan gsum gsor/ de bzhin du steng du yang lan gsum gsor byed pa ni rdo rje gsor ba'o/ /lag pa gnyis kyis ro bzung na za ba'i tshul du byed cing yongs su lta ba ni rdo rje ro 'das so/ /rdo rje bsdams pas bzung ba'i gtun shing gis
81a3(rgyud 'grel): bgegs rnams brdung ba ltar byed pa ni gtun shing gis thabs so/ /g.yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur snying kar bstan par byas la g.yas pa'i rdo rje khu tshur las gung mo brkyang ba'i tshigs dang por mdzub mo bkug nas dpung mgor bzhag pa
81a4(rgyud 'grel): ni ba dan gyi thabs so/ /g.yon pa dkur brten la g.yas pas snying ga nas 'gugs pa'i tshul du byed pa'i snying ga de nyid du rdo rje sems dpa' ltar 'jog pa ni rdo rje 'gugs byed do/ /snying ga'i mdun du 'gying bag dang bcas pas yongs
81a5(rgyud 'grel): su bskor ba ni rdo rje 'jo tshul lo/ /g.yon pa dkur brten la g.yas pa mi 'jigs pa'i tshul du byed pa ni mi 'jigs pa'i tshul lo/ /g.yon pa de nyid du bzhag pa la g.yas pa'i lag mthil du 'bras bu bzhag pa'i tshul du byas te mdun
81a6(rgyud 'grel): du drang pa ltar byed pa ni 'bras bu'i thabs so/ /de nyid las g.yas pa mchog sbyin pa'i tshul du byed pa ni mchog sbyin pa'i thabs so/ /thal mo sbyar ba bstod pa byed pa'i tshul du snying gar bzhag pa ni phyag 'tshal ba'i tshul lo/ /g.yon pa dkur brten
81a7(rgyud 'grel): la g.yas pa rdo rje rtse gsum pa 'phen pa'i tshul du byed pa ni rdo rje 'phen pa'o/ /kha'i steng du 'og tu lag pa gnyis bkan te de nyid dang 'jigs su rung ba ltar byed pa ni rdo rje 'jigs su rung ba'o/ /snying gar lag pa
81b1(rgyud 'grel): g.yon pa rdo rje rtse gsum ltar byas la g.yas pa'i rdo rje khu tshur dbyug pa ltar 'debs pas rtse gsum par byas te 'jog pa ni rdo rje stobs po ches 'debs so/ /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bkan te rting par bzhag la ha ha zhes dgos pa'i tshul gyis
81b2(rgyud 'grel): yi ge bzhi brjod pa ni rdo rje gang mo'o/ /g.yon pa khro bo'i khu tshur las 'dzub mo snying gar bsgrengs pa la g.yas pa ba dan gsum par byas pas rdo rje gsor ba'i tshul du byed pa ni rdo rje'i thabs so/ /mkhrig ma gnyis 'dud pa ni zhags pa'i
81b3(rgyud 'grel): thabs so/ /g.yon pa dkur brten la g.yas pa'i khu tshur gyis nang nas bton te bsgreng ba ni be con gyi thabs so/ /de nyid las lag pa g.yas pas mdung rtse gcig pa 'phen pa'i tshul du byed pa ni rtse gcig pa'i thabs so/ /de nyid las
81b4(rgyud 'grel): mdung bu 'debs shing bgegs gsod pa'i tshul du byed pa ni mdung bu'i thabs so/ /lag pa g.yon brkyang la de'i rtsa bar g.yas pa'i theb chung nas bkrol te ba dan gsum par byas pa ni rdo rje'i gang ro/ /shar la sogs
81b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i phyogs su sa gnon la sogs pa'i phyag rgya dang ldan pas stong pa nyid la sogs pa rnam par thar pa'i sgo bzhi bsgom pa ni sgo bzhi byin gyi brlab pa'o/ /g.yon pa dkur brten nas g.yas pa sdigs mdzub bsgreng ba ni rdo rje
81b6(rgyud 'grel): 'khyil ba'o/ /g.yas pa rdo rje snying gar 'jog cing g.yon pas rna ba'i drung du dril bu bkrol ba ni rdo rje'i sgra'o/ /snying gar rdo rje khu tshur gyi mtheb chung dang mdzub mo rdo rje mdung pa byas te/ 'khor lo bltar bskor ba ni 'khor
81b7(rgyud 'grel): lo'i phyag rgya'o/ /snying gar pad+ma kha 'byed pa'i tshul du byed pa ni pad+ma'i tshul lo/ /g.yon pa gzhu 'dzin pa'i tshul du 'dzag pa ni gzhu'i thabs so/ /de nyid mda' dang bcas par rna ba'i drung du 'gengs pa ni mda' gzung ba'i thabs so//
82a1(rgyud 'grel): de nyid mda''phen pa ltar byed pa ni mda''phen pa'i tshul lo/ /rkang pa g.yon pa'i brla la g.yas pa'i mthil btsugs te/ lag pa gnyis dkur brten pa ni rkang pa ya gcig gi stang stabs so/ /de nyid dang g.yas g.yon
82a2(rgyud 'grel): du lag pa gnyis bskor ba ni bung pa'i 'phur stangs so/ g.yon dkur brten la g.yas pa snying kar rdo rje gtang de 'jog pa ni rdo rje 'debs pa'o/ /de nas slob dpon blo gros ldan pa yis/ /dkyil 'khor sa yi dbus su 'dug nas ni/ /'dug
82a3(rgyud 'grel): stangs rnams kyi go rim dbye ba dag /de ni ci nus kyis ni rnam par sbyar/ /rdo rje'i skyil krung dang ni dpa' bo'i 'dug stangs dang/ /sems dpa' i skyil krung dang ni dbang po'i 'dug stangs dang/ /bzang po'i 'dug stangs dang ni de bzhin
82a4(rgyud 'grel): tsog bur 'dug /rol pa'i gnas thabs 'dug stangs bdun par bshad/ /g.yas pa'i byin pa rang ni brla dbus su/ /rkang pa g.yon pa rnam par bzhag nas kyang/ /de yi steng du g.yas pa bzhag pa ni/ /rdo rje'i skyil
82a5(rgyud 'grel): mo krung zhes bya bar bshad/ /g.yas pa'i byin pas byin pa g.yon mnan la/ /pus mo gnyis ka dbab par byas nas ni/ /lus ni rab tu zhi ba'i tshul dang ldan/ /pad+ma'i 'dug stangs yin par mkhas pas bshad/ /rkang
82a6(rgyud 'grel): pa g.yon pa'i brla yi steng du ni/ /rkang pa g.yas pa cung zad tsam sbyar la/ /g.yon pa de yi 'og tu bzhag pa ni/ /sems dpa' i skyil mo krung zhes rnam par grags/ /rkang pa g.yon pa yis ni skyil mo krung/ /phyed du
82a7(rgyud 'grel): bcas la de dang nye bar yang/ /rkang pa g.yas pa drang por bzhag pa ni/ /de ni dpa' bo'i 'dug stangs yin par 'dod/ /rkang pa gnyis ka stan gyi steng du ni/ /dang po nyid du thur du brkyang byas la/ /de nyid brtan por rab tu
82b1(rgyud 'grel): 'dzeg pa ni/ /bzang po'i 'dug stangs yin par rab tu grags/ /rkang pa gnyis ka mtho gang tsam gyis ni/ /bar du chod par stan la bzhag nas kyang/ /tsog tsog por ni 'dug pa gang yin pa/ /de nyid tsog pu'i 'dug stangs nyid du bshad/ /rkang
82b2(rgyud 'grel): pa g.yas pa nyid ni sems dpa' yi/ /skyil krung phyed pa brtan par rab byas la/ /g.yon pa sgeg dang bcas par rkyang ba ni/ /rol pa'i 'dug stangs su ni grags pa yin/ /rdo rje skyil krung nyid la gnas nas ni/ /rnam par snang mdzad la sogs
82b3(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya bcing/ /pad+ma'i 'dug stangs kyis kyang gnas nas ni/ /sgeg mo la sogs phyag rgya bcing bar bya/ /sems dpa' i skyil mo krung la gnas nas ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs phyag rgya bcing/ /dpa' bo 'dug stangs nyid la gnas nas
82b4(rgyud 'grel): kyang/ /rdo rje khro bo'i phyag rgya bcing bar bya/ /bzang po'i 'dug stang kyis kyang bya ba ni/ /byams pa la sogs rnams kyis phyag rgya bcing/ /tsog pu'i 'dug stangs kyis ni pho nya dang/ /bran pho bran mo la sogs phyag rgya bcing/ /rol pa'i gnas
82b5(rgyud 'grel): thabs kyis ni bya ba gang/ /'jig rten skyong ba'i phyag rgya bcing bar bya/ /de ltar rnam par bsdus pa las byung ba'i/ /dge ba gang yin des ni 'gro ba rnams/ /sangs rgyas ye shes mgon dang bcas pa der/ /gzhol ba nyid du rtag tu 'bab par
82b6(rgyud 'grel): shog/ //stabs stabs kyi bkod pa slob dpon chen po sangs rgyas ye shes kyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //*/ (/dpal bsang ba 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga slob dpon mar me mdzad bzang po'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa bzhugs so// //)
82b7(rgyud 'grel): !/ /rgya gar skad du/ sh+rI gu hya sa ma dza maN+Da la bi d+hi nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhes bya ba/ /bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /shes bya sogs
83a1(rgyud 'grel): sgrib las nges grol/ /me long ye shes la sogs ldan/ /'jam dpal gsang ba'i 'khor lo mchog /btud de bdag dran phyir de bshad/ dpal ldan 'dus pa'i gzhung dam pa /'khor lo'i man ngag yin
83a2(rgyud 'grel): pa 'dis/ /chu thog rjes gnang tha ma yis/ /gang zhig dbang bskur de nas blang/ /gsang ba'i 'khor 'dir de nyid thob/ /gsang dang shes rab dbang bskur bas/ /gsang shes rnal 'byor de nyid shes/ /theg gsum dgongs pa'i
83a3(rgyud 'grel): nyid shes/ /rig dang snying po sngags phyag rgya/ /ting nge 'dzin ni gsum dag dang/ /thun mongs cig shos dngos grub dang/ /rgyud gzhung gi ni rnams dbye shes/ /dam tshig ldan zhing sdom pa gnas/ /shes rab rnal 'byor la rab brtson/ /
83a4(rgyud 'grel): sngags dang rgyud kyi sbyor ba mkhas/ /sems can don sgrub 'os pa yin/ /gtong brtan la sogs ldan gyur kyang/ /sngar bshad yon tan mi ldan na/ /'di ni 'gro don 'os min te/ /de yi yon tan 'di mchog yin/ /brtsed ldan brtul
83a5(rgyud 'grel): zhugs bzang zlos ldan/ /dad ldan zab mo de nyid shes/ /rang gi 'khor gnas sngon snyen pa/ /byas nas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/ /yid dang rjes mthun gnas la lar/ /tsan dan mchog la sogs pas byung/ /me tog dri bzang bcal ?
83a6(rgyud 'grel): par/ /nang par dang por 'dug nas ni/ /rnam thar sgo ni legs ngag phyir/ /snying gar maM ni 'od 'bar ba/ /bsams nas dge ba mngon 'phel phyir/ /bshags la sogs pa rab tu bya/ /phyogs bcur dus gsum byung ba yi/ /sangs rgyas
83a7(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyi mdun gnas te/ /snying po'i 'od byung gzugs la sogs/ /mchod pa chog bzhin du bya/ /rang gi lo tog tsam las byung/ /nyes byas dus gsum byas pa rnams/ /rmi lam rmi lam sogs bzhin kun/ /lan gsum ngag
83b1(rgyud 'grel): 'chags par bgyid/ /rdzogs sangs sras mchog 'phags rnams dang/ /gzhan gyi dge ba dam pa gang/ /ma lus la bdag yi rang zhing/ /rdzogs byang chub tu rjes bsngo bgyi/ /kun 'dod dbugs 'byin stsol mdzad pa'i/ /sangs rgyas kun la bdag bskul ba/
83b2(rgyud 'grel): bstan pa nam mkha' i mdza' mnyam pa/ /'jig rten kun sdig med snang mdzod/ /kun rtog ma lus dag gyur cig /rang rig dga' ba thugs chud la/ /rang gzhan don gyi 'bras bu stsol/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas la skyabs su mchi/ /sems mchog
83b3(rgyud 'grel): dam chos ma lus pa/ /lung dang rtogs pa'i bdag nyid can/ /dam pa'i phun tshogs gnas bsam yas/ /bdag ni yang dag skyabs su mchi/ /mi ldog dbugs 'byin 'thob gyur cing/ /rgyu mthun la sogs 'bras bur ldan/ /gsang
83b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i dbang bskur las byung nyid/ /tshogs la'ang bdag nyid skyabs su mchi/ /thub dbang sras kyi lam gyi mchog /spyod pa thogs mdza' med rtogs byed/ /kun sangs rgyas bdag blo mchog gis/ /de bsad ni gnas par bgyi/ /sgrib pa thams cad
83b5(rgyud 'grel): yang dag gsol/ /ye shes mdza' yas bdud rtsi'i gnas/ /'khrul pa'i lta ba rab rtogs phyir/ /rnam kun byang chub sems bskyed do/ /byang chub sems dang sangs rgyas nyid/ /rgyu dang 'bras bur ma chags nyid/ /so so rang rig chos yin
83b6(rgyud 'grel): phyir/ /stong pa'i ye shes bdag can bdag /oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ hUM mdzad yang na gtsug tor ram/ /rnam par sna mdzad la sogs nyid/ /khro bo'i 'khor lor gnas srung phyir/ /bsams la bgegs ni rab tu
83b7(rgyud 'grel): gzhol/ /de nas chos kyi dbyings bsams te/ /zur gsum dkar zhing gyen dkar gnas/ /phyogs kyi 'khor lor sna tshogs 'od/ /mkha' nang 'og par rdo rje gnas/ /der bruM 'khor lo las byung ba'i/ /rig bcas rnam snang las byung ba//
84a1(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas spros tshogs mkha' khyab pa/ /zur bzhi la sogs yang dag ldan/ /sna tshogs pad+ma lha yi gdan/ /zla ba nyi mas legs mnan pa/ /rin chen dam pa kun gyis brgyan/ /gzhal yas khang pa rab bsam bya/ /dbyangs yig mchog
84a2(rgyud 'grel): dang yang dag ldan/ /ka sogs dpe byad 'od zer can/ /dbus ma'i zla ba gdan la sems/ /ye shes zla ba rnams bsgoms der/ /dang po'i snying las byung rdo rje/ /dmar zhing dang po'i snying por ldan/ /sprul pas 'gro ba'i don byas nas/ /bdag nyid de yi nga
84a3(rgyud 'grel): rgyal ldan /sku dang zhal mchog shes zla 'dra/ /g.yas pa bsngo la cig shos dmar/ /rnam pa kun mchog rgya che zhing/ /yon tan na bza' brgyan mchog ldan/ /rdo rje skyil krung legs par bzhugs/ /phyag gnyis shes rab mchog la 'khyud/ /phyag
84a4(rgyud 'grel): g.yas rdo rje ral gri ste/ /g.yon na rin chen pad+mar ldan/ /dpal ldan shes rab thabs bdag nyid/ /'gro ba'i phun tshogs rnams kyi gnas/ /kun tu bzang po 'od 'phro par/ /bdag nyid rnam par bsgom par bya/ /de nas 'dod chags ches 'dul
84a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i/ /snod kyis 'jig rten mthong ba dang/ /dga' ba'i sgra yis rang nang du/ /rgyal ba'i tshogs rnams gzhugs par bya/ /de ni spyan sogs rig mchog dang/ /gzugs sogs yul gyi bdag nyid kyi/ /lha mo dgu ru phyung nas ni/ /rang gi
84a6(rgyud 'grel): rig pa'i nang du gzhug /rang rig pad+ma'i lte ba ru/ /rab dga' las byung dkyil 'khor ni/ /sprul nas 'dir ni 'gro ba kun/ /dbugs phyung phyir ni gzhug par bya/ /mkha' khyab sangs rgyas bshes gnyen mchog /rang rdo rje nang zhu
84a7(rgyud 'grel): las byung/ /mi ldog phyir dang de nyid kyi/ /ye shes 'bras phyir dbang bskur/ /dbugs phyin 'gro ba da mthong nas/ /de yi dngos dbyung sa bon gyis/ /sems can thams cad phyung nas ni/ /'gro ba sems bdag dngos las byung/ /sa yi
84b1(rgyud 'grel): snying po la sogs drug /mig sogs rang gi ngo bor byung/ /k+ShiM dzri khaM gaM Sh+kaM/ gzhan yang/ saM ni rim bzhin sa bon yin/ /gzugs kyi rdo rje la sogs drug /phyi nang bdag nyid ngo bor byung/ /dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): khaM 'di dang/ /raM gyi sa bon phyi rol gnas//
84b2(rgyud 'grel): spyan la sogs pa'i rigs pa de/ /sa la sogs pa'i ngo bor byung/ /laM mAM baM tAM 'di dag gis/ /'gro chos bdag nyid de nyid skyes/ /rtags pa la sogs rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /gzugs sogs phung po'i ngo bor byung/ /bruM aM dzraM baM hUM rnams
84b3(rgyud 'grel): kyis/ /chos rnams thams cad yang dag dbyung/ /de nas oM a(rgyud 'grel): hUM zhes bya yi/ /sems ni 'od ldan to gnyis srel/ /gsang ba'i chu skyes khong nang gnas/ /rgyu mthun chung ngu dag phyir ro/ /'dod chags me de 'bar ba yis/ /sku gnyis dag ni
84b4(rgyud 'grel): zhu bar byas/ /bshes mchog ltar snang phyogs lha mo/ /klu yi gsol bas legs par bskul/ /sems can khams na gnas kyi khyod ni dbang phyug rdo rje'i thugs/ /dga' bas yid 'ong don chen 'dod pas bdag la skyab tu gsol/ /mgon po gal te
84b5(rgyud 'grel): de ring bdag ni gson par mchis bzhed na/ /sems can yab chen gnyen mchog bdag la dgyes par mdzad du gsol/ /rdo rje sku khyod bka' yi 'khor lo sems can kun la phan/ /sangs rgyas don du byang chub mchog don rab tu phan par
84b6(rgyud 'grel): gzigs/ /mgon po gal te de ring bdag ni gson par mchis bzhed na/ /'dod chags dam tshig chags pas bdag la dgyes par mdzad du gsol/ /khyod ni rdo rje gsung ste kun la phan zhing thugs brtse ba/ /'jig rten dag gis dgos
84b7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i don mdzad pa la rtag tu brtson/ /mgon po gal te de ring bdag ni gson par mchis bzhed na/ /spyod pa dri med kun tu bzang pos bdag la dgyes par mdzod/ /khyod ni rdo rje 'dod pa dam tshig mchog gi phan don che/ /yang dag rdzogs
85a1(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas kyi gdung mchog mnyam nyid gzigs/ /mgon po gal te de ring bdag ni gson par mchis bzhed na/ /yon tan rin chen mang po'i gter gyur bdag la dgyes par mdzod/ /slong bar byed pa'i dor byas pas/ /zhu ba ? pa ltar
85a2(rgyud 'grel): mthong ste/ /dngos rnams sgyu ma ltar rig nas/ /rang sngags don du slar yang gyur/ /zhal mchog gur gum lta bu ste/ /g.yas pa sngo la cig shos dkar/ /rgyan dang cha lugs gzhon nu 'dra /shes rab dga' bas cig reM mdzes/ /rang snang shes pa
85a3(rgyud 'grel): ldan gyur cing/ /phyag gnyis shes rab dam pa 'khyud/ /ral gri 'od ldan mnga' yi mchog /utpal sngon gzhu phyag na bsnams/ /rangs rgyas sprin gyi sprul 'phro bas/ /'gro ba gsum gyi don rdzogs pa/ /rang gi sa bon mtshan las byung/ /'dzaM
85a4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rdo rjer rang nyid gyur/ /srid par chags pas mdza' yas shing/ /zhi bar chags na 'byor nyams 'gyur/ /sgyu mas bsnyen pa yang dag byas/ /chos byings bdag nyid can du 'gyur/ /oM d+harma d+hA tu swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ bshes gnyen
85a5(rgyud 'grel): dam pas rgyu mthun byas/ /smin las thams cad mkhyen nyid 'gyur/ /de ni mig sogs byin brlab pa/ /nye bar bsgrub pa yin par 'dod/ /sa snying rdo rje can mkha' snying/ /'jig dbang sgrib sel kun tu bzang/ /de nas sa bon rnams kyis ni/ /mig la
85a6(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa yang dag dgang/ /skyes bu bskyed pa chos longs spyod/ /sprul pa las byung 'gro don nyid/ /thugs kyi gsung sogs byin gyis brlab/ /de bas sgrub pa'i don du 'gyur/ /rang nyid lkog ma spyi bo'i zlar/ /hUM A(rgyud 'grel): oM las byung ba'i gtso bo/ /
85a7(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje chu skyes 'khor lo yi/ /dbus gnas thugs sogs gsang ba bsgom/ /de thugs shes rab yan lag 'dus/ /'od kyi gzugs ni rdo rje sogs/ /'od kyis phyogs dus kun mchod cing/ /ma lus gtsol khyab par gyur/ /gang zhig snying
85b1(rgyud 'grel): lkog spyi bor zhugs/ /de yi mdzad don rdzogs par byas/ /de ni thugs kyi rdo rje sogs/ /byin brlab de ni rab tu bsgrub/ /dpal ldan rdo rje'i thugs 'chang ba/ /rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas/ /ded bdag byin gyis brlab gnas su/ /rdo rje thugs kyi mdzad
85b2(rgyud 'grel): du gsol/ /phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/ /rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas/ /deng bdag byin gyis brlabs gnas su/ /rdo rje thugs kyis mdzad du gsol/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta tsit+ta badzra swab+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ /chos kyi gsung lam
85b3(rgyud 'grel): dpal dang ldan/ /rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas/ /ded bdag byin gyis brlab gnas su/ /rdo rje gsung gis mdzad du gsol/ /phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/ /rdo rje ma phyed gsum bsgoms nas/ /deng bdag byin gyis brlab gnas
85b4(rgyud 'grel): su/ /rdo rje gsung gis mdzad du gsol/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta bAka badzra mu b+ha ba At+ma ko haM/ /dpal ldan sangs rgyas sku 'chang ba/ /rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas/ /dang bdag byin gyis brlab gnas su/ /rdo rje skus ni mdzad du gsol/ /phyogs
85b5(rgyud 'grel): bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam/ /rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas/ /deng bdag byin gyis brlab gnas su/ /rdo rje skus ni mdzad du gsol/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ /rje dran bcu drug dag pas ni/ /byed pa
85b6(rgyud 'grel): yin zhes des gsungs pas/ /de ni thugs sogs byin brlabs pa'i/ /gnas skabs min phyir ma bshad do/ /sgyu ma'i shes rab yang dag 'dus/ /gsung ba gsum gyi mtshan nyid blta/ /dbang 'bras chung du rnam dag phyir/ /sgrub pa chen po yin par
85b7(rgyud 'grel): 'dod/ /ye shes sems thugs snying 'od kyi/ /phyogs bcu'i mgon po yang dag bskul/ /de 'ong las byung rig po rnams/ /bdud rtsi chus bkang bum bsnams pas/ /gtso bo dpal ldan rang dbang bskur/ /rigs dbang cod pan dam pa yin/ /de bzhin
86a1(rgyud 'grel): rgyu mthun sogs par mas/ /rang gcig shes rab rnam par sbyang/ /spyi bo snying ga lte ba gsang/ /rkang mthar thug pa'i cha re la/ /oM hUM swA A(rgyud 'grel): hA snying po/ /rtag sogs rigs kyi bdag nyid can/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas lngas
86a2(rgyud 'grel): dga' bar ba/ /hUM a chu skyes 'dab brgyad pa/ /yang dag sbyangs des sogs rgyas rnams/ /hUM gi rdo rje mchog mnyes bya/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta a nu rA ga na badzra swa b+ha ba at+ma ko haM/ snying zla'i ral gri snying po'i 'od/ /sangs rgyas
86a3(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor mkha' khyab pa/ /bdag nyid la bzhugs sems mchog gi /gzugs su rdo rje'i bde legs gnas/ /rgyal ba'i 'khor lo sa bon gyis/ /der bskyed nas ni brtan byas la/ /'gro ba'i mi shes dag bya'i phyir/ /rang gi cho gas
86a4(rgyud 'grel): dbyung bar bya/ /zhe sdang chen po'i don brgyad rgyal/ /bdag po mi bskyod yang dag bskul/ /badzra d+h+rika ces bya bas dbyung/ /nor bu in+d+ra nI la'i mdog/ g.yas pa dkar la cig shos dmar/ /dpal mchog dang po'i phyag dang ldan/ /
86a5(rgyud 'grel): dpal ldan legs bsdus bdag nyid kyi/ /dngos po kun gyis gzhug par bya/ /dzi na dzi ka gis dang po 'dra/ /gti mug chen pos don mdzad gtso/ /'khor lo bzang sogs dpal de bzhin/ /shar gyi zla dkyil dag la bsgom/ /ratna b+haM ga
86a6(rgyud 'grel): gis rin chen dbang/ /gser mdog mnyam nyid brtson 'grus can/ /mgon po rin chen mchog sogs bsnams/ /gzhon nu'i zhal 'dra lho phyogs su'o/ /A ro laki gis gsung dbang po/ /'dod chags chen pos don mdzad gtso/ /pad+ma
86a7(rgyud 'grel): dA ga'i mdog pad sogs/ /gzhon nu'i zhal 'dra nub phyogs su'o/ /pradz+nyA dI ka gis don yod dbang/ /gtum chen phrag dog don mdzad pa/ /bai DU rya snang gzhon nu'i zhal/ /ral gri sogs bsnams byang du bsam/ /kun kyang ral pa
86b1(rgyud 'grel): cod pan bcas/ /rang rig gnyis su med par spyod/ /rgyan dang na bza' mchog kun ldan/ /pad+ma nyi dkyil dag la bsam/ /mo ha ra tis shar lho ru/ /snying rje thabs kyis 'gro don stsol/ /rang gi ngo bo sku dbang 'dra/ /spyan ni zla dkyil dgar ba
86b2(rgyud 'grel): bsam/ /dwe Sha ra tis lho nub tu/ /byams dang smon lam 'dod stsol ba/ /dgar ldan thugs kyi dbang po 'dra/ /mA ma kI ni zla dkyil bsam/ /rA ga ra tis nub byang du/ /dga' dang stobs dang ting 'dzin stsol/ /gsung gi dbang 'dra don dag
86b3(rgyud 'grel): bsam/ /gos dkar mo ni zla dkyil bsam/ /badzra ra tis byang shar du/ /btang snyoms ye shes ting 'dzin stsol/ /rang gi ngo bor rin dbang 'dra/ /yid 'ong sgrol ma zla dkyil bsam/ /'di rnams mtshan ma rim bzhin du/ /'khor lo utpal dmar po
86b4(rgyud 'grel): mchog /pad+ma utpal ser po ste/ /lhag ma dang bdag lta bur bstan/ /me la sogs pa'i mtshams bzhi dang/ /shar sgo yi ni ngos gnyis su/ /de nyid gsum gyi gzugs sogs pa/ /me long sogs bsnams sku sogs 'dra/ /ya mAn+ta krita
86b5(rgyud 'grel): gyis yams 'joms/ /phung po shes bya rnam 'jig pa/ /thugs kyi dbang 'dra lta rab 'bar/ /shar sgor khro bo'i dkyil mos nas/ /pradzAn+ta krita kyis srid 'joms/ /nyon mongs bdag lta 'jig byed pa/ /gtum zhing 'jigs la kun dbang
86b6(rgyud 'grel): 'dra/ /gzhan gyis mi thub lho sgor ro/ /pad+man+ta krita kyis 'dod 'joms/ /'chi bdag skyes pa'i tshogs 'jig pa/ /gtum zhing sgra zab gsum dbang 'dra/ /rta mgrin nub kyi sgo ru bsam/ /big+han+ta krita kyis bgegs 'joms/ /bya ba lha yi bdud dag
86b7(rgyud 'grel): nyid/ /gtum la mi bskyod mdog 'dra ba/ /bdud rtsi 'khyil pa byang sgor bsam/ /smin 'degs dbu skra gyen du 'bar/ /sma ra smin ma spyan dmar ser/ /zhal gdang ljags ni rnam par bskyod mche bar bcas shing rtag tu bzhad?/ /'di rnams
87a1(rgyud 'grel): phyag na thob drag /dbyug pa pad+ma rdo rje thogs/ /khros pa'i sbrul gyis sku la brgyan/ /rang rig shes rab yan lag lus/ /rdzogs pa'i 'khor lo la bltas nas/ /kun na rang gi dngos po yis/ /snying po'i sa bon 'od lcags kyus/ /sangs
87a2(rgyud 'grel): rgyas 'khor lo 'dra ba bsdu/ /mthong bar gyur nas bgegs rnams ni/ /kun tu bskrad de mngon bar bsrung/ /zla sogs me tog ldan pa yi/ /gsang sngags mchog bzlas mchod yon dbul/ /'khor lo de 'khor lo la gzhug /
87a3(rgyud 'grel): mig dang sku sogs byin gyis brlab/ /sngon bzhin dbang bskur de la bsam/ /rgyu mthun la sogs chen po nyid/ /sangs rgyas cod pan mi bskyed pa/ /lhag ma rang bdag dbang bskur ba/ /sku dbang mi bskyod gsung pa po/ /thugs dbang sgo ba
87a4(rgyud 'grel): rnams la 'dod/ /de ltar dbang bskur rang snying po'i/ /'od kyis shes rab pad der gzhug /gzugs sogs spu khur las byung ba'i/ /gzugs kyi rdo rje sogs 'od ni/ /gzhal yas khang 'od las 'das nas/ /nam mkha' i mdza' ni rab khyab pas/ /
87a5(rgyud 'grel): thub dbang rang ni legs mched pa'i/ /mchod dang mchod pa'i bdag can gyur/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dza badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ chos rnams kun gyi 'khor lo bstod/ /rang gi bdag nyid rdzogs sangs skus/ /ye shes lnga dang phyag rgya dang//
87a6(rgyud 'grel): rigs brgya lnga dang gsum gyis so/ /mi bskyod rdo rje ye shes che/ /rdo rje dbyings ni mkhas chen po/ /dkyil mchog gi gsum pa yi ge gsum/ /rdo rje dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rnam par snang mdzad dag pa che/ /rdo rje zhi ba dga' chen po/ /rang
87a7(rgyud 'grel): bzhin 'od gsal mchog gi mchog /ston pa rdo rje phyag 'tshal lo/ /rin chen rgyal po rab tu zab/ /rdo rje nam mkha' dri ma med/ /rang bzhin dag pas gos pa med/ /rdo rje'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje mi 'chi rgyal po che/ /mi rtog nam mkha' 
87b1(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje 'dzin/ /'dod chags pha rol phyin pa brnyes/ /rdo rje'i gsung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /don yod rdo rje rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /bsam pa thams cad rdzogs mdzad pa/ /rang bzhin dag pa nyid las byung/ /rdo rje sems dpa' phyag 'tshal lo/ /zla ba nyi ma chung dang
87b2(rgyud 'grel): sman/ /dri ni rlung me'i 'khor lor gnas/ /oM gyis byin brlabs 'od bcas pa/ /de nyid gsum gyis mngon par bzlas/ /rdo rje'i lce mchog tu hUM bkod pa/ /bsams nas ye shes bdud rtsi blang/ /snying ga'i zlar chud ma lus pa'i/ /'khor
87b3(rgyud 'grel): lo des ni tshim par bya/ /snying po'i 'od kyis sprul mgon pos/ /rang gi log rtog rnam spangs te/ /'gro ba sangs rgyas bdag nyid byas/ /snying po'i sa bon nang du gzhug /snying gar mtshan ma'i lte nang nas/ /zla snying thig le'i gzugs
87b4(rgyud 'grel): can du/ /rang yid 'od ldan bsgoms nas ni/ /ye shes sems dpa' rab tu bsgom/ /thugs sung sku yi rdo rje yang/ /'od kyi phreng bas rab sad bya/ /de ni snying gar zhugs bsam pa/ /rang gi ye shes bdud rtsi 'bab/ /de nas nang gi lus thams
87b5(rgyud 'grel): cad/ /ba spu las byung 'od zer tshogs/ /de yis kun nas snang byas la/ /'gro ba'i don nas rdzogs bya/ /yang na rang rtag phra bsgom pa/ /rig pa'i sna yi rtse mor gnas/ /thug pa'i 'khor lo rang rig pa/ /shes rab dam pa 'dus 'od ldan/ /
87b6(rgyud 'grel): brtan pa la mtshan ma mthong ba dang/ /der rtogs 'od zer spro bya zhing/ /sna tshogs mtshan ma sangs rgyas ni/ /yang dang yang du spro bar bya/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje mchog /ye shes lnga yi 'od zer can/ /spros te sngags ni zla bya ba/ /cig
87b7(rgyud 'grel): car yang na rim gyis so/ /rdo rje gsal chos 'khor lo ste/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rjer gtogs/ /gnas su de ni brtan byas la/ /ye shes sku ni spro zhing bzla/ /brjod cing srog gis spro bya zhing/ /sngags ni rtsol bas bsdu bar bya/ /sku sogs
88a1(rgyud 'grel): spro dang bsdus pa yis/ /rims bzhin rims bzhin bzlas brjod bya/ /de ltar brjod de mkha' khyab pa'i/ /sku la sogs te rang 'od kyis/ /sngo zhing sna tshogs mchod mchog 'os/ /srog las rig pa'i tshogs rnams spro/ /rig bsgegs
88a2(rgyud 'grel): pas yongs 'khyud pa'i/ /bde ba babs pas dbang byas la/ /rtsol bas ye shes sangs rgyas tshogs/ /mthar ni rang gi nang la gzhug /thig le phra mo gsang gsum dbyung/ lhag mar mos pa rgyu mthun sogs/ /chung ngu la sogs kyis bya?
88a3(rgyud 'grel): ltar/ /rnal 'byor bsnyen sogs de bzhin bsgom /rang snying de nyid mchog brtags pas/ /sems kyi 'jug pa zhum gyur na/ spyan sogs tshogs kyi glu yis ni/ /'khor lo gsol gtab mchod par bya/ /spyi bor zla ba oM rlan can/ /dam pa'i sems
88a4(rgyud 'grel): kyis chu 'jig pas/ /sku gsung thugs ni tshim byed pa/ /cho ga bzhin du dbab par bya/ /de ltar ngal gso bzlas byas shing/ /mkhas pas mchod la sogs byas nas/ /der nyid gsum bsdus sangs rgyas rnams/ /bzhud pa'i skabs su gshegs su gsol//
88a5(rgyud 'grel): 'di ni de nyid mthong bar bshad/ /'gro ba ma lus bltas nas kyang/ /snying rje de la phan pa'i phyir/ /smon lam rnams ni mngon du bya/ /ting nge 'dzin las 'das nas kyang/ /bdag po'i nga rgyal mngon du bya/ /'jug par gtogs che rdzogs
88a6(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas/ /yul gyi yang dag mchod par bya/ /'jam dpal rdo rje kun bdag nyid/ /ngo bo nyid kyis yul rjes 'gro/ /de ltar yul rnams bsgom pa ni/ /rang rang dag par rnam par gnas/ /rtag pa la sogs ngo bo de/ /rang rig chos su yang
88a7(rgyud 'grel): dag gnas/ dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang 'dra bar/ /dag pa'i sems dpar yang dag ldan/ /rang gi log rtog rnam spangs pas/ /bya ba thams cad rdzogs par bya/ /rtag tu tshad med rab sbyor pas/ /'khor lo mchog 'di mdza' yas mchod/ /rang
88b1(rgyud 'grel): snying zla bar rang 'khor gtso/ /rang gi sa bon rang zas la/ /legs dmigs rang snying de nyid kyis/ /bdud rtsis sangs rgyas kun tshim bya/ /chos nyid kun gyis dag pa dang/ /de nyid gsum gyis mngon bzlas la/ /rang gi lha yi 'khor lo mchog /tshim bya
88b2(rgyud 'grel): nges ni mchod par bya/ /phyi yi sbyin sreg dge tshul gyis/ /sems can? gyis ni yid kyis bya/ /ye shes me yi phung pos shing/ /bsreg bas 'di ni bla med yin/ /de ltar 'dod pa ma lus pas/ /bdag nyid rang lha'i dngos gyur dang/ /gzhan yang de
88b3(rgyud 'grel): mchod bya ba yin/ /dam tshig bde gshegs bzhed pa yin/ /lus sems las gang de dang des/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mchod pa dang/ /rjes mthun 'gro ba'i bya ba rnams/ /rtag tu mnyam par bzhag pas bya/ /lus ngag las kyi rang
88b4(rgyud 'grel): bzhin gang/ /phyag rgya sngags kyi bdag nyid che/ /de dang de yi las sgrub pas/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mchod par bya/ /dngos gcig la yang kun rtog pa/ /rnam pa sna tshogs snang gyur te/ /grol dang sdug bsngal bde bskyed pa'i/ /las ni
88b5(rgyud 'grel): ma lus 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de bas lus la sogs pa'i las/ /dge dang mi dge rtog las byung/ /rtog pa kun las des grol ba/ /ye shes las ni rtog de ci/ /dam tshig dag las bslang ba ni/ /don yod rdo rje'i 'khor lo bzang/ /snying
88b6(rgyud 'grel): gar las kyi rdo rje khams/ /bsams nas thams cad bdag dbang bskur/ /bla ma brnyas la sogs nyes pa/ /sbyin dang bcas pa'i rmchod ston bya/ /phyi khrus rang gi 'khor lor gnas/ /dbang bskur ba yi cho gas bya/ /thun mtshams su
88b7(rgyud 'grel): yang chos la sogs/ /bzlas pa snga ma bzhin dus bya/ /snying gar 'khor lo mchod chud byas/ /shes rab snying rjer ldan pas nyal/ /ldang tshe dpal ldan lha mo yi/ /glu blangs pas ni bskul bar bya/ /nang par langs nas sngar bzhin ni/ /
89a1(rgyud 'grel): lags 'dod dang po'i las can yin/ /ye shes cung zad babs gyur pas/ /sngags kyi tshul khrims brtul zhugs ldan/ /mig dang sku sogs byin gyis brlab/ /thun mtshams su ni rab bsgrims bzlas/ /rnam pa
89a2(rgyud 'grel): kun tu rab rdzogs par/ /spro dang bsdu ba byed pa po/ /ye shes dbang ba cung zad 'thob/ /nyin mtshan rnal 'byor yang dag bsten/ /yang dag ye shes dbang thob bsgom/ /khams kyi rdul nang khams gsum mchog /gzugs brnyan
89a3(rgyud 'grel): bdag nyid sku can gyi/ /'gro ba'i don gyis bya ba byed/ /rnal 'byor mtshan ma dge ba yang/ /du ma thob cing yang dag 'grub/ /de nyid gsum ni cho ga bzhin/ /mchod byas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/ /rang ngam gzhan gyi gsol
89a4(rgyud 'grel): btab bam/ /gzhan don 'bad par byed pas kyang/ /'khor lo la gnas tshul bzhin bzlas/ /mtshan ma thob nas yang dag bri/ /'khor lo can sngags 'bum bzlas sam/ /yang na rang gi lha yi 'bum/ /gzhan gyi khri ste yang na ni//
89a5(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo can gyi bkas gnang bri/ /'byin pa de nyid gsum dang spel/ /gzhan dag snying po'i sa bon spel/ /ming gi yi ge dang po ni/ /klad kor bcas pas sngags rnams btu/ /sku dang gsung thugs rdo rjer bshad/ /las chod chen
89a6(rgyud 'grel): po'i bdag nyid can/ /gsang gsum phyag tshig phyag rgya yin/ /sa bon snying po yin par bshad/ /zhi la sogs pa rab bskul bas/ /las rnams byed pa rig par bshad/ /phreng ba'i sngags kyang rig par bshad/ /mkhas pas
89a7(rgyud 'grel): de rnams kun tu bzla/ /ci rigs par ni bzlas byas dang/ /rang bdag la sogs bka' thob bam/ /'gog pa'i 'khor lo goms pa yis/ /rang sems dag nas bri bar bya/ /ting 'dzin gsum po byas nas ni/ /sangs rgyas la sogs lhag gnas
89b1(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /bgegs rnams bsal te phur bus gdab/ /gsang byugs sa la gsol ba gdab/ /mchod yon mchod dang gtor sbyin nas/ /sbyin sreg tshim byas mkha' la dgod/ /bgegs med sa ni brkos nas su/ /khung bu dga' ba? rim
89b2(rgyud 'grel): 'di yin/ /'jam rdo rje bdag rnal 'byor ldan/ /sngon du bsnyan pa rdzogs byas la/ /grogs dang mchod pa dang ldan par/ /dkyil 'khor gnas ni yang dag sbyang/ /bgegs dgra'i 'khor lo'i sbyor la gnas/ /rang gi dbang bskur yang
89b3(rgyud 'grel): dag blang/ /da ltar gdug pa tshar bcad pa/ /yang na rang lha'i sbyor bas bya/ /oM b+hu khaM gi sngags kyis ni/ /sa ni nam mkha' gyur par bya/ /hUM laM hUM gis rdo rje'i bdag /sa byas de ni byin gyis brlab/ /oM me ni badzri b+ha ba badzra band+ha
89b4(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ sngar bzhin bgegs gzhom sbyor ba'i bdag /bsnyen sogs rjes chags mthar thug pa'i/ /dang po'i sbyor ldan rang 'khor lo'ang/ /rab byung bdud rtsi mthar thug de/ /'khor lo'i rgyal mchog sbyor ba'i bdag /'khor lo'i
89b5(rgyud 'grel): las na las mchog byed/ /las rgyal mchog gi sbyor ldan pas/ /ting 'dzin gsum po dam pa yin/ /de lta'i sbyor gnas slob dpon ni/ /sangs rgyas kun bdag lus can te/ /ngo bo nyid bdag rdo rje'i bdag /'khor lo'i sa gzhi
89b6(rgyud 'grel): dbus legs gnas/ /rdo rje dril 'dzin dpa' bo la/ /rdo rje dril mchog 'dzin pa'i grogs/ /rtag sogs bdag nyid gzugs can gyis/ /'khor gsum sprul la gsol ba gdab/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun zhi ba/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas//
89b7(rgyud 'grel): chos kun bdag med med pa'i mchog dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol/ /mtshan rnams thams cad yang dag rdzogs/ /mtshan min thams cad rnam spangs la/ /kun tu bzang po'i sku yi mchog /dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol
90a1(rgyud 'grel): zhi ba'i chos ni mchog las byung/ /ye shes spyod pa rnam sbyor ba/ /kun tu bzang po gsung gi mchog /dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol/ /sems can kun gyi sems chen po/ /rang bzhin dam pa dri ma med/ /kun
90a2(rgyud 'grel): bzang thugs mchog 'khor lo sgyur/ /dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol/ /de nas 'gro khams mun nag bsten/ /'jam rgyal khros pas bltas pa ni/ /hUM badzrota tiSh+Thas rang mig dang/ /sbrul pa'i 'khor lo brdeg par bya/ /yi ge ma
90a3(rgyud 'grel): nas nyi zla'i mig phyogs dus thams cad sbar ba dang/ /blo ldan 'gro la bltas nas ni/ /'khor lo'i sa ni yongs su bskor/ /rkang 'og rdo rje 'bar ba dang/ /rdo rje gsor bas shin tu brtson/ /rol pa'i rdo rje 'gros kyi gar/ /mche ba gtsigs
90a4(rgyud 'grel): bcas hUM sgrogs shing/ /lha sogs bgegs kyi dkyil 'khor rnams/ /rab gdug bgegs sogs bskrad par bya/ /lus ngag sems la gnas pa yi/ /bgegs kyi tshogs ni thams cad nyon/ /da ni dpal ldan 'jam dbyangs
90a5(rgyud 'grel): te/ /bsrung ba'i 'khor lo rab sbyor bas/ /gal te bdag bsgo las 'das na/ /rdo rje 'bar ba'i gzugs ldan pas/ /sku gsum 'byung bas dags bya ste/ /'jigs par 'gyur bar gdon mi za/ /sa ni yongs su bzung byas nas//
90a6(rgyud 'grel): bgegs med phyir ni phur bu gdab/ /bsngags la oM g+ha g+ha g+hA ta ya/ g+hA ta ya/ sarba duSh+Nan phaT/ ki lA ya kI la ya sarba pA paM phaT phaT/ hUM hUM hUM badzra kI la ya badzra d+ha ro A dz+nyA pa ya ti/ kA ya bAk+tsit+ta badzra ki la ya hUM phaT/ smad du
90a7(rgyud 'grel): rtse gcig stod? bgegs dgra /bsams nas dbus su phur bus gdab/ phyogs bcu kun tu gnas pa yi/ /bgegs tshogs thams cad gzhom par bya/ /sa ni kun tu bgegs bral zhing/ /'bar ba'i gzer rnos khyab bsams la/ /
90b1(rgyud 'grel): mtshams dang rab phyogs bcing ba/ /blos byas nas ni lhag gnas bya/ /skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /spyod pa'i tshul gyi khyad par dang/ /sa dang pha rol phyin pa la/ /lha mo khyod ni dbang du gyur/ /shAkya seng ge skyob pa yis/ /ji ltar bdud kyi sde
90b2(rgyud 'grel): bcom pa/ /de bzhin bdag gi bdud kyi sde/ phyi par byas te dkyil 'khor bri/ /sa bzhi dri zhim sogs byugs shing/ /me tog sna tshogs sil ma dgram/ /zla sogs 'khor lo can gnas su/ /mkhas pas dkyil 'khor rab tu bya/ /de la 'khor lo spyan drang  
90b3(rgyud 'grel): ba/ /byas nas mtshams la sogs bcings te/ /mchod bstod 'dud rtsi myang byas nas/ /bum pa lhag par gnas par bya/ /mgrin pa gos mchog gis dkris la/ /a mra sogs 'dab kyis kha dgab/ /dkyil 'khor pa yi bum pa ni/ /de yi sngags
90b4(rgyud 'grel): kyi lhag gnas bya/ /'bru sman rin chen lnga rnams dang/ /dri bzang chu dang 'khor lo'i tshogs/ /me tog phreng btags rdo rje ni/ /ster bzhag 'khor lo'i gtso rgyal la/ mchod yon phul te yang dag mchod/ /me tog dkar po gzhug
90b5(rgyud 'grel): par bya/ /der ni spos sogs dri bsgos pa'i/ /pad snod dri bzang sogs ldan bya/ /nyin re bzhan du thun gsum du/ /gtor ma byin la de bzhin zla/ /de yang 'khor lo'i phyi mtshams su/ /rnam rgyal 'khor gtso'i g.yas su'o/ /de
90b6(rgyud 'grel): las mchod yon snod du chu/ /bcug nas de yis dbang bskur na/ /bdag dang slob ma thams cad ni/ /chu yi dbang gis bskur bar 'gyur/ /slar yang 'khor lo mchod byas la/ /lag par bdug spos thogs nas ni/ /blo ldan pus btsugs
90b7(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo'i gtso/ /bde gshegs rnams la gsol ba gdab/ /bcom ldan 'jam pa'i rdo rje mchog /rig sngags rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /slob ma rnams la brtse pa dang/ /khyed cag rnams la mchod pa'i phyir/ /thugs rje'i bdag nyid can rnams
91a1(rgyud 'grel): kyi/ /dkyil 'khor bdag ni 'dri bar 'tshal/ /bcom ldan bdag ni gus pa la/ /de ni gnang ba mdzad pa'i rigs/ /sangs rgyas 'gro 'khor bya don stsol/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'bras gnas dang/ /gang gzhan gsang sngags
91a2(rgyud 'grel): lha rnams dang/ /'jig rten skyong ba'i lha rnams dang/ /gang yang 'byung po mthu chen dang/ /gang yang lha yi spyan mnga' ba'i/ /sems can bstan la dga' ba rnams/ /bdag la dgongs par mdzad du gsol/ /bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba
91a3(rgyud 'grel): yis/ /dkyil 'khor 'jam dpal 'byung ba ni/ /'gro ba dag par bya ba'i phyir/ /yo byad ci 'byor pas 'dri na/ /deng bdag slob mar bcas pa la/ /thugs ni brtse bar dgongs nas su/ /tshogs pa thams cad dkyil 'khor du/ /byin gyis brlab pa
91a4(rgyud 'grel): mdzad du gsol/ /de ltar lan gsum de gsol gdab/ /gtso bo mchod la sogs byas te/ /yang dag bsrungs la phyir phyung nas/ /me tog phreng thogs rang slob ma/ /yid gzhungs spro ba che ba dang/ /byas pa bzo zhing nga rgyal med/ /rigs
91a5(rgyud 'grel): mtho yon tan ldan zhing dang/ /gzugs dang kha dog lang tshor ldan/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i gsang ba ni/ /bsgrub la don gnyer mngon brtson na/ /gzugs ngan yon tan med pa'am/ /dman pa 'ang lhag par gnas par bya/ /dkyil 'khor gyi
91a6(rgyud 'grel): ni cho ga las/ /'khor bzhi char yang rjes su gnang/ /rang gi bslab dang shin tu ldan/ /theg chen la dga' i bdag nyid can/ /la la gsang sngags sgrub don gnyer/ /'di ni dkyil 'khor 'jug par byed/ /bsod nams 'dod pas de las gzhan
91a7(rgyud 'grel): gzhan dag 'jig rten gzhan don gnyer/ /'jig rten pha rol don gnyer ba'i/ /dad pa mang du byed pa yis/ /blo ldan dkyil 'khor 'jug bya yi/ /tshe 'di'i 'bras bu 'dod mi bya/ /tshe 'di 'dod par gyur pa la/ /'jig rten pha
91b1(rgyud 'grel): rol don mi 'gyur/ /'jig rten pha rol don gnyer skyes/ /'jig rten 'di yis 'bras bu rgyas/ /de skad brjod nas slob ma de/ /blo yis rang gi nang du gzhug /sngon bzhin rdo rje chu skyes kyis/ /bdag byas? khyim sgor gsol ba 'deb/ /dga' chen khyod la?
91b2(rgyud 'grel): bdag ston pa bas/ /slob dpon khyod ni dgongs su gsol/ /byang chub chen po'i tshul brtan pa/ /mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo/ /dam tshig de nyid stsal du gsol/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te/ /skyabs gsum dag ni bdag la stsol/ /thar pa
91b3(rgyud 'grel): chen po grong mchog tu/ /mgon po bdag ni 'jug par 'tshal/ /slob ma des ni lan gsum brjod/ /rab gus bshes gnyen shes nas ni/ /slob ma gtso bo gcig la ni/ /dmigs bcas tshig 'di brjod par bya/ /khyod ni tshul chen snod yin te/
91b4(rgyud 'grel): bu chung theg pa chen po yi/ /gsang sngags spyod tshul cho ga 'di/ /khyed la yang dag bstan par bya/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang 'das dang/ /de bzhin gang dag ma byon dang/ /da ltar byung ba'i mgon po rnams/ /'gro la phan phyir bzhugs pa dag /de dag
91b5(rgyud 'grel): kun gyi gsang sngags kyi/ /cho ga mchog bzang 'di mkhyen nas/ /dpa' bos byang chub shing drung du/ /thams cad mkhyen pa mtshan med brnyes/ /gsang sngags sbyor ba mnyam med de/ /shAkya seng+ge skyob pa yis/ /bdud sde shin tu mi bzang ba/ /dpung
91b6(rgyud 'grel): chen dag kyang de yis bcom/ /de bas kun mkhyen thob bya'i phyir/ /bu yis blo gros 'di gyis shig /bshags sogs lan gsum brjod nas ni/ /de nas bla mas byang chub sems/ /ma bskyed pa ni bskyed par bya/ /bskyed pa slar yang dran du gzhug /las kun
91b7(rgyud 'grel): gyi las? bsrungs nas ni/ /snying ga lkog ma spyi bo ru/ /rdo rje pad+ma 'khor lo dag /hUM A(rgyud 'grel): oM las de ru dgod/ /rdo spos chu khu tshur mchog /snying ga spyi bo lkog mar gtug /de bzhin hUM oM A(rgyud 'grel): brjod bya/ /me tog la sogs rim bzhin sbyin/ /spyi bor me
92a1(rgyud 'grel): tog mdun du spos/ /mar me dri yang thugs ka ru/ /kun byed bzlas nas gus pa yi/ /slob ma rnams la sbyin par bya/ /a shwata u duM ba ra yi/ /so shing sor ni bcu gnyis pa/ /ma yo ma gas srog chags med/ /rtse mor me tog bcas pa sbyin/
92a2(rgyud 'grel): shar ram byang du kha bltas bzhag /bcas nas bltos pa med par ni/ /ba ko tsam ni byug par dor/ /zhi la sogs pa'i dngos grub brtan/ /'thur 'thung skyor chu lan gsum blud/ /phyi rol tu ni nges bzhag ste/ /stan dang sngas phyir ku sha sbyin/ /
92a3(rgyud 'grel): dpung par skud pas bsrung bar bya/ /skyor chu lan gsum blung pa'i sngags/ /oM h+ri bi shud+d+ha d+harma sarba pA pa ni tsa sya sho d+ha ya bi kal paM a pa na la hUM/ 'jig rten du ni kun mkhyen nas/ /u duM ba ra'i me tog bzhin/ /brgya lam na ni res 'ga' 
92a4(rgyud 'grel): zhig /'byung 'gyur yang na mi 'byung ngo/ /gsang sngags sbyod pa'i tshul byung ba/ /de bas kyang ni dkon pa ste/ /gang gis mnyam med sems can don/ /mya ngan mi 'da' byed par nus/ skal pa bye ba du ma ru/ /sdig pa bgyis par gyur pa gang/ /de kun
92a5(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor 'di 'dra ba/ /mthong bas 'byang bar 'gyur lags na/ /grags pa mdza' yas bsngags spyad pa'i/ /tshul la gnas pa smos ci 'tshal/ /skyob pa'i gsang sngags bzlas nas ni/ /go 'phang bla na med par 'gyur/ /gang dag spyod pa mchog
92a6(rgyud 'grel): 'di la?/ /blo gros shin tu mi g.yo ba/ /de dag gis ni ngan 'gro'i rgyun/ /sdug bsngal kun 'byung rab tu bcas/ /bdag nyid chen po khyed rnams kyis/ /rnyed pa mnyam med de ring rnyed/ /gang phyir rgyal ba sras bcas pa/ /bdag nyid chen po
92a7(rgyud 'grel): kun gyis ni/ /bstan pa 'di la khyed rnams kun/ /yongs su gzung ste skye bzhin pa/ /de phyir khyed rnams theg chen la/ /sang ni rab tu skye bar 'gyur/ /theg pa chen po cher 'byung ba'i/ /lam mchog 'di ni dpal dang ldan/ /khyed rnams de ring dor bas na?/ /rab
92b1(rgyud 'grel): byung skal pa chen po pa/ /'jig rten thams cad mkhyen pa yi/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams su 'gyur/ /don bshad bsrung ba byas nas ni/ /ku sha'i stan la nyal du gzhug /rmi lam gang dag ci mthong ba/ /de kun nang bar nga la zlos/ /srung dang byin rlabs sogs
92b2(rgyud 'grel): gang dag /der ni las kun byed pa bzla/ /rigs lnga 'khor lo gsum gyi ni/ /las kun byed pa thab sbyor yin/ /rmi lam bzang ngan dris nas ni/ /mi dge thab sbyor dag gis gzhol/ /slob ma legs bsrungs skal ldan pa/ /de nas sdom pa 'dzin du
92b3(rgyud 'grel): gzhug /mi ldog 'khor lo'i dbang bskur ba/ /rtsal nas mgon po bdag la ni/ /'khor lo lha yi de nyid dang/ slob dpon gyi ni las rnams dang/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi dam tshig dang/ /sdom pa dang gsang ba dam pa dang/ /sems can
92b4(rgyud 'grel): kun gyi don gyi phyir/ /rtag tu slob dpon bdag 'gyur gsungs/ /slob ma slob dpon nyid don gnyer/ /sdom pa rnams kyang 'dzin du gzhug /rnal 'byor mnyam gzhag 'khor lo mchog /legs mchog blo yis mkha' la bzhag /rtag pa la
92b5(rgyud 'grel): sogs dngos 'dra zhing/ /de mdog sa bon las byung ba/ /ye shes lnga ldan srid bu ni/ /nyi shu rtsa lngar rnam phye ba/ /dza(rgyud 'grel): las nyi ma zla ba'i mig /'jam pa'i rdo rje bdag gzugs kyis/ /'bar ba'i lta ba'i lcags kyus dgug /rang gi mdog
92b6(rgyud 'grel): ni nang du gzhug? /rnam snang la sogs zhugs? ye shes/ /srad bu thams cad byed dang bcas/ /rang gi 'khor lo thig gdab phyir/ /rtag pa'i thig ni stsal du gsol/ /ji srid mi bskyod mthar thug pa/ /'di dag de nyid gsum dang spel/ /a n+yo a
92b7(rgyud 'grel): ? ?? d+harma? zhes bya sogs dran bya/ /chur ni 'khor lo'i nyes 'gyur la/ /sboms su sgo yi nyi shu'i cha/ /mi 'chi bcu byed dri bzang gis/ /spangs nas kyang ni bsrung bar bya/ /yis gsum chud par rnal 'byor pas/ /thig 'dzin pa dang bsgril 
93a1(rgyud 'grel): par bya/ /dzdza gsum gyis ni de gtang zhing/ /rang yang dzdza dzdza dzdza zhes zlos/ /khu tshur g.yon pas lte bar ni/ /bzung dang nub dang lho phyogs gnas/ /blo ldan nam mkha' i thig gdab ste/ /de bzhin 'og tu thig rab gdab/ /oM
93a2(rgyud 'grel): badzra sa ma ya sU tra mA ti kra ma hUM/ /nam mkha' gang ba'i bde gshegs rnams/ /khyod kyi 'gro don mdzad dus lags/ /thig gi sgra yis bskul nas ni/ /de rnams 'di ni gshegs su gsol/ /gnod sbyin yi dags dbang po klu/ phyogs bltas
93a3(rgyud 'grel): me dang rlung la brten/ /dang po shar dang nub byang lhor/ /phyogs kyi phyi rol srad bu gdab/ /me dang bden bral phyogs gnas te/ /mtshams kyi srad buAng yang dag gdab/ /shar lho nub byang de bzhin du/ /byas pas dkyil 'khor rgyad du 'gyur//
93a4(rgyud 'grel): thig de nyis rim byas nas ni/ /'khor lo'i dbus su gzhag nas su/ 'khor lo rnam par de rgyab tu/ /rdo rje'i srad bu gnyis kyang gdab/ /dbang ldan las ni lcags ri dag /rang dang rjes mthun g.yas nas bskor/ /mkhas pas thig gis thig
93a5(rgyud 'grel): btab nas/ /phyogs kun mnyam pa nyid du bya /ltas ngan byung na dngos mi 'grub/ /srad bu chad na bla ma 'chi/ /ring thung khyer nan bar 'gyur/ /phyogs 'khrul slob ma myang bar 'gyur/ /zur bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /rta babs bzhis ni rnam
93a6(rgyud 'grel): par mdzes/ /thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan/ /ngar dang me tog phreng bas brgyan/ /grwa yi phyogs rnams thams cad dang/ /sgo khyud kyi ni mtshams rnams su/ /rdo rje rin chen spras par ni/ /dkyil 'khor phyi rim thig gdab po/ /de yi nang gi 'khor lo ni//
93a7(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor brgyad pa 'dra ba la/ /phyi yi 'khor lo'i phyed kyi tshad/ /kun nas yengs su zlum por bya/ /ka ba 'khor lo la sogs sbras/ /rdo rje phreng ba bzang pos bskor/ /de nas hI las khro bo yi/ /blta pas sgo ni rnam par dbye/ /sgo ni 'khor lo'i
93b1(rgyud 'grel): brgyad cha ste/ /kha khyer med pa nyid du 'dod/ /sgo khyud sgo yi tshad yin te/ /lha yi rnam buAng de yi tshad/ /de phyed kha khyer kun nas bskor/ /'og dang 'bras ni de bzhin te/ /dra ba dra phyed nyi zla dang/ /dar sogs snam bu tshad de bzhin/ /tshon gyis
93b2(rgyud 'grel): ni de yi phyed/ /rtsa ba'i thig sa'i phyi rol du'o/ /'khor lo la sogs ka ba'i thig /tshon gyi sa dang sa gzhi mnyam/ rta babs sgo yi sum 'gyur te/ /ba dan phreng ba rnams dang ldan/ /dril bu mchog ni rlung gis bskyod/ /ba dan phyi yi mtshams
93b3(rgyud 'grel): su bya/ /gzhan dag 'khor lo'i rjes mthun par/ /ji ltar mdzes par rnam par brtags/ /rdzogs sangs ye shes sku yin phyir/ /chos sku'i bdag nyid shin tu dag /gsung dbang rdo rje'i rigs su bshad/ /'di ni thug kyi 'khor lo yin/ /
93b4(rgyud 'grel): sems can bsams ba la brten nas/ /tshad la sogs pa nges mdzad kyi/ /thabs shes las byung dngos grub la/ /tshad sogs nges pas ci zhig bya/ /de ni khru gcig nas brtsams te/ /ji srid khru stong bar du'o/ /de ltar 'khor lo'i de
93b5(rgyud 'grel): thig gdab/ /tshon la 'bar ba'i lta bas kyang/ /snga ma'i rim gyis ye shes sbar/ /yang dag gzi bskyed gsang sngags bzla/ /oM badzra tsi tra sa ma ya hUM/ /'di ni chos dbyings dag pa ste/ /sems can khams ni grol byed pa/ /'jam
93b6(rgyud 'grel): dbyangs rgyal po rang nyid ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas/ /nyes pa kun las rab grol ba'o/ /'khor lo'i nang na yang dag gnas/ /bla mas g.yon pa'i khu tshur gyis/ /dbang ldan phyogs nas brtsams nas ni/ /dkar dang
93b7(rgyud 'grel): ser dang de bzhin dmar/ /ljang gu dang ni nag po nyid/ /mnyam zhing g.yas bskor rgyun ma chad/ /ma yo bar ni tshon rtsi dgye/ /sgo yi nyi shu cha ru ni/ /ri mo mnyam par dgye bar bya/ /sbom por bkye bas nad kyis 'debs/ /phra mos nor
94a1(rgyud 'grel): ni rnam par 'jig /yon pas rnam 'gras 'chad pa yis/ /bla ma dang ni slob ma 'chi/ /g.yas bskor min par bkye ba yis/ /tshon rtsi phur bus btab par 'gyur/ /dkar po rdo rje rtse rang bzhin/ /gnyis pa gser
94a2(rgyud 'grel): la dmigs pa ste/ /pad+ma rA ga'i rang bzhin te/ /de bzhin gzhan dag ma rgad yin/ /nag po nad du shes bya ste/ /'di ni tshon gyi rim par bshad/ /dkar po chen po shar phyogs su/ /lho ru ser dang yang dag ldan/ /nub kyi cha ni
94a3(rgyud 'grel): dmar po ste/ /byang ni ljang dang yang dag ldan/ /dbus kyi sa gzhi'i cha dag ni/ /in+d+ra nI la'i 'od gsal 'bar/ /rtag par shes rab thabs bdag nyid/ /shin tu mnyam gzhag legs par bri/ /ri mo phan tshun nas gang gis/ /ma reg
